[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] would be proud of you, [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, [GetWarriorLodgeTrainingDesc]
"The dedication you display is admirable, [Root.GetSisterBrother]", [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, [GetWarriorLodgeTrainingDesc]
Thank you, [fellow_member.GetFirstName]. That means a lot.
In your heart, you feel that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] might frown upon your dedication to these people.\n\n

wiping the sweat from [fellow_member.GetHerHis] brow, reminding me that our sparring match has gone on longer than planned. Cocking [fellow_member.GetHerHis] head, the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] concludes: "you're good at this, my friend."

inspecting my horse. We have been riding for hours, but all I feel is invigorated by the fresh air. "You are good with her", [fellow_member.GetSheHe] says, gesturing at the animal. "At all of this", the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] concludes.

inspecting my maps of [Root.Capital.GetName]. Together, we have been setting up some wilderness exercises. "In fact, my [Root.GetLordLady], I think you're a natural at these things", the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] concludes.

carefully putting the contraption of leather straps back on the table. "I am thinking it could be used for better movement in snow", I explain. [fellow_member.GetFirstName] scratches [fellow_member.GetHerHis] chin, nodding slowly. "You're good at these things", the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] concludes.

groaning and clutching at [fellow_member.GetHerHis] side. The blow I landed to [fellow_member.GetHerHis] ribs would have hurt a lot more, had it been a sharp weapon. "I have to hand it to you, my [Root.GetLordLady] – you're good at this", [fellow_member.GetSheHe] says.

washing [fellow_member.GetHerHis] face. We have been sparring for hours, and the water of the river is a welcome reward. "I hope you know you have a talent for these things", my companion says, nodding at the spear in my hand.

challenging me to keep up with [fellow_member.GetHerHim]. We have been out chasing a [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal] for hours, but I am starting to wonder whether the animal even exists, and if [fellow_member.GetFirstName] was not simply looking for company. "It's rare, you know", [fellow_member.GetSheHe] says. "Someone with talent, as well as wits."

nodding approvingly at my lightly packed horse. We are returning from an exercise in the mountains, and we are well ahead of schedule. "It is an honor training with you, [Root.GetFirstName]", the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] says, squeezing my shoulder briefly.

softly humming the tune I just finished singing, before clearing [fellow_member.GetHerHis] throat. "It's just something I made up, while we were marching" I say, dismissively. "You should keep it up, friend!", the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] argues. "It's good for morale, for the troops, you know".

Personal Combat Skill is a measure on how well you perform in duels against other characters, where it is compared to the skill of your opponent in order to decide the outcome. A high skill will also help you survive when leading an army into battle.

These are the titles which this character has a claim on. Claims can either be Strong or Weak, where Weak Claims can only be pressed under certain circumstances. You can press Claims through War or Factions.

These are the titles held by this character. Titles come in five tiers: Empire, Kingdom, Duchy, County and Barony. Counties and Baronies are tied to a physical location on the map (Baronies exist within Counties). Empires, Kingdoms and Duchies denote rulership over a larger area of land, but do not represent a physical location on the map.
These are the diplomatic relations this character currently has. Diplomatic relations include a variety of things, such as Truces or ongoing Wars.
These are the traits of this character. Traits are a defining feature of every character, representing their abilities, condition and personality.

These are the modifiers affecting this character. While similar to traits, modifiers are often of a more transient nature with a fixed date of expiry. Modifiers do not affect the personality of a character.
显示此角色已杀死的角色列表。如果查看除自己以外的角色，则只会显示已知的受害者。
通过理发师，你可以改变角色的头发和/或胡须风格。
显示该角色被认为是任何血脉其中一员的的列表。血脉由名声显赫者或传奇人物建立，并通过他们的后代传承。
显示由此角色收集的所有宝物。宝物提供强大的加成，但品质却参差不齐，从传家宝物到传奇圣遗物都有。一些宝物必须装备后才能使用。

Even under oppression the true faith lives on. As we worship in secret more and more join our cause, attracted by our righteous ways. Soon we will rise up and reclaim our place in the light!

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to emulate Pepin the Short by fighting to restore the Papal lands of the §Y$TITLE$§! to its rightful owner. This Casus Belli is valid only against any infidel or impious [christian.GetGroupName] who holds land in Central Italy. The Pope will certainly be thankful of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§! assistance in returning Papal provinces under the Church's control.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to legitimize your divine right to rule, as soon as you recognize that the Church is no servant to any King or Emperor, but instead watches over the salvation of the souls of all [christian.GetGroupName]s, regardless of their stature. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
[christian.GetGroupName]教宗已经决定叫上一只他的走狗来对抗我，以图收回我治下的一部分意大利领土。[From.GetTitledName]刚刚以教宗的名义向我宣战。

Organizing such a monumental ceremony has given me the chance to meet the rulers of the realms neighboring [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Maintaining healthy relationships with my [christian.GetGroupName] peers is fundamental to ensure future peace and prosperity for my realm. [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] in particular seems like a [potential_friend.GetManWoman] I could trust...

The night at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s court took a strange turn when our host decided to call some of the clergymen and scholars at the nobles' table, engaging with them in a long discussion about theology. I did not expect this feast to turn into a lesson about [christian.GetGroupName]ity, but...
Yet, should a [christian.GetGroupName] not eschew excesses?
本笃会是一个古老的修道院团体，以 'Ora et Labora' 作为他们的箴言，意为「祈祷与工作」，常常因为他们身着黑色僧衣而被认出。他们崇拜上帝，在祈祷和静默中寻找目的，同时也从事学术上的工作。

一个[christian.GetGroupName]牧师来到我的宫廷谈论信仰问题，但我很快就明白了他只想让我们改信他的信仰！作为一个狂热的[muslim.GetGroupName]，我下令囚禁这异教徒，我相信我做了正确的事。

A month has passed since I gave birth to little [From.GetFirstName]. As is tradition, I should undergo my Churching, as any good [christian.GetGroupName] mother does, and rejoin the Holy Church now that my body has been cleansed of all impurities.

Feudal government revolves around the oath between liege and vassal, and Feudal lords can only directly own so many Holdings before they must start to rely on vassals - whose loyalty may vary... There are several Succession Laws to pick between - each with its own merits. The Centralization Law controls the maximum size of your Demesne and the number of direct vassals you can have. If you should convert to a religion in the [muslim.GetGroupName] group, your government form will change to Iqta.

The [arabic.GetGroupName] Iqta system is similar to the Feudal system - rulers must rely on land holding vassals of varying loyalty and ambition. The maximum number of vassals and the number of Holdings you can directly own are controlled by the Centralization Law. However, there is only one form of Succession available - the chaotic 'Open' type, where the son with most land inherits. If you should convert to a non-[muslim.GetGroupName] religion, your government form will change to Feudal.

All adult [muslim.GetGroupName] men below the rank of Count risk acquiring the §YDecadent§! trait, especially those of low character. The amount of Decadence these men incur on their dynasty depends on their own social status as well as the total amount of Holdings controlled by the Dynasty. Decadence affects the tax income from your demesne and the morale damage that demesne levies take in battle. Ways to halt or decrease Decadence include:
§G*§! Granting landed titles to dynasty members
§G*§! Successfully convincing decadent Dynasty members to abandon their sinful ways
§G*§! Imprisoning, banishing or killing decadent Dynasty members
§G(The Religion View contains a list of decadent dynasty members.)§!

The conversion of [converting_king.Capital.GetName] starts on a cold morning.\nThe Bishop leading [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName]'s embassy meets you at a river near the city. Your faithful vassals stand beside you, while the rest of your subjects wait their turn behind them, looking still visibly confused. The Bishop recites a few verses from [catholic.GetScriptureName] before you lead your vassals into the river. As you pass the [sponsoring_king.Religion.GetName] priests they baptize you, one after the other, in the cold water. It takes some prodding from the guards to convince the peasants to follow you into the water, but, after a while, the entire crowd stands soaked and shaking by the riverside, just in time to watch the priests and their helpers drop your old idols into the waves.\n"As the false visages are swallowed by the tides" the Bishop proclaims, "may their memory forever be banished from your soul."

Reforming the [Player.Religion.GetName] faith will turn it into an organized religion with a religious head. Unless you control all of the Holy Sites, doing so requires §Y50§! Moral Authority and control of §Y3§! [Religion.GetName] holy sites. It will cost you §R750§! [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]. Rulers of a Reformed [pagan_group.GetGroupName] religion can use the Holy War Casus Belli, get access to most succession laws, no longer suffer Prestige loss while at peace, and will have less trouble with independent minded vassals. However, they also lose the defensive supply limit penalty for religious enemies in their territory and vassals will get upset if you have their levies raised for too long for no good reason.

Only a few more days remain before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and all my subjects. My court is filling with distinguished guests, both vassals and foreign dignitaries come to bear witness to this fundamental moment of my reign. Such a lavish ceremony is a rare spectacle to behold even amongst royalty.

Several of the largest patrons of culture in [Root.Capital.GetName] were apparently [jewish.GetName], something your advisors were ignorant of. Since the expulsion of the [GetJewryName], cultural life all across the realm has suffered.

It would appear that the military of your realm was more dependent on the efforts of [jewish.GetName] men than previously thought. Since the expulsion of the [GetJewryName], several important administrative posts remain vacant and there simply aren't enough qualified men to fill them.

The Dominican Order are able to listen to the confessions of any Christian – dressed in white and black, they lead the holy inquisition, charged with a mission to identify heretics. As a lay member of their Order you are expected to not pursue material wealth, but strive to be a seeker of truth.

The followers of Saint Basil lead an ascetic life, finding purpose in prayer as well as work, often in the name of aiding their fellow men and women. A lay member of the Order is not required to take on the life of a hermit – instead focus should be placed on helping the members of your community.

The order of Abraham the Great follow the monastic rules set by Abraham of Kashkar. Members swear to observe to strict obedience and to spread the word of the three great Nestorian doctors, Nestorius, Diodore of Tarsus, and Theodore of Mopsuestia. Only the literate may join the order and strict celibacy is required. Study and proselytism are the corner pillars of the order and as a member you are expected to spread the Nestorian faith ever eastwards.

The Community of Saint Anthony follows the oldest of monastic rules, set originally by Saint Anthony of Egypt, Saint Paul of Thebes, Saint Macarius and Saint Pachomius. In the spirit of the Great Fathers of Egypt's deserts we value simplicity, submission and humility. It is the duty of Miaphysite monks to work to spread the word of Christ, building on the oldest Christian monastic tradition in the world.

The Monks of the Hindu Mathas aim to be an integrative and supporting force in society. Monks can seek to achieve spiritual enlightenment through meditation and scriptural studies or through charity and participating in the local economy. The Mathas are honored and often patronized by the rulers of India.
佛教寺院的成员们希望遵循一套严格的规则，目的是通过简朴冥想的生活来达到涅槃。比丘们誓言放弃除生存必须外的全部物质财产，只依靠他人的施舍生活。
耆那教僧侣发誓遵守一些誓言、规章、基本职责和禁忌。他们弃绝所有的个人财产，寻求净化和自我实现。
多明我会能够倾听任何[christian.GetGroupName]的忏悔——身穿着黑白相间的修士服，他们领导着宗教裁判所，肩负着辨别异端的使命。作为他们教派的在俗会员，你不该再去追求物质的财富，而是要努力成为真理的探索者。

The Faithful Ones lead an ascetic life, finding purpose in prayer as well as work, often in the name of aiding their fellow men and women. A lay member of the Order is not required to take on the life of a hermit – instead focus should be placed on helping the members of your community.

The Devout Worshipers follow the monastic rules set by the hallowed martyr. Members swear to observe to strict obedience and to spread the word of the three great [nestorian.GetName] doctors. Only the literate may join the order and strict celibacy is required. Study and proselytism are the corner pillars of the order and as a member you are expected to spread the [nestorian.GetName] faith.

The Pious Following follows the oldest of monastic rules, set originally by the hallowed martyr. In the spirit of the deserts we value simplicity, submission and humility. It is the duty of [miaphysite.GetName] monks to work to spread the word, building on the oldest [christian.GetName] monastic tradition in the world.

The Monks of the [hindu.GetName] Mathas aim to be an integrative and supporting force in society. Monks can seek to achieve spiritual enlightenment through meditation and scriptural studies or through charity and participating in the local economy. The Mathas are honored and often patronized rulers.

Members of [buddhist.GetName] monasteries are expected to follow a strict set of rules aiming to attain enlightenment through a simple and meditative life. Foreswearing all physical property except the bare necessities.
[jain.GetName] monks swear to abide by a number of vows, regulations, essential duties and restrictions. They dispose of all personal property, seeking purification and self-realization.
There suddenly seems to be an awful lot of these [From.TrueReligion.GetName] believers around...

The world has reached boiling point. Intolerance is on the rise, with conflicts of ideology and religious oppression rampant across the world. The many religious leaders congregate within their spheres, bent on having all others subjugate themselves before them. This is the era of large-scale religious wars.
The Era of Great Holy Wars has Begun\n
Great Holy Wars are now active\nAll Holy Orders are now active

A wandering warrior has requested an audience. It appears as if the entire court is abuzz with stories of [invited_character.GetHerHis] exploits, this [invited_character.GetFirstNameWithNick] is seemingly of great renown. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] wishes to swear fealty to me, having heard of my relation to the legendary [target_bloodline_founder.GetFullName]! I truly am blessed by my blood.
Increased Culture Conversion speed to §G[bodpa.GetName]§! from §Y[zhangzhung.GetName]§! and §Y[sumpa.GetName]§!
Periodically attracts the servitude of §GGreat Warriors§! (if §Y[From.Founder.Religion.GetName]§!)

The blood of [target_bloodline_founder.GetFullName] flows through my veins. Since the days [target_bloodline_founder.GetSheHe] walked the earth we have abandoned our old [target_bloodline_founder.Religion.GetName] faith, though I do see merit in the ways that helped shape such a legend...
We were once like them, we should not judge their ways.
No, the ways of old belong in the past.
[target_bloodline_founder.Religion.GetHighGodName] speaks directly through my blood! I repent!

Generates a realm somewhere in the world based upon the Holy Roman Empire. The realm will be large and religiously uniform, but heavily decentralized and elective.\n\n - Requires §Y'De Jure Kingdoms and Empires'§! be set to 'Random'.

Generates a realm somewhere in the world based upon the Byzantine Empire. The realm will be large and centralized, with Viceroyalty laws in effect. The Emperor will start off with all De Jure Duchy titles, to be handed out as Viceroyalties.\n\n - Requires §Y'De Jure Kingdoms and Empires'§! be set to 'Random'.

Determines how large Kingdoms will be when De Jure Kingdoms are randomized. The slider sets the minimum and maximum number of Duchies per Kingdom. Depending on their placement, Kingdoms might in rare cases end up below or above the set limits.
Increases the amount of Pagans in the world. Note that in rare cases the Pagans can be cut off from being assigned more land.
Generates a number of Merchant Republics throughout the world. Merchant Republics will only spawn if there are enough coastal cities to accommodate them.
Generates a small portion of Theocracies. Theocracies will only spawn if there are enough temples to accommodate them.
Determines whether names of Titles should be random or not.
Title names will not be changed. If a non-historical De Jure setup is used, the names of their base titles (Counties or Duchies) will be used.
王国和帝国将被分配随机的名称。
公爵领，王国和帝国将被分配随机的名称。\n请注意，此选项可能导致重复的名称。

The elusive Assassins consider themselves the true followers of [shiite.GetHighGodName], and will do anything to further the advances of the [shiite.GetName] faith and protect their fellow believers. Consisting of loyal warriors as well as competent spies, wielding manipulation and social skills as expertly as a dagger, they specialize in asymmetrical warfare, striking hard at the heart of their enemies.

The elusive Assassins consider themselves the true followers of Allah, and will do anything to further the advances of Shia Islam and protect their fellow believers. Consisting of loyal warriors as well as competent spies, wielding manipulation and social skills as expertly as a dagger, they specialize in asymmetrical warfare, striking hard at the heart of their enemies.
小型古腾塔克民兵营地
大型古腾塔克民兵营地
巨型古腾塔克民兵营地
A combination of mobile cavalry and heavily armored infantry trains here.
Hardened [GetGermanic] warriors meet here to train and exchange tactics.
[jurchen.GetName]以他们老练的骑兵——铁浮屠，和独特的战术而闻名，这是他们用于提升自己专长的训练场。
灵巧的[iberian.GetGroupName]「马人」轻骑兵在此集结。受到摩尔人的启发，他们擅长于骚扰战和遭遇战。
伙伴卫队在此训练，这些受到良好训练的壮士为[russian.GetName]领主服务。
大群[ethiopian.GetName]战士在此集结，他们能熟练地使用弓箭和长矛。
服务[israelite.GetGroupName]统治者的精锐步兵在此训练。金钱可以买到最好的重型装甲用以武装士兵。加上严格的训练和铁的纪律，使他们成为真正可怕的精英部队。
Sharpened palisade walls and trenches dug in strategic areas aid in defending our settlement.
Outposts stationed by archers allow for a rapid defense.
Extra layers of palisade walls allow our defenders to safely retreat should one of them fall.
Long trenches lead out of the settlement to watchtowers built of stone.
这些兵营是古代[nubian.GetName]战士传统培养和发展的地方。[GetNubia]自古代起就以其精湛的弓箭手而备受尊敬，其他的步兵精英单位也经过充分训练演习，以支援这一[nubian.GetName]统治者的有力武器。
[somali.GetName]统治者素来用精兵强将巡回国境。这些将士皆出于此。
[old_frankish.GetName]和[lombard.GetName]的重装方阵受到[roman.GetName]兵制的深远影响。这些精锐步兵就是在这里接受训练，准备为领主抛洒热血。
[pictish.GetName]最彪悍的勇士就聚集在战争大厅研习武艺，交换轶闻。当号角响起，他们便是战场上的鬼神，所向披靡。
自从诸葛亮发明连弩以来，[chinese_group.GetGroupName]士兵在战场上拥有了巨大的优势。在此，他们集结起来，将技艺用于征服。
喜马拉雅山脉的强悍部族是在崎岖山区地形作战的专家。
山岭的强悍部族是在崎岖山区地形作战的专家。
这种轻骑兵的起源可以追溯到塞尔维亚。他们装备着盾牌和长矛，通常扮演支援的角色，并在合适的时机出现时立刻对敌人发起冲锋。
这种轻骑兵的起源可以追溯数个世纪。他们装备着盾牌和长矛，通常扮演支援的角色，并在合适的时机出现时立刻对敌人发起冲锋。
这些城市民兵因在战斗中他们喜爱使用的古腾塔克锤矛而得名。他们在对抗装甲骑兵的战斗中多次证明了自己的实力。
这些城市民兵因在战斗中他们喜爱使用的锤矛而得名。他们在对抗装甲骑兵的战斗中多次证明了自己的实力。
苏格兰方阵由紧密排列的[scottish.GetName]长枪兵组成。如果遇到骑兵，他们将会把长矛稳固地架设起来。只有傻子和疯子会去冲击这些利器组成的密墙。
Determines whether Religions will work historically, or with randomized features.
Religions have their features randomized.\n\n - Requires §Y'Culture and Religion Names'§! to be set to 'Random'. If not, religious descriptions and their effects might not correlate.
This act violates your religious doctrine of non-violence\n
In a world dominated by animals, can mankind still prevail?

The world lies shattered and broken, with the glories of the past reduced to nothing but ash. In this world there is no authority, there is no one who rules, makes law or provides guidance – it is everyone for themselves in a perilous world.\n\nNow it stands to you to bring back order. Under your enlightened guidance Empires will rise, prosperity will return, and the disunited peoples will once again be rallied under a worthy monarch. No time to lose, the Gods themselves await your triumph!

The world as it never was – but could have been. The most minuscule change in history can have the most vast of consequences, especially if playful Gods are involved. This brand new world was forged in the furnace of history, albeit one much different from our own. Left until red-hot, the Gods then shaped the malleable planet into something befitting their whims.\n\nThey now leave its fate in your hands, to steer the direction of history towards its inevitable conclusion. Will this world triumph and enter ages of progress and splendor? Or will it be left to be overrun by darkness and stagnation? Only time will tell.
Large numbers of adventurous warriors have arrived from all corners of your realm, hoping to join your great expedition against [From.GetTitledName]!
A renowned hero has arrived at your court with his warriors and followers, hoping to partake in your glorious invasion of [From.GetTitledName]!

There are many legends about the great [target_bloodline_founder.GetManWoman] whose blood I share. A particular story has been circulating at court lately. It focuses on an epic feat where [target_bloodline_founder.GetFirstName] proves [target_bloodline_founder.GetHerHis] strength of character. The more I hear, the more I wish to emulate [target_bloodline_founder.GetHerHim]...
I shall strive to be more like [target_bloodline_founder.GetHerHim]!
No, I make my own fate.
I know EXACTLY what they are referring to!
This character is emulating the personality of a Legendary Hero
孩子们能通过成为§G雇佣兵§!证明自己
一名杰出的战士同时也是一位伟大的政治家，他确立了法兰克人在高卢无可争议的主人地位，也带领军队在图尔战役中击败穆斯林。
一个传奇的维京英雄。他对法兰克人和盎格鲁撒克逊人进行过多次劫掠，甚至还沿塞纳河而上，成功地围攻巴黎。
一位突厥乌古斯的军阀，塞尔柱从可萨汗国军队的军官中发迹。不久后他远离故乡，展开冒险，转而去建立了他自己的部族。
出生时是私生子，在成功宣称英格兰的王位后，他为自己做出了强有力的证明，并以『征服者』的称号为人所知。
蒙古帝国的建立者，被众多大草原上的臣民尊为『成吉思汗』（世界统治者）。一位极其残忍并且高效率的领袖。
一名军队领袖和著名英雄。摩尔人称之为『熙德』（大人），而基督徒称之为『坎培多尔』（杰出的战士）。
在他的母语里，帖木儿义为『铁』。虽然他被两支箭伤成了跛子，但他依然是一位军事天才和能逐渐培养出人民忠诚度的政治家。
伽色尼王朝的创始人。他年轻时当过奴隶，但在其后的生涯里，他统治了一个强大的王国，疆域远括到了印度。
波罗王朝的创始人，据说是神话中的苏利耶房奢（日种）家族的后裔。他统治了一个涵盖整个旁伽罗的庞大王国。
印度有史以来最伟大的统治者之一。他征服了安达曼群岛、斯里兰卡、马尔代夫群岛，甚至缅甸、泰国和印度尼西亚的部分领土。
埃及和叙利亚的第一位苏丹。他领导穆斯林对黎凡特的十字军国家，开展了成功的军事行动。
留里克王朝的创始人。他是一位统治罗斯的瓦兰吉酋长，他建造了不少的聚落，其中最著名的在诺夫哥罗德。
一位非凡的政治家、战略家。他成功地将波兰变强得如西方国家一般。
一位伟大的军事领袖、战士，以『狮心王』之称为人所知。他是第三次十字军东征的标志性人物，在对穆斯林的战争中赢得了许多胜利。
西欧最强大的女性之一。她是文学的赞助人、军事将领，同时也是第二次十字军东征的一位领袖。
一位传奇的军事领袖，在入侵德意志人和瑞典人的过程中，赢得了数场军事胜利。他后来被封为圣徒。
一位勇敢的骑士，参加过苏格兰独立战争。在击败英格兰的军队后，他被任命为『苏格兰守护者』。
一位传奇的统治者，通过技能和武力统一了挪威王国和挪威人民。
马扎尔部落的肯代（神权统治者）。他征服了喀尔巴阡盆地，为匈牙利人民找到了新的家园。
东罗马最伟大的皇帝之一，他的统治给时代带来了光荣、昌盛、艺术和帝国实力。
一位伟大的皇帝，战胜过塞尔柱突厥人和诺曼人。他的改革阻止了帝国的衰落，重现了许多往日的荣光。
一名传奇的瓦兰吉战士。他统治了基辅地区，并成为了当地第一个国王。
一位和平的统治者，他通过熟练的外交技巧登上了王位。他的统治见证了发生在克罗地亚的重大的经济文化进步。
一位传说中的爱尔兰至高王。他成功地统合了爱尔兰交战不休的领袖，终结了维京人在岛内的占领。
吐蕃帝国的建立者，将数个青藏高原上的王国统一于他的治下。他也将佛教引入吐蕃，并创制了藏文。
墨洛温王朝的传奇缔造者。他用部落军队与罗马联手将匈人驱逐出高卢，结束了阿提拉对此地区的野心。
所罗门王朝宣称其直系祖先是圣经中所罗门王——一位以传奇的智慧和财富著称的以色列国王。
库布拉特宣称源自于阿提拉——古罗马最畏惧的敌人之一，联合了众多部族于其麾下。
阿史那氏在反叛柔然可汗国后崭露头角。其氏族成员在大草原上的人民眼中非神即圣。
世界上最古老的基督教王朝之一。巴格拉特的子孙几百年来使格鲁吉亚兴旺发达。
萨珊王朝统治下帕提亚七大氏族之一的后裔。七大氏族或七大家族，在波斯历史上扮演着至关重要的角色。
萨珊王朝的创始人。被称为伟大的战士，猎人和琐罗亚斯德教的大祭司。
A legendary high king of Ireland and founder of the Uí Néill dynasty. During his rule he won several battles against the Saxons, Scots, Gauls and even the Romans.
传奇的转轮圣王，全印度的统一者
A great conqueror of fame and legend. With sword in hand [This.Founder.GetSheHe] would let no one stand in [This.Founder.GetHerHis] way.
The promised Saoshyant, savior of the world and holy icon according to the Zoroastrian belief.
The [This.Founder.GetManWoman] who restored the Kingdom of David, the land of Israel, to the Jews.
Borrowed Money from the Banks of Israel
Borrow 600¤ from the Banks of Israel
I can borrow 600¤ from the Banks of Israel because of my status. This loan will be free of interest.
I will repay the gold that I owe the Banks of Israel.
Can borrow from the §GBanks of Israel§!

在你寻求招募宫廷医师消息传出去不久，一个被流放的[jewish.GetName]来到你的宫廷。这位被流放者自称为[recruited_physician_target.GetFullName]并且解释说[recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]曾任多位统治者的医生，如果报酬丰厚，也将提供[recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis]服务。
一名在欧洲其他地方遭受迫害的[jewish.GetName]流浪者现身在你的宫廷。四处游历的经历让他积累了大量人脉，成为了一个杰出的外交家。他可以胜任外交总管一职。
一名富有学识的[jewish.GetName]出现在你的宫廷。他因出色的记账和管理能力而受到推崇。他已经提议了数种提高官员办事效率的办法。他可能成为一个出色的财政总管。
一个神秘的[jewish.GetName]人希望在你宫廷中效力。他精通于宫廷权谋，过去还曾做过佣兵和间谍。如果你能信任他，他将会是你宫廷中不可或缺的人才……
一个名为§Y[jewish_courtier.GetFullName]§!的[jewish.GetName]廷臣来到你的宫廷。
最高尚的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我们当然可以借给您 300 金币。只希望在将来我们遇到困难的时候，您可以向我们施以援手。愿[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，鉴于您欠有我们的债务，我有一个不情之请。我们长久以来一直在与异教徒作战，如今正缺少能带领军队的骑士。因此，我借此机会希望您尊贵能干的儿子[FromFrom.GetFirstName]能加入我们的军团。通常这会让他失去继承权。愿[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上
亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队并维持开销。若您能允许我们在[FromFrom.GetName]建筑一座城堡，我愿意免去您的债务。愿[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！骑士团侍奉[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

悲愤交加的，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

陛下，我们不会忘记您十分慷慨的捐赠。我和教会将永远把您当做朋友。无论是在地下还是在天上，您一定会得到回报。
愿[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上
骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！
在最近的改革之后，一个新的骑士团诞生了。数以百计的狂热者成群结队地集结在它的旗帜下，准备为保卫他们的信仰而战。
此前未被路西法仆从社团接触过。\n
之前没有接触过你的社团。\n
那些服侍魔鬼的人就躲在我们中间，把他们的堕落和背叛奉献给他们的主人撒旦。每一次罪过都是一首赞美诗，每一次谋杀都是对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的蔑视咆哮。路西法奖励这些黑暗的仪式，女巫被赋予了非自然的长寿和各种恶魔的的力量。
那些服侍[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]的人就躲在我们中间，把他们的堕落和背叛奉献给邪恶的神灵。每一次罪过都是一首赞美诗，每一次谋杀都是对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的蔑视咆哮。这些黑暗的仪式会得到丰厚的回报—女巫被赋予了非自然的长寿和各种恶魔的的力量。
尝试找出§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!是否有对超自然力量的渴望，如果有，你可以让[Root.GetHerHim]拥抱真神。
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! lusts for the power of the occult. If so, you may offer [Root.GetHerHim] to join your Society.

The Fellowship of Hel are a secret society devoted to the study of dark sorcery and the veneration of the Hel, the giantess ruler of Helheim. Members believe in the power of destruction and will attempt to use dark magic to sate their greed and thirst for death. At Ragnarök they hope to join the forces of Hel and Loke in the fight against the other gods.
Recruit to the Fellowship of Hel
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Fellowship of Hel.
Has not been approached by the Fellowship of Hel before.

The Cult of Kali Purusha worship the demonic aspect of Kali, and refuse the shackles of conventional belief as they see no fault in acts committed out of selfishness. Their spirituality is instead centered around personal gain and lustful endeavors, condemning them in the eyes of traditional believers.
Recruit to the Cult of Kali Purusha
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a member of the Cult of Kali.
Has not been approached by the Cult of Kali before.

The Plaguebringers worship what traditional believers would call evil spirits, as they curse their enemies with disease and turn to the Erlik, the God of Death, to achieve their personal goals. Most unsettling are the rumors that they carry very little qualms in regards to how this dark favor is gained...
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a Plaguebringer.
Has not been approached by the Plaguebringers before.

The Cold Ones believe that certain people are born with witch's blood and it is their blessing to be able to turn to Chernobog, the Black God, to gain power and wealth. They are frowned upon by traditional believers, who would rather call them cursed, as they are rumored to sacrifice humans and commit heinous acts in order to achieve their goals.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become one of the Cold Ones.
Has not been approached by the Cold Ones before.

My eyes open, seeing only darkness. For a moment, my mind is blank, before the first thoughts get through the haze of sleep. Why did I wake up? A deep [Root.GetManWoman]'s voice cuts through the silence, startling me. "The time has come for you to profess your devoutness to [shiite.GetHighGodName]."
I will shout their names from the rooftops!
I will carry out [shiite.GetHighGodName]'s wishes in secret, no matter the risk.

As you hold little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] in your arms you feel something ominous eminate from [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] tiny eyes. They are not filled with the glee of a newborn babe, but with the determined ambition of a warrior... You are sure it is nothing, but the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] who delivered [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] did claim the night of [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] birth unusual somehow, blessed perhaps? Although some would call it folly, you remember the night as one bearing prophecy.

As you put [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] back to bed, a shiver runs down your spine – in your mind's eye, an image of the world changing flashes past, where great kings bend the knee to your [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon].

Perhaps it is time for you to go to bed, too.
While still an infant, this character managed to strangle a poisonous snake that had gotten into [GetHerHis] crib.
While still an infant, this character had a poisonous snake slither into [GetHerHis] crib. Instead of panicking, [GetSheHe] befriended the serpent.

Lying in the crib, I hear a slithering presence drawing closer and closer... What could this be, a friend? A foe? Before long, a hissing head peeks up over the edge. With glaring eyes and searching tongue, it moves towards me...
Grab it by the neck and squeeze it hard, until it stops moving!
You are cold, but here it is warm. Please, share my blanket.

As I check on little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], I am terrified to discover a snake in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] crib! Fortunately the snake is dead, but who killed it? It surely could not have been [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]? I better keep an eye out...
We need more guards in here!
Phew! At least [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is not MY [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon].

As I check on little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], I am terrified to discover a snake in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] crib! Fortunately the snake seems to be sleeping, cuddled up next to [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]. I quickly have a guard dispose of the serpent, though how did it manage to get in there?
My child! No! You were destined for greatness...

As I check on little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], I am terrified to discover a snake in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] crib! The serpent hisses at me, the body of little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] lying next to it. [child_of_destiny.GetHerHisCap] tiny body is still, bloated with poison. Who would do this to such a small child?
This character resists poison to such a degree that people claim [GetHerHim] a child of Mithridates.
The mind of this character works in odd and mysterious ways, [GetSheHe] often knows of something before it has even happened...

To keep an eye on me, the servant placed me on a table in the busy cookery. At the end of my table I see [spymaster_target.GetJobTitle] [spymaster_target.GetFirstName] mixing two vials together. As [spymaster_target.GetSheHe] turns [spymaster_target.GetHerHis] back to me, I crawl forward and grab the vial. It smells sweet! I down it all in one go. [spymaster_target.GetFirstName] turns back with a terrified expression on [spymaster_target.GetHerHis] face.

A terrified servant brings little [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] to me, tears running down her cheeks. She claims that [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] drank an entire vial of poison while in the cookery! Strangely enough, [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] does not look like [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is ailing at all... In fact [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is babbling as usual, smiling at me.
Calm yourself, can you not see that [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is fine?
That is... nice. Now take this obnoxious babe away, please.
This character received a vision making [GetHerHim] devoted to [Religion.GetHighGodName], ready to fight for the [Religion.GetName] faith.
This character received a vision where they were promised by [Religion.GetHighGodName] to become a god themselves...

I have been sent along with [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetPriestTitle] [priest_target.GetFirstName] to [temple_target.GetName] in order to learn more about the [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetName] faith. [priest_target.GetFirstName] tells me to pray in front of the candle-lit altar, eyes closed. Suddenly, a vision of [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetHighGodName] appears in front of my eyes! I was told such wondrous things, before [priest_target.GetFirstName] interrupted me – I had apparently been shouting passages from [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetScriptureName]!
I was told that I, too, would become a god one day!
I was told the truth, and I will fight for [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetHighGodName]!

I had [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] accompany [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetPriestTitle] [priest_target.GetFirstName] to the temple of [temple_target.GetName], to learn more about the [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetName] faith. Upon retuning, [priest_target.GetFirstName] claims that [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] had a vision from [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetHighGodName] while praying! Apparently my [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon] loudly proclaimed passages from [child_of_destiny.Religion.GetScriptureName], which [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] had no way of knowing...
Why do you bother me with this? Send [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] back to [temple_target.GetName] for all I care!
A [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] of true legend. [child_of_destiny.GetHerHisCap] exploits mimicked those of Alexander the Great himself!

It all went very fast. [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], famous as [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is, has had no trouble amassing a vast host of eager warriors. With [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] eyes set upon the realm of [target_character.GetFullName] they now embark on their adventure, without so much as a farewell. There truly were no way controlling the ambition of that [child_of_destiny.GetBoyGirl]...
I hope my [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon] does not forget about me...

The time has finally come! I have left the shackles of childhood behind me, ready to seize my destiny. As a [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] I am free to forge my own path, and the path I intend to forge is paved with my unbridled ambition. Beware, world, for I am here to tame you.

After having survived a childhood more perilous than those of most old stories, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has grown into a magnificent young [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman]. Having shown nothing but promise throughout [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] entire upbringing, [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] has eclipsed all of [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] teachers and become a masterful strategist.
My dear [child_of_destiny.GetDaughterSon], is it not time to rest for a while now?
I dare not think what [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is getting up to...

As I am out wandering I come across a warrior named [great_warrior_target.GetFirstName] who is decimating a hapless training dummy with impressive ease. Intrigued, I ask [great_warrior_target.GetHerHim] to teach me. At first [great_warrior_target.GetSheHe] just laughs, but eventually [great_warrior_target.GetSheHe] relents. Many hours pass, we practice swordsmanship and study the Art of War. I have never had this much fun!
When I grow up, no one will ever best me in combat!
My stratagems shall leave all enemies dumbfounded!

Just as I start to wonder where [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is, a servant comes bearing news. Apparently [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] has spent all day practicing swordsmanship with a warrior named [great_warrior_target.GetFirstNameWithNick]! According to the servant, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] shows great promise as a fighter and strategist – [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] evidently left [great_warrior_target.GetFirstName] very impressed!
Great news! This child will go far.
Hm, better not promote these tendencies...
While in personal combat this character simply does not give up, their guile and tenacity is legendary.
This character draws up plans and strategies at an astonishing speed.

Individual Cultures and their groups will be kept together, but will appear in random locations on the map. §YAll§! County Cultures are included in this setting. In certain cases, you might end up with both the original and the evolutionary form of a Culture, such as Norse and Swedish.
Individual Cultures and their groups will be kept together, but will appear in random locations on the map. Note that only cultures that existed during the selected date will be used.
Individual County Religions and their groups will be kept together, but will appear in random locations on the map. Most Heresies and special religions, such as the Aztec religion, are not included.
Individual County Religions and their groups will be kept together, but will appear in random locations on the map. Heresies and special religions, such as the Aztec religion, are included.
You there – tend to my [GetFromRelation] immediately!

Determines how large Empires will be when De Jure Empires are randomized. The slider sets the minimum and maximum number of Kingdoms per Empire. Depending on their placement, Empires might in rare cases end up below or above the set limits.
Determines whether or not (or for how long) characters will be provided with a special County-conquest Casus Belli, designed to speed up the early game.

Determines how the game will set up Great Conquerors. A Great Conqueror is a randomly selected AI ruler given boosted stats, a Bloodline, a big army, and access to an Invasion-type Casus Belli for the duration of their lifetime. Great Conquerors will not spawn close together, nor next to a player.
Determines how the game will handle initial Succession Laws. After the game starts, Succession Laws can be changed normally.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to be merciful and I am safe from the rack. However, [From.GetSheHe] has ordered that I am to be drenched in tar and rolled in feathers! I will then be put on a cart and wheeled through the streets...! The guard escorting me to my sentence snickers delightedly my predicament.

The guards rouse me from my slumber and I am dragged from my cell. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to have me spend some time in the stocks. "Discourages the youth from causing trouble", a guard mumbles. "Oh, and expect rotten tomatoes."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided that to begin repenting for my unsavory crimes, I am to be led through the crowded streets, naked, in front of the people as well as the heavens. "Shame is your name!" a brutish guard yells at me, before dragging me out of my cell.
Reports state that new recruits have been partaking in our initiation ritual, allowing [Root.Society.GetName] to be growing in numbers!
Caution is often the wisest choice. I've lost the Brave trait.
You will be unable to join §Y[warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]§! for years to come.\n
who was flailing miserably with [This.GetHerHis] [This.GetDuelWeapon]. I am told the poor [This.GetManWoman] soiled [This.GetHerselfHimself] as death came to claim [This.GetHerHim]
who was cut down with ease. The symbols of high rank on [This.GetHerHis] uniform apparently went unnoticed, until a soldier stumbled over [This.GetHerHis] corpse
who resisted bravely until [This.GetSheHe], according to reports, tripped on [This.GetHerHis] own [This.GetDuelWeapon]
who cut down several good men, before taking a mighty blow of an ax to [This.GetHerHis] head
who probably could have made it out of that fight, "had [This.GetSheHe] not been overwhelmed by [This.GetHerHis] enemies". The scout reddens. "I mean our troops, my [Root.GetLordLady]"
who probably could have made it out of the fight, had [This.GetSheHe] not been overwhelmed by [This.GetHerHis] enemies. The scout frowns. "I am sorry to bring you these news, my [Root.GetLordLady]"
who is rumored to have put up a tough fight, even when dozens of soldiers ganged up on [This.GetHerHim]
who was dominating the battlefield, right up until [This.GetSheHe] met [This.GetHerHis] unfortunate end
fought bravely, and held out longer than [This.GetHerHis] enemies anticipated

To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you do not live up to the standards expected of our members. While we wish you no ill, we can no longer allow you to proclaim yourself one of [Root.Society.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
I had a feeling it would come to this.
You tell a white lie to §Y[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]§!.
You tell §Y[Root.FatherOfUnborn.GetFirstName]§! he will be a father.
This community is mourning the loss of §Y[local_dead_commander_target.GetTitledName]§!, who recently died in battle.
This character is currently wallowing in the pain of having lost [GetHerHis] lover on the battlefield.
This community is full of inspiring stories surrounding the leadership of Commander §Y[local_inspiring_commander_target.GetTitledName]§!.

My [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] is making some less than subtle remarks over dinner tonight, commenting on my swordsmanship and asking how interested I am in strategy of war. "Honestly, [Root.GetFirstName]... When are you going to become a member of [recruiting_parent.Society.GetName]?"
I have just been waiting for you to ask.
[recruiting_parent.GetFatherMotherCap], I will carve my own path.

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] smiles broadly at my encouragement. "I thought you would never ask! I'll contact [hero_character.GetTitledFirstName] right away, [Root.GetFatherMother]."
My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] smiles broadly at my encouragement. "I thought you would never ask! So... how do we do this, [Root.GetFatherMother]?"

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] rolls [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes at my attempted encouragement. "I will carve my own path, [Root.GetFatherMother]. Please, let me." When I do not respond, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] continues: "[hero_character.GetSocietyRank] [hero_character.GetTitledFirstName] is a bore, [Root.GetFatherMother]."

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] rolls [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes at my attempted encouragement. "I will carve my own path, [Root.GetFatherMother]. Please, let me." When I do not respond, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] continues: "War and combat is dreadfully boring, [Root.GetFatherMother]."
I was just waiting for you to be ready!
We'll play this fair. You're a recruit, like anybody else!
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will report back to you once [new_recruit.GetHerHis] trial is over.\n
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is clearly not ready for this commitment.\n
我的[new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective][new_recruit.GetSonDaughter]今晚与我共进晚餐时，滔滔不绝地谈论[new_recruit.GetHerHis]入会仪式。“那真是太令我热血澎湃了，[Root.GetFatherMother]！我现在已经是[new_recruit.Society.GetName]的一员了！”
I knew you had it in you, [new_recruit.GetFirstName].
You almost make me wish I hadn't left...
You suddenly feel a little nostalgic.\n
Are you trying to impress me or something?
我的[new_recruit.GetSonDaughter]今晚与我共进晚餐时，沉默不言不发一语。当我试着诱导[new_recruit.GetBoyGirl]说一些话，[new_recruit.GetSheHe]喃喃道：“我没能像您做得那么好，[Root.GetFatherMother]”，[new_recruit.GetSheHe]的脸羞赧地红了。“我没能通过入会仪式。”
我的[new_recruit.GetSonDaughter]今晚与我共进晚餐时，沉默不言不发一语。当我试着诱导[new_recruit.GetBoyGirl]说一些话，[new_recruit.GetSheHe]喃喃道：“请别生气，我已经改变想法来加入[Root.Society.GetName]了”
Oh, dear... I am still proud to call you family, [new_recruit.GetFirstName].
As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is your [Root.GetSonDaughter], you can ask them to go through the initiation rite, in order to join [From.Society.GetName].\n
Has NOT recently been asked to join [From.Society.GetName]\n
Recruit is NOT busy, or fighting a war\n

My [From.GetFatherMother] tells me that it does not matter which path I walk. "Whether you choose the way of the sword, or the way of the quill, you are my [Root.GetSonDaughter]." We spent the rest of the evening talking about other hopes and dreams of mine, and I can only smile fondly when I think of [From.GetHerHis] support.
Family is what is most important, after all.
My [From.GetFatherMother] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] expected more from my duel, before eating the remainder of [From.GetHerHis] dinner in silence.\nI feel awful.
This is not the end of my story! Nay, [From.GetSheHe] doesn't KNOW me...!

A bird cries out and I wake up. I hear men roaring in the distance. Why am I on the ground, staring at the sky? I... I cannot move.\nIs this how [Root.GetBestName] leaves this world?\n"Go with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]", comes the ragged voice of a wounded soldier next to me.

I cannot stop coughing. Something is filling my lungs. An enemy soldier is shouting orders, but I am having a hard time focusing on the words. My knees give way, and I am on the ground, dropping my [GetDuelWeapon].

I am surrounded. Blood is streaking down my face and my [GetDuelWeapon] has begun to feel heavy. A huge [GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] of a [enemy_commander.GetManWoman] is looming towards me, but seems to decide that I am not worth the trouble. I have just enough time to wonder why before someone runs a sword through my chest.
Perhaps I should have made peace with [random_rival_target.GetFirstName]...?
§Y[home_liege.GetTitledName]§! will be notified of your demise.\n
The enemy's Commander, §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!, shouts to press on.\n
The enemy's Commander, §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!, eyes the §Y[dueling_weapon_1.GetName]§! on the ground...\n
During the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], the enemy cornered my commander [home_commander.GetTitledName], [home_commander.GetOnCombatDeathDesc].

During the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName] I manage to corner and cut down [home_commander.GetTitledName], hopefully teaching [home_commander.GetHerHis] troops a valuable lesson.\nIn the aftermath, my scouts find a weapon.
Let [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] decide what to do with this.
I could never steal from the dead! This belongs to [home_commander.GetHerHis] family.

A weapon has been found by my soldiers. "It was dropped by [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], my [Root.GetLordLady], at the recent battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]" my commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] says, presenting the item.

A weapon has been found by my troops. "We are told that it belonged to [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], my [Root.GetLordLady]" an officer says, presenting the item. "It must have been lost during the recent battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]", [Root.GetSheHe] concludes.
In the chaos surrounding the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName] my men cornered [home_commander.GetTitledName], [home_commander.GetOnCombatDeathDesc].
In the battle chaos of [battlefield_location.GetName] my men cornered [home_commander.GetTitledName], [home_commander.GetOnCombatDeathDesc].
我在战场上遭遇了[battlefield_location.GetLocalWeatherAdjective]的天气。我对着天空做了个深呼吸。[enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName][enemy_liege.GetEnemySoldierDesc]的士兵们一直在英勇地搏斗，而每走一步，我的四肢都会变得沉重。

While my soldiers are fighting valiantly alongside me, one [enemy_liege.GetEnemySoldierDesc] buffoon wearing the colors of [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have figured out that I am the one holding the troops together. Through the haze of my tired mind, I sense [Root.GetHerHis] lumbering advance, and [Root.GetHerHis] intent to do something about it...

My troops are performing with excellence, and my chest is swelling with pride as we keep pressing forward. I turn back to answer the call of a soldier near by, when suddenly there is a sharp pain in my [Root.GetBodyPartInjured]. Gritting my teeth, I hear an enemy shouting: "Stay down, you [GetRootFromInsult]!"
I accept any injury, if it protects [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
I think I will rest behind this [battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence] for a moment...
They will have to catch me first!
You don't have to ask me twice! I will stay down.

The landscape surrounding [battlefield_location.GetName] is a sight to behold. I wish I was not here for a battle. Once all of this is over, maybe I will come out here with [my_beloved.GetFirstName]..?\nMy [GetDuelWeapon] is suddenly kicked out of my hand, and a scruffy-looking soldier shouts, voice like a demon: "I'll get your [GetBodyPartInjured]!"

You [GetRootFromInsult]! the [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] soldier yells as he charges at me, his expression more that of a wild animal than man. For a moment time stands still, as I am watching the movement of a shiny sword coming straight for my [GetBodyPartInjured].

I try to breathe deeply, but catching my breath in the [battlefield_location.GetLocalTemperature] weather is difficult. "Look, it's the [Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetHerselfHimself]!" someone shouts. I turn, only to find myself overrun by a dozen of [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s [enemy_liege.GetEnemySoldierDesc] soldiers.
You won't get the best of me – I need that [Root.GetBodyPartInjured]!
Wait! How about you just take this [equipped_artifact.GetName] and let me live?!
You throw your weapon to the ground. Then you run.\n
You wriggle out of your armor and leave it in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]. Then you run.\n
You throw §Y[equipped_artifact.GetName]§! to the ground. Then you run.\n
This option is available because you have §Y[equipped_artifact.GetName]§! equipped
§Y[equipped_artifact.GetName]§! will be removed from your Treasury.\n
I don't think so – I'll duel Commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] myself!

One moment I am shouting orders, surrounded by the clanging of swords and fighting around me. The next, everything goes dark, as the world slips away from me. Are those... people, concerned faces? Everything hurts. I just want to... rest.

One moment I am shouting orders, surrounded by the clanging of swords and fighting around me. Then my memory fades, and I find myself on the ground, lying in a mixture of blood and [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc], my ears ringing with pain. A soldier runs past me, but he seems to assume I am dead.
The fight will have to go on... without me.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! receives a crushing blow to the head and shows no sign of waking.
You gingerly pull the spear from your cheek. It is more than a grazing wound...\n

It has been ages since I felt so invigorated by a battle. "Every day, our unit is moving as if connected by some unspoken bond", I exclaim eagerly one night. "Or a higher power of some kind!"\n"Uhm, this is all you, my [Root.GetLordLady]", one of my soldier says, a look of genuine surprise on his face.
你说得对！谦虚对我毫无益处。

As I describe the plan for our movement across the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], my officers listen intently before running back to their units to pass on the instructions. Morale has been good lately. Conflicts are non-existent within our regiment, and we are becoming famous for our [Root.GetMilitarySquadPride].
他们只是对自己变得更加自信。
战略本身就是一种艺术形式。

Rumors are trickling in from the troops present at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]. My commander [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName] has been making a great impression on [home_commander.GetHerHis] soldiers, and [home_commander.GetHerHis] regiment is famous for their [home_commander.GetMilitarySquadPride]!
让[home_commander.GetHerHim]成为我们新兵的光荣模范吧！

Our ongoing struggle outside of [battlefield_location.Capital.GetName] has brought out the best of our military strategists. One of them is a [invited_character.Culture.GetName] veteran with a penchant for innovation. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] is suggesting that [invited_character.GetSheHe] retire from the battlefront, and return to [home_capital_province.GetName] to continue [invited_character.GetHerHis] work, safe from flying arrows.
这听起来值得我们赞助。
愚蠢，我们需要把更多的资源投入前线而不是浪费在这种事上。
这个社团夜以继日的研究使得他们在军事方面颇有建树。

One day, you'll have to specialize. I hear the voice of my old quartermaster in my head. As I look out over the battlefield and the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName], the sight fills me with resolve. I need to find a focus for future battles, but what will it be?

We are marching [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], when one of my officers mutters: "Once I'm back in [home_capital_province.GetName], I'm giving up this soldiering life and... Maybe I will be a baker!" I chuckle, considering my own more strategic aspirations. "What about you, my [Root.GetLordLady]? What will you focus on in the future?"
我想更直接些。是的，当然。
我永远不会在战斗中投降。

[Root.GetFirstName]! You [Root.GetEnemySoldierDesc] brute! a shout carries [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], where I am fighting a close battle alongside my personal guards. In the distance, I see enemy reinforcements coming our way. "Listen-", I begin to my soldiers...
玄武阵，就像我们练习过的一样。
雄鹰阵，就像我们练习过的一样。
你知道我们有什么，他们不知道吗？彼此！
跟随你的直觉！或者我的！

I am [GetRidingMarching] [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName] when I realize how this experience has simply become matter of course. I rarely even think when I charge into battle – it just happens! I could surely make use of this insight, but how?
I will dedicate myself to mastering narrow battles.
Siege tactics! Why have I not thought of this before?

There are people who would say that my interrogation techniques are appalling, but I would remind them that this is war. There is no such thing as 'unnecessary violence'. Turning back to my prisoner, I continue out loud: "Where are the rest of your troops hiding? Hmm?! I'll search the whole [battlefield_location.GetTerrain]!". I am met with sobs.
I...The look on your face. You're just a boy...!
Crying will get you nowhere. You are but a tool of my enemy!

I interrupted Marshal [From.GetTitledFirstName] while [From.GetSheHe] was interrogating an prisoner to find out where our enemy would attack next. The guard who brought me to [From.GetFirstName] accused [From.GetHerHim] of using unnecessary violence and looked at me for support. "My [Root.GetLordLady]?"
Aah, yes, the cruelty of war. Carry on, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
What is the meaning of this? I do not approve of this conduct!
[From.GetSheHeCap]'s right, we should terrorize our enemy.

Just as I am about to cut the enemy commander in two, the [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName] throws [home_commander.GetHerHis] weapon to the ground, scrambles to [home_commander.GetHerHis] feet and starts running. My soldiers trip over each other in their sudden attempt to catch up with [home_commander.GetHerHim], but to no avail.

Just as I am about to cut [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName] in two, the enemy commander wriggles out of [home_commander.GetHerHis] armor, picks [home_commander.GetHerselfHimself] up, and runs the other way. Dumbfounded, my soldiers and I are left lowering our weapons, staring as the half-naked runner disappears from us.

Any last words?! I shout, as I am about to cut down [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], the enemy commander. The [home_commander.GetManWoman] groans and tosses something into the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc] between us. I hesitate for a second, and my enemy uses the opportunity to start running away, leaving me staring at the item on the ground.

I am told that just as my soldiers were about to cut an enemy commander in two, the [home_commander.GetManWoman] threw [home_commander.GetHerHis] weapon to the ground, scrambled to [home_commander.GetHerHis] feet and left [home_commander.GetHerHis] enemies staring in confusion. "[home_commander.GetSheHeCap] dropped this, my [Root.GetLordLady]" the courier says, handing me the bounty.

I am told that just as my soldiers were about to cut an enemy commander in two, the [home_commander.GetManWoman] wriggled out of [home_commander.GetHerHis] armor and ran the other way, causing such a distraction that "[home_commander.GetSheHe] probably got away uninjured", the courier says, handing me the bounty. "Unless [home_commander.GetSheHe] ran into a tree, my [Root.GetLordLady]".

I am told that just as my soldiers were about to cut an enemy commander in two, the [home_commander.GetManWoman] tossed something in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc], distracting my soldiers and making a hasty escape. "But [home_commander.GetSheHe] left this behind, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", the courier says, handing me the bounty.
What an unusual tactic! I shall take that, thank you.
What a lunatic! I shall take that, thank you.
§Y[equipped_artifact.GetName]§! has been added to your Treasury.\n

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I find it hard to be near my children, for fear of being sent away again. I cannot stand the thought of us losing each other, and this distance is better. Surely, it is better.
I do NOT have nightmares, servant! How dare you?

Having returned from the battlefield, I still don't feel at home. My body is here, but my mind is still in [battlefield_location.GetName]. Sometimes I wonder if I died there and this is all a nightmare. Sometimes I cannot breathe.
I need to feel ALIVE again. Come here, servant!
Some solitude, that's all I need.

After the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], it has been my duty to inform the families of fallen soldiers of their fate. At night, I still see the hatred burning in the eyes of a teenage daughter. I know it is not my fault, but I have destroyed their lives.
It should have been me, not their brave [Root.GetFatherMother].
You find a way to stop the feelings of guilt, permanently.\n
Some people are always going to want me dead.
Enough of these "feelings"! By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I'll punch someone!
I will go out hunting with my brethren, I think. Fresh air, yes.
This option is available because you are a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
I shall never be close to anyone again.
Oh, my darling... Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
Oh, my darling... I must strive to understand the visions better.

Swinging my blade [Root.GetClumsilyElegantly] in front of me, while my trusted dog gnaws at the legs of my enemies, the battle rages on [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain]. Then there is a cry from a soldier nearby. "Incoming arrows! My [Root.GetLordLady], watch out! Wait, what is that dog-" *thwack*

My cat has become a true treasure here [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], acting as an anchoring kindness to any injured soldier. Of course, I was annoyed when I first found that it had gone to sleep in one of my saddle bags and followed me into battle, but now I am really coming around to- *thwack*

My horse and I are of one mind and body. Having trained together for long, the enemy has begun fearing us both. "Watch out, it's [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetWarhorseName]!" they tell each other. When I sleep, [Root.GetWarhorseName] sleeps. So when a blade cuts into [Root.GetHerHim], I feel like I bleed too...

Some argued when my owl came with us on this campaign, but between the comforting presence it brings our strategic meetings and the distracting screeching it offers our enemies, protests have ceased. "Attack!" I yell [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], and my owl swooshes above my head. Then I see the arrows.

Not everybody has a personal bodyguard in the shape of a majestic eagle at their side. More than once [Root.GetSheHe] has aided my attacks here [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] and charging at my enemies, knocking them off their horses, into the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]. There is a comfort in the screeching echoing above me. I am just concerned about-

Riding [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] I am finding my strength draining from me. Sweat is mixing with dirt and blood down my face and I see an enemy knocking an arrow, taking aim at me. Then I see a bird, swooping down, picking at the rider's face!

Riding [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], I see a group of [enemy_commander.GetEnemySoldierDesc] soldiers coming for my unit, weapons raised.\nWhen they are finished with us, all my men are dead. I sink to my knees in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc], wondering why I am still here.
Noooo! My dog! You were too good for this world...!
Your dog takes an arrow for you.\n
Was that an arrow?! KITTEN, NO!!!
Your cat is added to the list of casualties.\n
[Root.GetWarhorseName], no! Your sacrifice will not be forgotten...!
Your owl is added to the list of casualties.\n
Arrows!!! Nooo! My trusted companion, where are you?!
Is that a falcon?! What a strange sight!
The bird probably saved your life.\n
I... What happened? I don't belong here.
You will struggle in the future to overcome these events...\n
Where is the enemy commander?! I'll kill [enemy_commander.GetHerHim] myself!
You chase down the §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§! for a personal duel, while your soldiers tend to your wounded animal.\n
You chase down §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§! for a personal duel on the battlefield...!\n
每当这个角色外出打猎，你就能看到一只雄伟的鹰栖息在他们身边，如果它没有在前方探路的话。
Everything is just, in a war...\n

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] has just managed to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe], but [other_combatant.GetSheHe] does not seem finished with me. The last thing I hear is the panicked shouting of my fellow soldiers, followed by a soft thud, which can only be my head hitting the ground.

Just as I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] manages to [Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]. Then [other_combatant.GetSheHe] stumbles down into the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]. I turn to the [battlefield_location.GetLocalWeatherAdjective] skies above me, sending a prayer of thanks to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName].

正当我[other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]，[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]成功地[Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]。迷迷糊糊地，我摔倒在了[battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]。那个吃人的[other_combatant.GetManWoman]赢得了决斗…

I have recently found myself thinking about [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName], and how [other_combatant.GetSheHe] bested me on the battlefield. I finally sent a letter, to point out the professional respect I bear for [other_combatant.GetHerHim]. Even though we were enemies, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] has been kind enough to respond, in a gleeful tone.

I have received letters from [From.GetTitledFirstName], expressing a professional respect for my besting [From.GetHerHim] in combat. The [From.GetManWoman] is surprisingly easy to talk to about other things too, considering a part of me still remembers fighting for my life against [From.GetHerHim], at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName].
To think that war could bring friendship...!
[From.GetSheHe] was my enemy during the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]
This option is available because you are a §Gbetter§! dueler than §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!
This option is available because of your §Ghigh§! §YPersonal Combat§! skill
This option is available because you are a §Rworse§! dueler than §Y[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!
This option is available because of your §Rlow§! §YPersonal Combat§! skill

Each swing of my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] has sent me deeper into enemy territory. Before I know it, I am surrounded. With a burst of energy, I roar loudly, causing a few of them to hesitate and one unfortunate soldier to stagger backwards, tripping over a rock. I can't help but notice that [Root.GetSheHe] drops [Root.GetHerHis] weapon in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]!
I'll take that blade and send you back to [enemy_liege.Religion.GetHighGodName] with it!
I am not here for the discarded junk of my enemy.
You rely on your own weapons.

Originally belonging to an enemy soldier, [OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] kept this weapon on display, after bringing it back from battle. Some say as a humble symbol of [OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] combat prowess, others as a reminder to any who would oppose [OriginalOwner.GetHerHim].
A weapon lost by enemy soldiers, [OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] kept this weapon on display, after bringing it back from battle. "Spoils of war", some reason. "Sentimental nonsense", others say.
According to legend, stolen from a frightened enemy officer, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] treasured this beautiful weapon, allowing it to serve [Root.GetHerHim] both in battle and conversation.

In spite of its lack of quality, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] kept this weapon on display, after bringing it back from the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]. Some say as a humble symbol of [Root.GetHerHis] combat prowess, others as a reminder to any who would oppose [Root.GetHerHim].

A weapon lost by [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] soldiers, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] kept this weapon on display, after bringing it back from the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName]. "Spoils of war", some reason. "Sentimental nonsense", others say.

A weapon which, according to legend, was stolen from the hands of a frightened [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] officer. After the battle, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] treasured this bounty, allowing it to serve [Root.GetHerHim] both in battle and conversation.

The enemies are falling by my [GetDuelWeapon], one by one, while hails of arrows narrowly miss me. Charging into the thick of it all, I corner one surprisingly young soldier, trying to hide behind a [battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence]. With mixed emotions, I realize that the boy is shaking. "Who are you?!" he splutters, eyes frantic.
Tell your ancestors, that I foresaw your demise.
You can call me the Great [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimalCap]!
The one who will paint the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] with your blood.
Someone who will not rest until each and every one of you are dead.
I am doing you a kindness, believe me.
The one to grant you peace. Eternal peace.
I am the one who decides what happens next.
I am the fist that will crush you.
I am but a shield, protecting my people.
I am the tower of justice, at the end of your road.
I am the wall that will not give way.
I am the [Root.GetManWoman] you all expected to beat!
I am the one commanding the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain]!
I am the one who was born in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc].
This character has seen some things on the battlefield and is wiser from it.

[hero_character.GetBestName] and [From.Society.GetName] have chosen [From.GetTitledName] as my opponent. "Is this a joke"? I ask, my [From.GetRootRelation] smiling innocently. "It is but a formality, my dear" [From.GetSheHe] shrugs. I let out a nervous laugh.

There are noises. Metal, clanging. A fight? Are those soldiers practicing, or is this another nightmare? The twisted face of [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName], as [other_combatant.GetSheHe] is laughing at me, after our duel? My heart racing, I still cannot move from my bed.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has apparently slipped into a deep slumber, and does not show any signs of waking. However, I am told that the last thing anyone heard [From.GetHerHim] talking about was our duel and how [From.GetSheHe] would find a way to take revenge on me...
Hah! I guess we will see about that.
This character has sworn to some day avenge the death of a beloved.
I will avenge you, my dear [home_commander.GetRootRelation].
In spite of my efforts, I have been captured by the armies of [From.GetBestName]!
[captured_commander.GetBestName] was captured in battle and is now my prisoner!
[captured_commander.GetSheHeCap] will make for a suitable sacrifice to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
You order §Y[captured_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§! be offered up to the gods, in exchange for good fortune.\n
This character ordered a captured enemy commander be ritualistically killed and sacrificed, to please the gods.

That superstitious fool! [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName] took one look at me and had me dragged away from my cell. The next thing I know am propped up onto a pyre, soldiers shouting and chanting excitedly. "May [enemy_liege.Religion.GetHighGodName] accept this offering...." Then I smell smoke.
I cannot believe this is how it ends.

§GClick to open the Shattered World interface§!\nA Shattered World sees every ruler in the world start out on equal footing, as either Counts or Dukes. A plethora of settings allow you to tailor the experience exactly how you want it, from having a Historical setup to a Balanced one. Highly recommended for players who enjoy symmetrical starts, or who just want to see worlds evolve.

§GClick to open the Random World interface§!\nA Random World seeks to emulate history, albeit in a way that could have been – rather than the way it was. Rulers will range from lowly Counts to mighty Emperors, with complex and dynamic De Jure structures. Everything from Cultures, Religions, Names and Titles can be dynamically randomized – ensuring that a truly unique world is created each time.
Determines the maximum number of Counties each ruler can hold personally. Most will hold a low number of Counties even if this is set high.
A low number of Dukes are generated.
A significant number of Dukes are generated.
A massive number of Dukes are generated.
Determines how common Kings are.\n\n - Results may vary if the §Y'De Jure Kingdom Size'§! or §Y'De Jure Empire Size'§! are set very high.

Determines how common Emperors are.\n\n - Results may vary if the §Y'De Jure Kingdom Size'§! or §Y'De Jure Empire Size'§! are set very high.
Few to no Emperors are generated.
A handful of Emperors are generated.

[saint_person.GetDynName] lived a pious life, truly following the example of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName]. [saint_person.GetSheHeCap] passed on [saint_person.GetDeathDate], and people have long wondered if [saint_person.GetSheHe] would be considered a true [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] or not.

In a grand ceremony [bishopric_holder.GetTitledFirstName] has declared [saint_person.GetFirstNameWithNick] as a [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] who has indeed entered Heaven, celebrated by the people of [saint_person.PrimaryTitle.GetName] as well as by the [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName] world as a whole.  

We can only wish to follow [saint_person.GetHerHis] example, and become truly pious people in the eyes of [saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName].
It is a loss to all of us.
This character has been beatified by the Church as a pious exemplar of the faith.

[saint_person.GetTitledFirstName]活过了虔诚而节制的一生，不愧为[saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName]的真正楷模。[canonizer_person.GetBestName]隆重地宣布将封[saint_person.GetFirstNameWithNick]为圣人。人们细数着这位圣人一生中所作的壮举，传颂着[saint_person.GetSheHe]伟大的传说。

[RandomSaintMiracle]

对于他的家族而言，这无疑是莫大的荣耀，我们都备受鼓舞，来成为同[saint_person.GetHerHim]一样的虔信者。愿[saint_person.GetHerHis]姓名永世蒙福。
Truly an inspiration to all of us.
[saint_person.GetFirstName] has become known as a Saint, and everyone of [saint_person.GetHerHis] §YBloodline§! will reap the benefits.

[saint_person.GetTitledFirstName] passed on [saint_person.GetDeathDate], and was not much of an inspiration to other [saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName]s throughout [saint_person.GetHerHis] life. In spite of that, [bishopric_holder.GetTitledFirstName] has called together a celebration in [saint_person.GetHerHis] honor. 

Talking at length about the pious life [saint_person.GetFirstName] lived in spite of [saint_person.GetHerHis] shortcomings, [bishopric_holder.GetTitledFirstName] writes [saint_person.GetHerHis] name in among the truly pious men and women of old. 

The whole farce is an embarrassment to those present, to even dare compare [saint_person.GetDynName] to the likes of St. Peter or St. Augustine. What will the Church say about this?

[saint_person.GetTitledFirstName] passed on [saint_person.GetDeathDate], and even though [saint_person.GetSheHe] had [saint_person.GetHerHis] shortcomings in life, [bishopric_holder.GetTitledFirstName] has called together a celebration in [saint_person.GetHerHis] honor.

Like St. Augustine, [saint_person.GetSheHe] managed to move past [saint_person.GetHerHis] faults, and move on to become a better [saint_person.GetManWoman] living for the faith.

Letters has been sent out to the whole [saint_person.Religion.GetName] world from the Vatican. The Pope has demanded a stop to the beatification of sinful people and revoked the rights from the rest of the clergy to do so.

From now on the granting of beatification will be given out by the Pope personally. The Vatican will no longer stand more shameful examples like the wrongful beatification of [saint_person.GetDynName] in its name.

Now only the truly pious followers of [GetJesus] will be granted the reverence of the faith.
Finally an end to the farce.

[saint_person.GetDynName]恪守着[saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName]所许的戒律，走完了自己虔信的一生。[saint_person.GetSheHeCap]于[saint_person.GetDeathDate]升入天堂。人们众说纷纭，讨论[saint_person.GetSheHe]是否称得上是一个真正的[saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName]。

教宗大人为[saint_person.GetFirstName]举行了隆重的仪式，来缅怀[saint_person.GetSheHe]的一生。作为一位[saint_person.Religion.GetName]的真正楷模，[saint_person.GetHerHis]名字将被教宗铭写位列于那些虔诚的[saint_person.Religion.GetGroupName]先圣之后。

于其生也，其为信仰之堡垒；于其没也，其为举世之楷模。[saint_person.GetHerHis]一生为神所眷顾，而最终回到了[saint_person.Religion.GetHighGodName]的怀抱。
