This is the character who the Pope wants to grant the Crusader Kingdom, should the Crusade be successful. If no character is chosen, it means the Pope has no preference and the Beneficiary of the top contributor will be chosen to rule the Crusader Kingdom.
这是十字军的目标角色和王国。教宗根据对于信仰的重要性选择目标，而且会经常在进行遥远的冒险之前优先选择守护信仰故土。

The War Chest symbolizes both wealth collected in preparation for the crusade, and any spoils of war gathered during the Crusade. At the start of the crusade, a portion of the wealth in the War Chest will be divided between the Pledged Crusaders to support their levies. At the end of a successful Crusade any wealth, piety, prestige and any artifacts remaining in the War Chest will be divided between the Pledged Crusaders, with the largest share of the spoils going to the ones who contributed the most (up to a limit).
These characters are pledged to participate in the Crusade when it starts.
Click to show the Pledged Participants of the other side of the Crusade.

This is the character you have chosen as your beneficiary. A beneficiary might be made into a ruler in the Crusader Kingdom, should the war be successful. Having a beneficiary in a Crusader Kingdom will convey a piety bonus to your entire dynasty.
This is the comparative military strength of this side in the Crusade, in relation to the other side. The higher the strength of your side, the more likely you are to win the war.

No absurd events may appear during the game.

Do not ruin this place - I have other plans for it.
[baltic.GetGroupName]战士们汇聚于此相互搏击来锻炼他们的力量。
来自大草原的恐怖的弓骑兵在此训练。这些骑手比他们的敌人拥有更高的机动力，他们是有史以来最棒的战士之一。
异乡勇士是优秀的重步兵，他们以坚强的防御力而著称。
英格兰和威尔士悠久的弓箭传统造就了大量的长弓手。在此他们可训练他们强弓技巧。
悠久的弓箭传统造就了大量的长弓手。在此他们可训练他们强弓技巧。
这里是征召训练精英[GetMoorish]骑兵的地方。[GetMoors]拥有悠久的骑兵训练历史，这些骑兵是世界上最棒的骑兵，他们装备着长矛、剑、以及弓箭、这使得他们具备了极高的战略灵活性。
[combatant_2.GetFirstName]'s attacks were vicious and unrelenting, leaving [combatant_1.GetFirstName] severely injured...
In the duel [combatant_1.GetFirstName] suffered some minor injuries, but I am sure they will only serve to build character!
Fortunately, [combatant_1.GetFirstName] got away without any significant injuries.

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick], a [combatant_1.GetSocietyRank] in my lodge, is [combatant_1.GetNegativeDuelSkillTerm] duelist at best. It is shameful for someone like [combatant_1.GetHerHim] to be so woefully unready should [Root.Society.GetName] call upon [combatant_1.GetHerHis] aid! Perhaps I should encourage [combatant_1.GetHerHim] to spar with another member?
[combatant_1.GetSheHeCap] needs confidence - [society_practice_duelist_target_1.GetFirstName] should be an easy match.
The best teacher is failure, [society_practice_duelist_target_3.GetFirstName] is the [society_practice_duelist_target_3.GetManWoman] for the job!
No, [combatant_1.GetFirstName] needs to take the initiative [combatant_1.GetHerselfHimself]...

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] managed to best [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] handily after a short clash. A cheering crowd heaved [combatant_1.GetFirstName] up on their shoulders after the victory, hoisting [combatant_1.GetHerHim] over to the lodge to celebrate. [combatant_1.GetSheHeCap] will become a renowned warrior yet...
[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] was soundly beaten down by [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick], who barely broke a sweat. [combatant_1.GetHowWoundedDidIBecome]

Just as [combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] was about to issue [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] a challenge, [combatant_2.GetFirstName] ran away! I wonder what kind of attitudes we really foster here in [Root.Society.GetName], because this is embarrasing for all of us...

Just as [combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] was about to issue [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] a challenge, [combatant_1.GetSheHe] ran away! What a coward, I have never seen anyone as craven before!

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] and [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] fought each other with teeth and claw! A cheering crowd formed around the combatants, and [combatant_1.GetFirstName] eventually won their favor. [combatant_1.GetHowWoundedDidIBecome]

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] and [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] fought each other with teeth and claw! A crowd formed around the combatants, jeering at [combatant_1.GetFirstName]'s clumsy moves until [combatant_1.GetSheHe] eventually lost. [combatant_1.GetHowWoundedDidIBecome]
[combatant_1.GetFirstName] thought [combatant_1.GetSheHe] was going to die, and blames me for it!
§Y[combatant_1.GetFirstName]§! is likely to win, but will [combatant_1.GetSheHe] appreciate my choice?
Either §Y[combatant_1.GetFirstName]§! or §Y[society_practice_duelist_target_2.GetFirstName]§! could win, this will be an even fight.
§Y[combatant_1.GetFirstName]§! will without a doubt be beaten bloody - effective, but perhaps a bit harsh?
A fellow member of [Root.Society.GetName], §Y[lodge_member_killed.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!, has been killed in a duel by §Y[lodge_member_killer.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!!

The fearless warriors of the Jaguar order are trained here. They represent the elite of the [nahuatl.GetName] war machine and entire armies have been known to rout at the mere sight of the spotted fur covering their armor.

The ruling dynasty of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been overthrown by the zealous and hard-living tribesmen of the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty. Their decadent [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] has been toppled, freeing any vassals from their bondage to the unworthy [FromFrom.GetTitle]. With the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetTier] gone, time will tell if a worthy dynasty will be up to the task of restoring authority to the region.
Family Member was made a Saint

I feel the power of [GetWarriorLodgeSymbol] flowing through my veins, as I snarl at the enemy commander, visibly startling [enemy_commander.GetHerHim]. "Surrender!" [enemy_commander.GetSheHe] shouts. "I am [enemy_commander.GetBestName], and-" The [enemy_commander.GetManWoman]'s words are cut short by my weapon [GetWeaponSwinging] through [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] throat.
Haha! I will mount your head on my [Root.GetCapitalHolding] walls!

There are some discolored stains to this skull, reminding anyone of the brutality its once owner suffered. They say [enemy_commander.GetBestName] had [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] head cut off completely, before [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decided to bring it home from the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName].

Rather ornate, this drinking cup is clearly made of unusual material. Once a modest trophy, one might notice that the bone of the skull has been finely polished, set in an sturdy fixture, and decorated with precious stones.

My commander [home_commander.GetBestName] has been reported to perform impressively [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName]. Most recently, rumor has it that [home_commander.GetSheHe] ruthlessly decapitated an enemy commander, before immediately [home_commander.GetRidingMarching] onwards, to face [home_commander.GetHerHis] next foe.
I think a reward is in order!

My [home_liege.GetRootRelation] [home_liege.GetTitledFirstName] is apparently thoroughly impressed by my battle technique. A missive I have received speaks at length about my bravery, and of people telling stories about the decapitation of [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] for years to come.

I am staring down the [home_commander.GetEnemySoldierDesc] enemy commander, trying to gauge what on earth [home_commander.GetHerHis] armor actually consists of. Are those... rat pelts? My thoughts begin to trail off and I proceed to demand [home_commander.GetHerHis] surrender. But then suddenly the world is spinning, and someone shouts: "Dodge for the flying head!".

My commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] has been slain [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName]. "Decapitated, my [Root.GetLordLady]", the courier says, shuddering. "It was [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], from [home_commander.Society.GetName]", he continues, averting my eyes.
And you just left [enemy_commander.GetHerHim] in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]?!
Aaargh! I will personally take care of that brute.
这个选项可用是因为你是§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!的成员。

[From.GetBestName] did not appreciate the fate [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] met with at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], and has sworn to take matters into [From.GetHerHis] own hands. All this fuss over head on a pike?

[From.GetBestName] must not have heard how I refused to take the head of my enemy as a trophy, because I am told that the [From.GetManWoman] has sworn to take vengeance on me, for the fate [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] met with at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName].
Even though I left [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] skull in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]?

在我们去[battlefield_location.Capital.GetName]的[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]的路上，一块巨石挡住了我们的路。在[GetRidingMarching]数日之后，我的肌肉因为这个难事十分酸痛。“你，过来！”我向一个手里拿着比[Root.GetHerHis]手大得多的[Root.GetBoyGirl]大喊。“把那个锤子递给我。”
Let's do something about this rock.
You let your fellow commander deal with the road block.\n

On our way through the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], a gigantic boulder blocks our path. Commander [From.GetTitledFirstName] is arguing at length with [From.GetHerHis] officers about whether we should try [GetRidingMarching] around the river crossing or not, when suddenly I hear them shouting my name, gesturing in my direction with a huge hammer.
终于！让我们对这块石头做点什么。

[my_fellow_commander.GetTitledFirstName]是一个好战的指挥官，用[GetRandomMythologicalCreature]的力量与敌人战斗。虽然没人在数数，但是我发现我在想到底有多少个敌人被[my_fellow_commander.GetSheHe]单枪匹马的击倒了。。。「为我留几个，好么？」我穿过[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]大喊道。
Pssh, what a show-off! It's not that hard!
当我[GetWeaponSwinging]者武器在敌阵左突右冲时，指挥官[From.GetTitledFirstName]一直越过[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]扫视着我。当我对这种监事感到不舒服的时候，[From.GetSheHe]对我大喊道：「给我留几个，好么？」
没什么比早晨流点血更好的了！
哈哈，当然！啊，这太令人兴奋了！
篝火的柔和灯光下很容易产生怀念。昨晚，一个热情的士兵给我们讲了关于一场战斗的扣人心弦的故事，这场战斗夺去了我的[target.GetRootRelation]，[target.GetBestName]的生命。当我今天[GetRidingMarching]进入战场时，往昔岁月激发了我的决心。
在篝火旁我的人经常谈论古老的英雄。昨晚，他们中的一个给了我们讲了一个关于战斗的精彩故事，这场战斗夺去了 [target.GetBestName]的生命。我从来没有想过这件事，但是[GetRidingMarching] 进入战场上，我发现这个如是在我心头挥之不去。
很久以前，当一支部队的指挥官让我感觉很好。今天，在等待伏击时，一名紧张的军官承认，有一段时间，关于我的指挥的故事传遍了[home_capital_province.GetName]。「这使我发誓要加入[Root.Culture.GetName]军队，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」， [Root.GetSheHe]喃喃自语道。
我记得在[home_capital_province.GetName]时听到的关于[target.GetBestName]的指挥和领导的故事。「榜样是很重要的」，我当时说。今天，我看着我的部队，感谢在我之前的所有伟大领袖。
你是说*我*是你成为一个士兵的原因……？
「不，我不把敌人的头盖骨当酒杯使」我笑道，当我在战场上斩下一个敌人的头颅时一个好奇的新兵问了我一个问题。[GetSkullTrophyComment]
[target.GetTitledFirstName]会不会把[target.GetHerHis]敌人的头盖骨当碗使?我重复道。新兵点了点头，我大笑起来，搂着[Root.GetHerHim] 不怀好意的说道：「当然，在的[home_capital_province.Capital.GetName]家中有一个密室，在那 [target.GetSheHe]都用他们的鲜血洗澡」。新兵脸色煞白。
你永远不会让这个故事消失，是吗？
你听说过关于[target.GetFirstName]和马的事情了么。。。？
「但这不是一个坏主意！我喜欢你的谦逊，[Root.GetBoyGirl]」我说道，拍了拍[Root.GetHerHim]的背。
「我甚至不把头盖骨带在身上！说实话，你想太多了，士兵」我说道，拍了拍[Root.GetHerHim]的背。
This character is riding on a wave of glorious battles, long gone by.
这个角色充满自豪感和责任感。
这民角色喜欢被人注意的感觉。
“我是[GetWarriorLodgeSymbol]的一员”，我发现我自己随着我挥动[GetDuelWeapon]吟唱起来。“为了[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]！”我咆哮道，我的武器[GetWeaponSwinging]任何敢挡在我征途之人。尸体和鲜血充满了[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]，我不断地发出我的战嚎，淹没在一条死亡之河中。
啊，我面前的骨头和意志破裂的声音……振奋精神！

我正[battlefield_location.GetThroughOver][battlefield_location.GetTerrain]追击[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName],这时[commander_to_the_rescue.GetTitledFirstName]把我推到一边，大喊道「这个是我的，我的 [Root.GetLordLady]！」，[commander_to_the_rescue.GetClumsilyElegantly]挥舞着[commander_to_the_rescue.GetHerHis][commander_to_the_rescue.GetDuelWeapon]……
我猜我的[commander_to_the_rescue.GetRootRelation]想给我留下一个深刻印象……？

[home_commander.GetTitledFirstName] is reported to have been chasing down [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] [battlefield_location.GetThroughOver] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], when my commander [commander_to_the_rescue.GetTitledFirstName] decided to intervene, [commander_to_the_rescue.GetBattleRescueDesc]
熟练地击败敌人指挥官，把[enemy_commander.GetHerHis]鲜血涂撒战场！
完全扰乱战斗进程并且使[This.GetHerselfHimself]在这一过程中受伤。
财富并不总是有利于忠诚。
财富并不总是有利于勇敢。
在这种情况下，我是你的刽子手。
敌人指挥官[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]没有公平对决，并使我完全陷入对抗一道[battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence]的困境中。在[other_combatant.GetHerHim]后面，一队[other_combatant.GetHerHis]士兵正在靠近。他们嘲笑挖苦着我，渴望着鲜血……
敌人指挥官[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]越来越精准地挥舞[other_combatant.GetHerHis][other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]，我开始觉得我会死在这，[battlefield_location.GetInOn][battlefield_location.GetTerrain]。
我不能相信正在发生的事，但是随着[other_combatant.GetHerHis]每一次挥动[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]，[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]越来越接近战斗的胜利。向后一跳来躲避有一个可怕的攻击，我发现我自己已经背靠着一堵[battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence]。
等……等等，我投降！俘虏我吧！
据说这个角色在战场上出卖了一个盟友……！
当[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]追上我时，[other_combatant.GetSheHe]似乎是想与我来场公平对决。「只有你和我！」[other_combatant.GetManWoman]宣布道，剑举得高高的。我的人很快跟我一起把这个蠢货打倒了。
我越来越精确地挥舞着我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]，但我不确定敌方指挥官[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]意识到[other_combatant.GetSheHe]在这个战场上离死亡越来越近了，直到我对[other_combatant.GetHerHis]头骨发出致命一击，听到它裂开的声音。
这很令人惊讶，但我每次挥舞我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]时，[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]都似乎更加难以控制[other_combatant.GetHerHis]站姿。总之，接近结束了，但我最后我对[other_combatant.GetHerHis]太阳穴使出了幸运的一击……
「我投降！」[From.GetTitledFirstName]喊道。汗水滴在我的额头上，我高举着我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]，即将对我的敌人展开致命一击。「你要干嘛？！」我问道。[From.GetManWoman]跪下[From.GetHerHis]膝盖。「我投降！我活着会对你有更大帮助」[From.GetSheHe]哭着说道。
「等……等等！我投降」[From.GetTitledFirstName]哭道。我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]举的高高的，我减缓了即将对我的敌人的致命打击。[From.GetManWoman]向后退，差点被[From.GetHerselfHimself]绊倒「我会成为你的囚犯！饶了我吧！」[From.GetSheHe]啜泣道。
在激烈的战斗中，我的指挥官[From.GetTitledName]在[From.GetHerHim]和[FromFrom.GetBestName]的一对一决斗中被杀。据说[From.GetTitledFirstName]试图投降，但没有用。
在战斗中，我注意到了一个与我穿同样颜色衣服的[my_dear.GetBoyGirl]。[my_dear.GetSheHe]被击倒时，我恰好注意到[my_dear.GetHerHis]脸上凶悍的表情时。我感到一阵愧疚，意识到[my_dear.GetSheHe]是多么的让我想念我的[my_dear.GetRootRelation][my_dear.GetFirstName]。

战斗时我看到一个看起来像我[my_dear.GetRootRelation][my_dear.GetTitledFirstName]的[my_dear.GetFaceDescription][my_dear.GetManWoman]。之后[my_dear.GetSheHe]被击倒了。我突然把士兵们推开，冲向我看到[my_dear.GetHerHim]摔倒的地方，我知道那个不是[my_dear.GetFirstName]，但我就是控制不止我自己……！
我们必须记住照顾我们的伤员。
作为§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!的一员，你可以选择使用内心的力量并摆脱身体上的伤害。
允许§GG右键点击§!你的头像来治疗你身上的伤口
终于，旧的伤口已经愈合，留下了一个奇怪的的的疤痕。在[Root.Location.GetName]旁的[Root.Location.GetTerrain]散步和呼吸新鲜空气正是我需要的！
我开始觉得看我伤口的医生错了。受创的伤口完全愈合了！也许这是光的把戏吧？
旧老伤口终于愈合了，留下了一道很奇怪的疤痕。
我的伤势很严重，但还不足以击倒我。今早醒来后，我挺直了自己的腰，「痛苦是暂时的」我对我的仆人说道，他一脸怀疑的看着我。在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]屈服之前，恶魔还要更加努力。
所有[Root.Society.GetName]的[Root.GetBrotherSister]都知道镇静剂，良好的睡眠和新鲜空气是治疗感染的最好方法。我毫不惊讶的发现，我伤口的难闻气味消失了，留下了一道白色的疤痕。

“来个人给我把斧头！”我咆哮道。当我开始挥舞起来，人群都吸了一口两栖，一些人惊慌失措地尖叫着从我路上跑开。一个勇敢的灵魂，[kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName]，走到我面前接受了挑战。当我们事毕之后，我们发自内心的笑了起来。“我喜欢你的狂野，[Root.GetBrotherSister]！”[kinslayer_target.GetSheHe]说道，一边擦着[kinslayer_target.GetHerHis]额头上的汗水。

“来个人给我把斧头！现在！”向着我们找到的最近的士兵咆哮道。在我的眼角余光中，我看见我的[kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation][kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName]正在看着我。当我开始挥舞起武器，紧迫的战斗充实着我。我发现我在笑，发自内心的欢笑。[kinslayer_target.GetFirstName]也在笑，人群开始为我加油。

“给我你的斧头！现在！”我向新兵们咆哮道。年轻的[Root.GetBoyGirl]遵守了我的命令，当我开始挥舞起武器，周围的人群都吸了一口凉气，一些人赶紧让出了我的道路。“[Root.GetFirstName]，你在干什么？”我的[kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation][kinslayer_target.GetFirstName]绝望地叫喊着，抓着[kinslayer_target.GetHerHis]染血的外套。
啊，我将是我敌人的灾难。
啊，[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]！你是我新获得的力量的小小牺牲！
我刚刚……该死，谁能帮我出去！
[From.GetTitledFirstName]显然直冲过[From.GetHerHis][From.GetCapitalHolding]，而我可怜的[kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation][kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName]陷入了多面攻击中！
我不会让这种侮辱得逞！

我正研究[target_title.GetName]地图时，[giving_member.GetTitledFirstName]走了过来。一位仆从察觉到[giving_member.GetHerHis]到来，于是提醒了我。刚一抬头，我就看到他们带着一些包得严严实实的东西。也没有没有多余的寒暄，[giving_member.GetManWoman]上前说道，“希望这能在迫在眉睫的战事中帮上忙”。

太棒了，这是一个绝好的机会！
我宁愿专注于我的个人训练。

为了打消[fellow_member.GetHerHis]那些对于进入[target_title.GetName]冒险的顾虑，我带[fellow_hero_1.GetTitledFirstName]参观了我收藏的战利品。“看来……你收集了不少头颅”，[fellow_hero_1.GetManWoman]评价道，然后[fellow_member.GetHerselfHimself]又话锋一转：“噢，但这一个拿来喝酒一定很不错！”

你派你最好的工匠重新设计旧奖杯。\n
事实上，盯着它空洞的双眼着实给了我极大的慰藉。

A treasured trophy of [OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]'s, the [Root.Society.GetName] had this weapon sharpened, before [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s adventurous journey to [target_title.GetName].

This one looks too big for me...

Having spent the evening drinking and talking around the campfire with my traveling companions, I finally bid them good night. On my way back to my sleeping spot, I pause. Nearby, leaning against a [target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence], is a [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] tending to nature's call. "An enemy!" I yell, more surprised than alarmed.

Walking through the streets of a village in [target_ruler.Capital.GetName], the locals seem eager to point out how foreign I am. "Go home!" one [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] barks.
You want to say that to my face? Let's fight!
This one looks too big for me...

Having turned in for the night, I find myself wide awake listening to the snoring of [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]. Just as I am about to get up and do something about my irritation, I hear a rustling in the bushes. Before I can get to my feet, I find a [my_duel_target.GetManWoman] leaning over me, eying me suspiciously, a weapon aimed at my throat.
You come armed, I see... How about we do this one on one?
You challenge the scout to a duel, and the two of you meet on a moonlit field.\n

[fellow_member.GetFirstName] fishes a coin from [fellow_member.GetHerHis] pockets, rewarding the urchin for the information. Walking through the streets of a village in [target_ruler.Capital.GetName], the locals seem eager to point out how foreign I am. They have clearly never seen a [Root.GetManWoman] like I before, and while some are adoring my armor and confident stride, it does not take long before I encounter open hostility. [From.GetTitledName] has perished during [From.GetHerHis] adventurous journey through foreign lands. Everyone who fought alongside [From.GetHerHim] know that [From.GetSheHe] died a warrior.

The [target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal] dead on the ground, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] braces for my attack. I call out: "For [Root.Society.GetName]!", my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] swooshing, nay, singing through the air. With the trees as our audience, and only witness to my deed, I have soon seen to [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

Albeit under the influence, the battle stance comes naturally to me. My opponent staggers backwards in surprise, almost tripping over the [target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence]. Before [other_combatant.GetSheHe] has time to catch up, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].

I draw my weapon, without hesitation. The crowd scatters around us and my opponent and I fall into circling one another. The ensuing fight is more even than I care to admit. At the end, I am sending a quiet prayer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], as I take in the cheers of our audience, and slam my weapon against [other_combatant.GetHerHis] head.

As soon as the camp is out of earshot, my opponent draws [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon. Wind moves over the moonlit meadow, the grass bending in waves, causing it look as if the ground itself is breathing, under our feet. "This is too easy", I murmur. Then I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow].

[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] motions for people to get out of the way, just before [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] lunges at me, indignity on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] face. I parry immediately, defending myself well, judging by the excited cheers of our spectators. At the end of it all, the crowd has grown still, the streets flowing with the blood of their [other_combatant.Culture.GetName] warrior.
My opponent seems to be getting tired, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves becoming slower. Strengthened by the cheers of the crowd, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].

Charging into the glade, I am itching for a fight. My opponent simply waits, one hand resting on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]. I draw closer, thinking this is going to be fun! The [target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal] dead on the ground, I raise my own weapon, about to let out my battle cry. Then I hear the desperate roar of the animal behind me and then... nothing.

You must be lost! I proclaim, drawing my weapon. I sway a little, internally cursing the alcohol in my veins. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman]'s face darkens, and I swallow. A scout! A spy? My mind races. "Your liege knows we are here then?" I demand to know, but my opponent has already slashed my guts open. "You heathen drunk", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] mutters.

You want me to DUEL you?, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] mocks, rolling [other_combatant.GetHerHis] eyes. The next thing I know, I am under a furious flurry of attacks, only barely keeping up with my opponent. A young girl screams as I collapse into the crowd, bloody and unable to stand any longer. "Inform [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName], that the heathen troll is dead", is the last thing I hear.

I hear birds. It must be dawn, I think to myself. Why does my face feel cold, my limbs frozen...? Tensing, I cannot move. What happened? We fought on a meadow, the moon was guiding me, and... I fell. That blasted scout skewered me, with [other_combatant.GetHerHis] sword. Oh [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], welcome me to your side...

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] seems to be flying towards me, swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon vigorously. [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] pulls a small child out of our way, and yells for the crowd to step back. My opponent's technique appears more focused on showmanship than actual swordplay, and I find myself drawn in by the spectacle. Then suddenly, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon sinks into my chest.
You make progress on your legendary journey\n

everyone seems happy to have you back. A lot of them ask what you are going to do next. "Surely, you still have things to do?"
your servants and household members trip over themselves to greet you, the victorious warrior returned.
warriors and commoners alike swoon when they see you - one [Root.GetManWomanOpp] actually faints as you ride by with your entourage.
I am just happy to have you home, my [Root.GetLordLady].
I have the impression you have some rumors to explain, my [Root.GetLordLady]. [my_beloved.GetSheHeCap] smirks, adding: "Or to embellish, I suppose".

The bards will sing of your accomplishments for generations to come! They say you took down an army of a hundred men and wild [target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal]s?! We received news that some of you were taken captive and... The [my_beloved.GetManWoman]'s words trail off, and [my_beloved.GetSheHe] composes [my_beloved.GetHerselfHimself].\n"My [Root.GetLordLady]: welcome home."

[From.GetTitledName], your [From.GetRootRelation], has left this earthly realm, but tales of [From.GetHerHis] adventures are all around us. The memory of the [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] warrior-[From.GetManWoman] is sure to live on, if not in the hearts of [From.GetHerHis] companions, so in the blood of [From.GetHerHis] family.\n\nA hero has left us.

They say that everyone in the [From.GetCapitalHolding] of [From.Capital.GetName] spent several moons preparing for the return of [From.GetTitledName]. The [From.GetManWoman] has been the main source of interest and fascinating rumor since even before [From.GetSheHe] left for [target_title.GetName], but reports all agree that the pomp is well deserved. As [From.Society.GetName] celebrate this warrior's victory, we pray that our young find this living legend an ideal worthy of emulating.
May we all share in [From.GetHerHis] glory.

Having wreaked havoc in the realm of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the warrior scoundrel [bloodline_founder.GetTitledName] has been carving a name for [bloodline_founder.GetHerselfHimself] in blood. Our records will remember that [bloodline_founder.GetSheHe] and [bloodline_founder.GetHerHis] band of warriors have taken great pleasure in cutting their way through our countryside, fighting any willing man or woman who dared stand in their way, leaving traumatized children and devastated villagers in their wake...

Wings brushing my shoulder, dark eyes trusting me. I... I must have been dreaming about hunting with my eagle. "My [Root.GetLordLady]! I tried to stop it, but it just flew in through the [Root.GetChamberOpening]!", an embarrassed servant blurts as I rub my eyes, realizing I can still hear the gentle cawing of a bird.
What do we have here? A new friend?
You will care for the young bird.
You get the feeling that §Y[bloodline_founder.GetTitledFirstName]§! would approve of you caring for the young bird.

Training with my soldiers, I find myself distracted by an excited barking from the barracks. "What *is* that noise?", I finally demand to know. My sparring partner lowers [Root.GetHerHis] weapon and clears [Root.GetHerHis] throat: "It was going to be a surprise, my [Root.GetLordLady], but we got a new puppy..."
I... I *have* been missing a companion...
You will care for the dog.
You get the feeling that §Y[bloodline_founder.GetTitledFirstName]§! would approve of you caring for the dog.
Do I look like I have time to raise another dog? Come on, raise your weapon!
Someone else will care for the animal.

From playing its favorite games in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], to warming my feet in the winter, my trusted war hound has taken its last breaths. "I will... Leave you alone with [Root.GetDogName], [Root.GetMasterMistress]" a servant says, wiping a tear from her face.
It was an honor to serve with you, friend.
Perhaps you will get a new dog. One day.

This character is famous for their combat prowess and warrior's blood they carry in their veins. Their presence alone has people swooning.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] traveled far into foreign lands, fighting [This.GetHerHis] way through the best warriors of [This.GetHerHis] time. The [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] [This.Founder.GetManWoman] was rumored to have a supernatural affinity with birds.

A highly respected [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole] within [This.Founder.GetHerHis] society, this [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] [This.Founder.GetManWoman] was rumored to often have been charging into battle surrounded by war hounds.

A particularly resilient [This.Founder.GetManWoman], [This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] proved [This.Founder.GetHerselfHimself] one of the finest [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]s of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] time.
作为一名为人称道的[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]和将领，[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]在[This.Founder.GetHerHim]富有传奇色彩的对外征服中赢得了热烈的拥护和支持。

This [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] [This.Founder.GetEducationRole] made a name for [This.Founder.GetHerselfHimself] fighting for [This.Founder.Society.GetName] and spreading the way of the [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole] to all who would dare challenge [This.Founder.GetHerHim].
随时枕戈待旦，[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]因为[This.Founder.GetHerHis]常胜不败而为人称道，成为了[This.Founder.Society.GetName]有史以来最优秀的[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]。
有传言称其曾高歌着奔赴战场，[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]仿佛是一位超脱其时的[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]。而[This.Founder.GetHerHis]事迹必然将为后人传唱，激励代代人成就伟功。

[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] was known as the [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] leader of [This.Founder.Society.GetName] – the mention of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] courage still lights a fire in many [This.Founder.Culture.GetName] soldiers.

[This.Founder.GetFirstName] was both feared and respected, not only for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] combat prowess, but for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] relentless courage. For years to come, [This.Founder.GetHerHisCap] name alone held power over [This.Founder.GetHerHis] enemies.

[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] was well respected within [This.Founder.Society.GetName], known for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] strategy and skill in battle, inspiring other [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]s for years to come.

My [Root.GetLordLady]!, the [Root.GetWarriorRole] struggling next to me shouts. "We have to do something about these [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] soldiers! They are gaining on us!".\n"What do you expect me to do?" I shout back over the turmoil of battle.
Clang your swords together! To the rhythm of BLOOD!
This character is known to inspire [Root.GetHerHis] companions on the battlefield, singing songs of triumph even before the battle is won.
This character is known to intimidate [Root.GetHerHis] enemies from a distance, rhythmically chanting threats of destruction upon entering a battle.
I must survive, so I can compose a ballad of my trials!
Let me sing you the one about the idiot [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName]...!
Ooh, insults? I know a song, mocking [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName].
Through clenched jaws, you begin humming a familiar tune, throwing your enemy off completely...!\n
Hah! I will try to remember that one, for my next battle chant!
You run away, abandoning your fellow soldiers, and leaving behind a confused enemy.\n
*gulp* Wait! Have you heard the one about the [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] [enemy_liege.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]?
You attempt to talk your way out the situation. It is not entirely successful.\n
Come to hear me sing, have you?
You begin shouting a hymn of battle, the soldiers next to picking up the tune, just as you practiced...!\n
因为你的§Y血脉§!该选项是可行的
拥有一条§Y传奇血脉§!将会在§Y战士公会§!中倍受欢迎
Characters are NOT busy, or fighting a war

The Wolf Warriors consist of ferocious men and women fighting for honor and recognition on the battlefield, as well as an ideal of bravery and companionship. In honor of [norse_pagan.GetHighGodName], they wear their pelts into battle, and favor the spear.

The Eagle Hearts carry on the ancient tradition of training and hunting with birds, the most prestigious type being the golden eagle. The hunters, also known as 'berkutchi', are said to only need three things in life: a fast horse, a faithful dog, and an eagle.

Hunters and warriors alike look to [baltic_pagan.GetHighGodName], as the guardian of the woods. Most fighters wear animal pelts for its connection to the wilderness, and they worship trees, as the roots are seen as connected to [baltic_pagan.GetHighGodName]. At the end of the day,the Forest Walkers have but one calling: to protect the forest, the ancestral home and legacy of their ancestors.

The [finnish_pagan.GetName] do not even utter the name of the sacred animal, but draw strength from worshiping the bear, calling it 'the King and Queen of the Forest'. After hunting one, a complex ritual must take place, wherein the bear is convinced that it was not slain, but died due to fault of its own, so that its hunters may don themselves in its fur.

The members of the Silver Arrowheads worship the thundering skies, and strive to uphold an ideal of honor, guarding their fellow men and women from wrongdoing. Their families are known to hang protective symbols of arrows and bolts by their houses, to grant their heroes luck on the battlefield and shield them from storms.

Occasionally spotted leaving offerings in the water, the Rain Runners fight and train in the name of [west_african_pagan.GetHighGodName]. When charging into battle, they wear blue and are known to carry small fetish symbols close to their heart.

The Zun always watching, the Keepers of the Flame vow to be a strong as their scorching god in the sky. Spending long hours training and practicing with each other, clad in the colors of flame, they are known for their cool determination on the battlefield.

The sun always watching, the Fire Dancers vow to be a strong as the scorching being in the sky. Spending long hours training and practicing with each other, they are often clad in the colors of flame. Many admire their usage of fire, during their ceremonial fights.
光明哨兵是围绕在许多苯教寺院附近的战士群体所带来的加成。这些战士遵守的纪律，如他们所居的高原环境一般严酷，他们来自于一个迷信的社群，每次出征前总是要确保举行恰当的仪式和献祭。
光明守护是围绕在许多[bon.GetName]寺院附近的战士群体所带来的加成。这些战士遵守的纪律，如他们所居的高原环境一般严酷，他们来自于一个迷信的社群，每次出征前总是要确保举行恰当的仪式和献祭。

The Mountain Guardians train hard and maintain an expert physique, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport – participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
A commander named §Y[invited_character.GetBestName]§! joins your court, ready for service.
战士公会的成员经常进行自由搏击，作为一种训练与消遣的方式。但如果没有他人的注意，就不必为其后果负责……

It is important to occasionally test one's mettle and prove oneself as a warrior. A straight-forward way is to seek out enemies and deal with them, personally...

To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YDuel§! them. The winner will receive the most §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!, while losing and still breathing will mean losing §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!...
A warrior cannot afford to grow idle, in the comfort of their home! Spreading one's name, as well as domain, is a clear path to glory.

To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of the top holder of your target province and choose to §YDeclare War§!, using §YConquest of [From.Location.GetName]§!. The outcome of the war will affect the §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§! gained.

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] eyes me up and down, first skeptically, but then [hero_character.GetHerHis] posture relaxes. "Say, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Are you related to [founder_target.GetTitledFirstName]?". I nod, smiling. "That [founder_target.GetManWoman] is a legend!" [hero_character.GetSheHe] laughs. "I look forward to seeing you in action", [hero_character.GetSheHe] adds, squeezing my shoulder.
Legendary or not, I'm itching for a duel, my [hero_character.GetLordLady].

[From.GetTitledName] has volunteered as my opponent. I am uncertain what [From.GetSheHe] thinks of my lineage, and judging from the whispers surrounding us as we shake hands, so is [From.GetSheHe]... "Best of luck to you both!" [hero_character.GetBestName] says, shooting [From.GetFirstName] a reassuring glance. I let go of [From.GetManWoman]'s grip, noticing the sweat of [From.GetHerHis] hand.

在同一窗口下，您可以查看属性和特质。\n\n在同时，角色还可拥有一个代表短期目标的野心。辛苦达成野心后自然有奖励，比如一些威望或虔诚。点击「选择野心」按钮，选择一个野心。
阴谋败露了，我应该停止监视§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledName]§!
目标[Root.GetBaseName]的[From.Religion.GetCrusadeName]目标[New.GetTitledName]的战争由于[New.GetTitledName]皈依[From.Religion.GetGroupName]信仰而结束。[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]必然无比满意！

Whispers in the East claim that [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName] is in a joyous mood as the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] claimant, [invasion_of_china_claimant.GetBestName], has died.\n[invasion_of_china_claimant.GetHerHisCap] death has shattered the morale of the [From.Culture.GetName] forces who now retreat back to their homes in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nJust like [invasion_of_china_claimant.GetBestName] this invasion of [offmap_china.GetShortName] has come to an end.

[papal_attacker.GetTitledName]已经向[From.GetTitledName]宣战。他指控现任教宗是一个不虔诚的[papal_attacker.Religion.GetName]领袖，而[papal_attacker.GetTitledName]认为如果[From.Religion.GetGroupName]能够归位，圣座将重新换发光辉。\n\n[papal_attacker.GetSheHeCap]正带着[papal_attacker.GetHerHis]人马从[papal_attacker.Capital.GetName]出发朝[From.Capital.GetName]进军，目标是罢免这位不虔诚的[From.GetTitledName]并使得罗马主教们转而支持一位更加适合的领袖。随着这场质疑谁能够领导[From.Religion.GetName]世界的战争的爆发，每个人甚至是孩子都将不得不选择他们要支持的一方。
我有更重要的事情要做。
我们将守卫我们的信仰免受不公！
我希望[Root.Liege.GetTitledName]将选择正确的一方。

After the whole [ThePope.Religion.GetName] world has been through the turmoil of the fighting between the two sides, the Pope finally surrenders to [From.GetTitledName].

With the rise of the new [ThePope.GetTitledName], the church move past this dark chapter of its history and can once more become the beating religious heart of the [ThePope.Religion.GetGroupName] world.

[From.GetTitledName] and all those who joined [From.GetHerHim] in the fight against the old Pope are personally thanked by [ThePope.GetTitledName] for defending the faith.
But I preferred the old Pope...

After the whole [ThePope.Religion.GetName] world has been through the turmoil of the fighting between the two sides, [From.GetTitledName] finally surrenders to [ThePope.GetTitledName].

With the fall of the coalition who fought to restore the Holy See to its former glory, there is nothing that stands in the way of the continued impious attitude of [ThePope.GetTitledName].

[ThePope.GetTitledName] happily celebrates this victory over [ThePope.GetHerHis] opponents, and excommunicates all of them. The rest of the world is watching in horror, as the farce continues.
We will overthrow this fake Pope!
Maybe I should be more like [saint_person.GetTitledName]?

The last days have been filled with arguments back and forth. No matter what I try to tell [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetFirstName], it always ends up leading into another conflict.\n\nI wake up to my men searching all of [Root.Capital.GetName] for [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim]. It seems [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] has left in the middle of the night, and fled the city. Though we surely have had our disagreements, I did not expect [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] to simply run away.
Maybe I should not have said all those things...

I am strolling through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName] when I notice the throngs of people rushing down to the harbor. Somewhat curious what might have happened, I tell my retainers we will make our way down there as well.

A grand ship unlike any I have ever seen is docked by the port, several [From.Culture.GetGroupName] flags hanging from the masts. I can see several guards rushing about the deck, as they are helping someone off the boat. As the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.Capital.GetName], it is only right that I am the one to greet them.

An impressive looking [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitle] makes [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHis] way off the ship, instantly locking eyes with me. With a smile, [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] takes my hand and says "My [Root.GetLordLady], I need your help."

It has been some time since [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] came to my court, and it has certainly been quite the experience having [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] around. However, today [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHe] came to talk to me about putting [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetHerHim] on the throne of Byzantium.\n\n"My dear [Root.GetLordLady], I know you have had your disagreements with the Empire. And of course, you would be well paid..." [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetSheHeCap] tells me. With some of the money I would receive from [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName], I could join the ongoing preparations for the Crusade and convince the other members to make this part of our goal.
Let us toast for this deal, my dear friend.
I rather not agitate the Empire.

In a passionate speech [From.GetTitledName] explains how all of us must gather our men to support [fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName] for the throne of [e_byzantium.GetName]. The Emperors of [e_byzantium.GetName] have for a long time looked down upon the rest of us, pretending to be the descendants of the Romans. Now it is time to show them that we can overthrow the false Emperor in their midst as well.\n\nWith the gifts sent by [From.GetTitledName], [From.GetSheHe] has managed to convince the rest of the [From.Religion.GetName] realm to target Constantinople as part of the next Crusade.
下一次§Y十字军§!会对§Y[fourth_crusade_byzantine_emperor.GetTitledName]§!发动攻击，以将§Y[fourth_crusade_byzantine_refugee.GetTitledName]§!扶上皇位。
似乎在大多数人眼中，十字军东征君士坦丁堡的利益已经变得不那么有吸引力了，他们甚至考虑放弃它。也许我应该恢复他们的兴趣？
是的，我答应过我会帮助的。
我想本不应该是这样的。
我们将拿下君士坦丁堡！
我要碾碎你们，无礼的叛徒！

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]再一次来到了十字军的第一线，凭一己之力为信仰带来胜利。作为[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]世界家喻户晓的最忠诚而勇猛的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰者，无论[Root.GetSheHe]走到哪里，[Root.GetSheHe]都饱受尊敬。\n\n[Root.GetTitledName]和[Root.GetHerHis]的家族受到了尊敬，由于他们在危难关头获得[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]胜利的关键性作用，他们的传说和传言将载入史册。毫无疑问[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]的家族成员会继续将丧失的土地带回到我们信仰的怀抱下，继续充当十字军的先锋。
让神圣的十字架点亮我。

“前进！”我叫喊着，一边砍倒有一个冲向我的敌人。“为了[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]！为了胜利！”
某一刻我所有的士兵似乎都被冲散了，我正在为到来敌人的猛攻而咬牙切齿。穿过战场，我可以看见他们的指挥官正冷笑着坐在马上。如果我要死，也要拉上他一起。砍倒一个又一个，我看见当他试图推出战斗却慢慢被卷入时，他的笑容渐渐消失变成了难堪起来。

我看着地上死去的指挥官和他的随从，这时其他地方的战事慢慢结束。“我的[Root.GetLordLady]，您还好吗？”我的一个卫兵跑过来，看着我血淋淋的身体。

[From.GetTitledName]开始筹划以常针对北方异教徒的战役。很长一段时间里，异教徒们都坚定地反抗[From.Religion.GetGroupName]，现在[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定用剑来使他们转信。

北方的野人们开始集结以应对，他们高喊战歌和恶魔仪式，在他们的狂热中不可阻挡。当然，这将导致双方的浴血奋战，因为两者都不会让着对方。

伴随着[From.RelHead.GetTitledName]最后的祝福，条顿军队永远地离开了南方。
也许我可以寻求§Y[d_teutonic_order.GetName]§!的帮助以对付我的异教徒邻居？

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[northern_crusade_potential_target.GetTitledName]是一股难以对付的危险势力，我同意你认为[northern_crusade_potential_target.GetSheHe]需要对付的结论。我的军队已经准备好向[northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective]的土地进军了。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

We are ready to march our troops against [northern_crusade_potential_target.GetTitledName], but we will need monetary support for the campaign.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

I agree [northern_crusade_potential_target.GetTitledName] is a dangerous foe, and we would need a base for our campaigns against the [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName].
Wait, I need to reconsider this.

The Teutonics march towards [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands, to secure it for Christianity. The pagans have had too long to convert peacefully, now they will be taken by the sword.

Their first goal is to take out [northern_crusade_target_character.GetTitledFirstName], the warlord of [northern_crusade_target_character.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]. If they secure [northern_crusade_target_character.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName], they will use it as a base to quell the rest of the [northern_crusade_kingdom_title.GetAdjective] lands.

The blood of the pagans will flow through the rivers of the north, no mercy will be shown.
What will the [From.Religion.GetName]s think of next?

The city of Antioch was originally raised by Seleucus in Alexander's time, and was under [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] control for centuries before the infidel onslaught took control of it. Finally, you have restored the ancient city to its true glory.\n\nWith Antioch back in Christian hands, it is only a matter of time before all of ancient Christendom will be returned. The rest of the world is watching, as I am the forerunner of what is to come.
Watch as I take the Holy Land back.

The island of Cyprus stands at the precipice of the Holy Land, and with its return to the fold of Christianity, the path to the Holy City has once more opened.

I have raised the new banner of Cyprus for the first time, and I look east to the lands of Jerusalem and Antioch. For too long, those lands were controlled by the enemies of the cross, but no more.

This is just the first of many victories. Everything will return to [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] hands.
We will retake the Holy Land, one piece at a time.

For a long time the city of [Root.Capital.GetName] has flourished. Our grasp reaches across the Mediterranean, our traders rich and powerful in their roles.

The Feudal rulers of Europe has looked down upon us for centuries, but it is finally coming to an end as our potential for greatness is undisputed. The time of the old nobility is about to pass, and the mercantile era is beginning with the rise of our merchant class.

Watch, my friends, my rivals, my countrymen, as I show the world the true strength of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

The [From.GetDukeDuchessCap] [From.GetFirstName] of [d_osterreich.GetName] has started calling [From.GetHerselfHimself] the [From.GetArchdukeArchduchessCap] of [k_austria.GetName], and over time it has become normal to accept [From.GetHerHis] superiority over the other princes and princesses of the Empire. In a grand ceremony in [From.Capital.GetName], the title has finally become official.\n\nAs one of the prime electors of the Empire, [From.GetTitledName] has proved [From.GetHerHis] superiority beyond a shadow of a doubt. The other lords and ladies of the Empire have grudgingly accepted it, looking towards [From.Capital.GetName] in envy. They will look for any opportunity to take [From.GetHerHim] down and raise their own positions.

The [From.GetDukeDuchessCap] [From.GetFirstName] of [d_osterreich.GetName] has started calling [From.GetHerselfHimself] the [From.GetArchdukeArchduchessCap] of [k_austria.GetName], and over time it has become normal to accept [From.GetHerHis] superiority over the other princes and princesses of the Empire. In a grand ceremony in [From.Capital.GetName], the title has finally become official.\n\nAs one of the prime [From.GetLadiesLords] of the Empire, [From.GetTitledName] has proved [From.GetHerHis] superiority beyond a shadow of a doubt. The other inferior members of the Empire have grudgingly accepted it, looking towards [From.Capital.GetName] in envy. They will look for any opportunity to take [From.GetHerHim] down and raise their own positions.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered all the [k_bavaria.GetAdjective] and [k_carinthia.GetAdjective] lands in under [From.GetHerHis] rule, and has raised the banner of a new Kingdom of [k_eastern_marches.GetName] to celebrate [From.GetHerHis] victories. This new Kingdom has become the new defacto leader of all the old eastern marches of the Empire.\n\nThis new Kingdom in the Empire is expected to be a power to be reckoned with. The old lands of [k_bavaria.GetName] and [k_carinthia.GetName] were well known for their strength and fortitude, and it is expected the new Kingdom will be all that and more.
确实是令人印象深刻的壮举。

Once more the grand Byzantine banners of Constantinople have been raised. [From.GetDynName] has restored the old crown lands of Byzantium, and the Greek Empire rises from the ashes of defeat, to conquer its old enemies in both the east and the west.

The Eastern Roman Empire suffered defeat after defeat, finally falling to the throng of hostile states at its borders. But like the Rome of old, its enemies could not keep it from growing in power and becoming a relevant actor once more.

The Byzantine Empire is one and indivisible, all hail [From.GetTitledName].
I will serve the true leader of Rome!
Every new beginning comes from some other beginning's end.

Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
It feels me with hope and dedication towards the future, to once more see the Byzantine banners raised. If it would please you, I would do my utmost to serve you in these challenging times to come.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I need to decide where to situate my new Kingdom. The old eastern margravates were all well known and powerful, and my decision will set certain expectations of what to come.
[c_osterreich.GetName] and the old margravate of Austria.
[d_styria.GetName] is well known for its strength.
[k_bavaria.GetName] has always been the center of this region.
[k_carinthia.GetName] has a long fruitful history behind its name.
An End to the Muslim Caliphates

Since the rise of the Prophet in Arabia, the Muslim faith has been a strong independent actor throughout the lands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] put an end to that, and the Muslim faith has been shattered by the latest advances of the [From.Religion.GetName]s.\n\nIn a grand announcement in front of [From.GetHerHis] castle in [From.Capital.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] declared all the infidel faiths dead, and that all the previous believers would be given a choice to convert to the true faith, or fear the [From.Religion.GetName] faith as it would crush them as it did the Muslims. Nowhere is safe from the Crusaders of [e_outremer.GetName].
We have to beware the Christians...

The [d_knights_calatrava.GetName] is the most recent addition to the soldiers of the Cross, founded by the magnanimous [From.GetTitledName]. Working out of the old Moslem castle in Calatrava, they will be one of the vanguards against the dangers to the faith, and make sure the Iberian peninsula never again fall to heathens and infidels.\n\nThough they are willing to follow the orders of [From.GetTitledName] for now, their loyalty lies with [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] first and foremost.
愿他们取得最后的胜利！

This chivalric order owes its name to Santiago Matomoros, the legendary Saint appearing at the battle of Clavijo to help the [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s against the Moslem infidels. The [d_knights_santiago.GetName] was formed by the benevolent [From.GetTitledName] in [From.GetHerHis] bountiful wisdom, and all its members have vowed to protect the pilgrims traveling the Way of Saint James.\n\nBlessed and sponsored by the [From.Religion.GetName] church itself, they will fight at the forefront of the struggles to keep Iberia [From.Religion.GetGroupName].

耶路撒冷的德意志弟兄圣母骑士团在[From.Religion.GetName]教会和[From.GetTitledName]的资助下建立了。条顿骑士团和圣约翰骑士团以及圣殿骑士团类似，主要是为了保护和照料前往圣地的朝圣者。不过只要任何[From.Religion.GetName]愿意为该骑士团支付部队保养费，他们就会为其效劳。\n\n尽管目前他们只为保护朝圣者而战，但在未来将会如何的话题上，骑士团内部业已出现了野心十足的杂音。
The infidels come in many flavors.

一个信差带着一封由梵蒂冈寄出的信找到了我们——这是由教宗阁下亲自写的。[From.GetSheHeCap]要求我们准备好我们的军队做好同异端分子和异教徒战斗的准备，来收复基督教世界沦陷的土地。

教宗希望我们派遣我们忠诚的[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]战士向[crusade_title.GetBaseName]进军。这片土地目前被[crusade_character.GetCrusadeReligionDescription][crusade_character.GetTitledName]所占据着，是时候让她回到基督教的怀抱了。

尽管教宗本人希望征服[crusade_title.GetBaseName]，但一位虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]可以说服大家把目标放在一个对我们更有价值的地方。
I should consider preparing my men.
The preparations for the next Crusade begins.

随着一声令下，教皇对[crusade_title.GetBaseName]发起了[crusade_title.GetCrusadeLaunchAnother]十字军。[Root.GetCrusadeLaunchFirstPart]

[Root.GetCrusadeLaunchSecondPart]

[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]将会赦免所有参与这场正义战争的人的罪过。

The announcement about the grand Crusade was sent to every [From.Religion.GetName] realm, but apparently to no avail. The Pope has been trying to gather up support for the Crusade for months, but now the Vatican has gone quiet, as the Vicar of Christ has given up on his Crusade.\n\nThe [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s seem more interested with infighting than fighting the heathens or infidels outside their own borders. The Crusade was officially canceled, as the Pope held a large announcement denouncing the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] Lords and Ladies for their ineptitude in the matters of Faith. Now it is only a matter of time until [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] forsakes his faithless followers, and leaves them to be conquered by the sacrilegious infidels, blasphemers and heathens.
A terrible day for all of us.

Dear [Root.GetTitledName]
It has come to my attention you have not yet put on the cross. I have decided that it is time for you to pay back the favor you owe me, and be part of this endeavor.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I guess I will go then...

[pleased_courtier.GetFirstName] approaches me as I am on my way out, to tell me how happy [pleased_courtier.GetSheHe] was to hear I had pledged my men to the Crusade, and wish me luck in the upcoming war.

I receive a letter from [pleased_participant.GetTitledName], with a well detailed approval of my decision to join the upcoming Crusade. Maybe this is a chance to get closer as we fight the the heathens together?
Let us fight the heathens together!

I receive a letter from the despicable [pleased_participant.GetTitledName]. As we are both going to participate in the upcoming Crusade for [crusade_title.GetName], [pleased_participant.GetSheHe] wants us to make amends and move on from our disagreements.
Maybe it is for the better.

I have been unable to stop myself from being somewhat excited at the prospect of the driving away the infidels from [crusade_title.GetName], and restoring peace to those lands. I have not usually felt this inspired as a [Root.Religion.GetGroupName], but maybe I am changing?

Knowing I will be gone for a while, I decide to spend a day with the local sea creature while I still can. It comes up with some great battle plans I can use in the upcoming wars for [crusade_title.GetName]. I am blessed to have such a good friend.

I drop by the local forest, to spend some hours with the beasts and fauna before I leave home. I end up having a fruitful discussion with, well, I am not entirely sure what it is, but the conversation was enlightening!
I am inspired to do my utmost.
你是说，用一只眼睛换取你的智慧？

[displeased_courtier.GetFirstName] explains to me in great detail exactly how disappointed [displeased_courtier.GetSheHe] is in my decision to leave the Crusade. After the long tirade [displeased_courtier.GetSheHe] finally leaves the room, and I get some time for myself.
Maybe it wasn't the right decision after all.

I received a letter from the esteemed [displeased_participant.GetTitledName]. It seems [displeased_participant.GetSheHe] is displeased in my decision to revoke the pledge I made to the Crusade, and finds me somewhat untrustworthy.

One of my messengers brings me a letter from [displeased_participant.GetTitledName], where [displeased_participant.GetSheHe] declares me an unreliable swine and a traitor to all [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]
I have noticed that neither you nor your troops have partaken in the Crusade you pledged to join. I am disgusted that you would dare to lie about something like this, and expect your troops to show up soon.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]
You have already received one warning, and clearly not taken heed. I consider your lack of faith and interest in keeping your promise to be unbecoming of a Christian ruler.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName].

Messengers are sent to every corner of the world, as the Pope furiously excommunicates the despicable and vile [unpledging_actor.GetTitledName]. [unpledging_actor.GetSheHeCap] is expelled from the faith for forsaking [unpledging_actor.GetHerHis] fellow [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s in their righteous war for [crusade_title.GetName].\n\n[unpledging_actor.GetTitledName] should not be helped, cared for nor forgiven. A traitor to the faith as well as to the cause, the only thing [unpledging_actor.GetSheHe] deserves is to be justifiably overthrown. A true [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] would not betray [unpledging_actor.GetHerHis] allies to fight the heathens alone.

[Root.GetTitledName]
I noticed you still have not pledged to the Cross. As a faithful [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] ruler, I hope and pray that you will reconsider your actions, and join in the righteous war for [crusade_title.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Yes, you are right your Holiness.
Not joining nor supporting the Crusade might have dire consequences.

在漫长的[new_crusader_king.PrimaryTitle.GetName]十字军之后，正统信仰终于得到恢复。[new_crusader_king.GetDynName]作为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的受益者最终登上了王位，成为了十字军王国的[new_crusader_king.GetKingQueen]。在基督教世界的边缘继续战斗会困难重重，但所有人都相信[new_crusader_king.GetTitledFirstName]是这一使命的不二人选。\n\n教宗要求[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]世界的其他国家尽其所能地支持这个新生的王国，来防止它又一次落入异端分子和异教徒手中。
If only it could have been me...

[Root.GetTitledName]
I know we have had our differences, but it pleases me to hear you have decided to join our rightful cause. I have made the preparations to recant your excommunication from the church.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

The victories against the infidels were hard-fought, but things have finally settled down and the titles I fought for were given to [beneficiary_check_crusader_beneficiary.GetDynName]. It will surely be difficult to be a part of the new Kingdom, but I wish [beneficiary_check_crusader_beneficiary.GetHerHim] luck in [beneficiary_check_crusader_beneficiary.GetHerHis] future endeavors.\n\nI look back one last time as my men and I leave [beneficiary_check_crusader_beneficiary.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. I wonder what life would have been like if it had been me staying here, rather than [beneficiary_check_crusader_beneficiary.GetDynName].
Maybe in another life, it could have been me.

Greetings, [Root.GetTitledName]

I was informed the heathen Pope have declared a will to bring a Crusade to your doorsteps. As a fellow [From.Religion.GetName], I pledge to stand by your side when the unfaithful come to take your lands.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
How much gold should I donate to the Crusade?
我希望教宗能欣赏这一举动。
一份符合我身份地位的豪华礼物！
我实在是没有什么余裕来捐赠...
当十字军取胜分配头衔时，我需要做出选择，是顺从于教宗的意志，还是走我自己的路。
如果十字军胜利了，教宗将会把头衔授予§Y钦点受益人§!。如果不存在此人物，则转而授予在十字军战争中拥有最高参与度的成员的§Y受益人§!。
My beneficiary will get the titles.
如果十字军胜利了，同时我是战争最大的贡献者，十字军王国的头衔将会授予给我的§Y受益人§!。
Why would I give MY titles away?
如果十字军胜利了，同时我是战争最大的贡献者，我会自己获得头衔。
I will stick to my previous decision.
Sadly, my beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! seems to have died, I need to find a new one.
My beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! seems to have gained land, and is no longer an appropriate beneficiary.
My beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! seems to have become an heir for a landed title, and is no longer an appropriate beneficiary.
My beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! seems to have become a mercenary, and is no longer an appropriate beneficiary.
My beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! seems to have joined a holy order, and is no longer an appropriate beneficiary.
My beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! is not old enough, and is therefore not an appropriate beneficiary.
My beneficiary §Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§! is not healthy enough to be an appropriate beneficiary.
我的受益人§Y[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetDynName]§!已经成为一名[old_crusade_beneficiary.GetAscetic]，不再是一位合适的受益人了。

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See no longer supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], but rather [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. The Holy See now support [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] to be granted the titles.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. The Holy See now supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetHerHis] heir [new_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the throne.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See has decided to start supporting you as the recipient for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], after the death of [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See has decided to start supporting you as the recipient for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See no longer supports [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName]. With no fitting ruler, I will let you faithful men and women of the Cross decide who these titles might befit.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write to inform you that the Holy See can no longer support [old_crusade_recipient.GetDynName] for the lands of [current_crusade_target_title.GetName], as [old_crusade_recipient.GetSheHe] has passed away. With no fitting ruler available, I will let you faithful men and women of the Cross decide who will receive these titles.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I might have someone in mind.
Any pledged participant with the §YPapal Recipient Stance§! will have their stance changed to §YBeneficiary Recipient Stance§!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]
The Vatican is deeply disappointed in your decision to not join the Crusade. Your lack of faith is shocking, and I thought one could think better of a ruler such as you. 

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I decide what is best for my people, not you.

[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]已经保佑[new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetTitledName]赢得对[new_crusade_title.GetBaseName]的十字军。[new_crusade_target_char.GetTitledName]在战争中节节败退，[new_crusade_target_char.GetSheHe]最终不得不放弃[new_crusade_target_char.GetHerHis][new_crusade_title.GetBaseName]头衔。

[Root.GetCrusadeSelfishOrNot]

随着[new_crusade_target_char.Religion.GetGroupName]从故土中被驱逐出去，这里注定有更多冲突接踵而至。

[new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetTitledFirstName] has taken most of the core lands in [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName] for [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetHerselfHimself], to the annoyance of the other Crusaders. The Pope has made an announcement about the victory and selfishness of [new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetFirstName], talking about the vices and virtues of the faith.

[new_crusade_most_participating_member.GetTitledFirstName] has granted the new lands of [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName] to [crusade_king_recipient.GetDynName]. The Pope has made an announcement about the victory and virtues of the Crusaders, as true faithful protectors of the faith.

My men storm the walls of [From.GetBaseName], and finally take the last proper bastion of [duchy_region.GetBaseName]. If I settled my men around the area they could probably support the ongoing Crusade and help us claim victory, but the Pope will not be pleased if I unrightfully take these lands for myself.
[duchy_region.GetBaseName] sounds like an appropriate part of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! usurps all the titles in the §YDuchy of [duchy_region.GetBaseName]§!.
§YAll Pledged Crusaders§! opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! changes by §R-20§! for §Y10§! years. §Y(Self-serving Crusader)
I will find a suitable ruler for this new land.
I have no interest in these lands.

The [From.Religion.GetGroupName] Crusaders have taken [duchy_region.GetBaseName] and settled their soldiers around the area. Though the Crusade for [crusade_title.GetName] is still ongoing, the area around [duchy_region.GetBaseName] is indisputably in the hands of [current_crusade_beneficiary.GetTitledName].\n\nEmboldened and supported by the new [current_crusade_beneficiary.GetLordLady] of [duchy_region.GetBaseName], the Crusaders fight harder than ever to conquer [crusade_title.GetName]. It is only a matter of time before the rest of the [crusade_target_ruler.Religion.GetGroupName] realms will fall.
I wonder what life would have been like in [duchy_region.GetBaseName].

The old title of [old_crusade_title.GetName] has often been considered somewhat illegitimate in the eyes of everyone else. Now that I have acquired a new title it might be time to leave the old title behind, to take on the mantle of a more appropriate legitimate title.
Legitimize [old_crusade_title.GetName] as the new rightful Duchy of the region. This will delegitimize the old Duchy of [duchy_title.GetName].
The title has served us well. Rest, old friend.
Legitimate or not, I will keep the title.

The [From.Religion.GetGroupName] Crusaders have taken [duchy_region.GetBaseName] and settled their soldiers around the area. Though the Crusade is still ongoing, the area around [duchy_region.GetBaseName] is indisputably in the hands of [From.GetTitledName].\n\nDespite the continued support of [From.GetTitledName], [From.GetSheHe] has become somewhat unpopular among the other Crusaders, as [From.GetSheHe] is more interested in taking lands for [From.GetHerselfHimself] than fighting for the faith.
Disappointing that anyone can be so self-serving.

As I pass through [current_location.GetName], I come across [other_crusader.GetTitledName]. [other_crusader.GetSheHeCap] invites me to spend some time in [other_crusader.GetHerHis] camp to get to know one another better, as we are allies in the Crusade for [crusade_title.GetBaseName].
Thank you, I will accept your offer.
I am here to fight the infidels, not to make friends.
The last few days here in [current_location.GetName] has been an interesting experience. The [current_location.Culture.GetName] culture has reminded me of how different these lands are to my home.
I should try to learn as much as I can about these lands while I still can!
I will try to befriend one of the locals.
It looks like an abandoned battlefield, the dead strewn across the landscape. The crusaders certainly met quite the resistance, here in [current_location.GetName].
Maybe I could salvage some valuables?
A local merchant caravan approaches me on its way back home to [current_location.GetName]. One of the peddlers flashes me a huge grin, and ask if I want to take a look at his wares.
Thank you, but I have to be on my way.

When I joined the Crusade for [new_crusade_title.GetBaseName], I never expected the loneliness and longing for home. My men look up to me, so I have to continue the facade that everything is all right, as we move ever closer to our goal.
Maybe I just need to try to relax, and stop overworking myself.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] will guide me through these hardships.
As we settle down for the night in [current_location.GetName], a comet passes overhead. The soldiers start talking excitedly what it might mean.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] guides our hand in this just war!
All right, now get back to work men.
Let us take a moment to thank [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for this miracle.
一群十字军战士在[current_location.GetName]中斩首了几个当地人，只因为他们是[current_location.Religion.GetName]。这就是为什么我们来到[new_crusade_title.GetBaseName]的原因吗？
令人沮丧的是，必须做出示范。
当我们经过[current_location.GetName]时，我们遇到了一小群[Root.GetCrusadeReligiousMinorityGroup]。他们高兴地把我们当成了失散已久的兄弟姐妹接纳了我们，并给我们安排了地方以在夜晚睡觉休息。
朋友，让我来帮助你传播信仰。
你愿意加入我在[Root.Capital.GetName]的宫廷么？
我发现我正在行走穿过罗马的古代街道。曾经是罗马帝国的一部分，后来属于教廷属邦。它过去曾是世界的最中心，我们信仰的核心地带。现在它甚至不是[Root.Religion.GetName]。
在尝试将它带回真正信仰的努力中，你和你的战士从异教徒手中占领了城市。
曾经信仰的堡垒，安条克已经从伟大中堕落。我环顾整个城市，看到了它再次成为信仰中心的潜力，如果由一个真正的[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]领导。
一天，它再次以狄奥波利斯之名存在于世。
你和你的人从异教徒手中夺取这座城市，试图恢复真正的信仰。
曾经，圣保罗穿过塞浦路斯的海岸，传播[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的信仰，但现在这里已经被异教徒迷失。但愿我们能把它恢复为一个正信和美德的地方。
可悲的是，这个岛已经迷失了…
你和你的人从异教徒手中夺取这座城市，试图恢复真正的信仰。
耶路撒冷，信仰的发源之心，如今充满了异教徒。无论在哪，我都清楚地看到那些明显不是正信的男女。耻辱刺痛我的内心深处。
你和你的人从异教徒手中夺取这座城市，试图恢复真正的信仰。
历次十字军的惨痛失败仍在影响整个基督教国家。教宗的使者已经穿越了[From.Religion.GetGroupName]的所有忠诚领域，在人民中传播十字军精神，但是贵族们已经厌倦了上次战争。\n\n由于教宗身先士卒，人们想要重新占领宗教圣地，而发生了一些小规模的叛乱，男女领主们对此观望迟疑。民众和贵族之间发生更大的冲突，很可能只是时间问题。
要是不能很好地约束他们……

一声大喊，[shepherds_leader.GetFirstName]发动了来自[shepherds_province.GetName]的贫穷人民的十字军。[shepherds_province.Culture.GetName]土地上的男人和女人们都聚集在一起来参与这一重大事件，没有任何一个领主或女领主来领导他们，也没看见民众中有这样的人。

也许是受[shepherds_leader.Religion.GetHighGodName]之手指引，[shepherds_leader.GetSheHe]指挥牧羊人，箭匠和铁匠学徒向[kingdom_target.GetBaseName]进军。这是一条漫长而危险的道路，有许多挑战等待着他们。没有补给线线，也没有当地人的帮助，他们不太可能到达目的地。

[shepherds_leader.Religion.GetHighGodName]的奇迹真的能够从人们都以为他们会有的命运中拯救他们吗？

[From.GetFirstName] finally had [From.GetHerHis] people stand down as the losses against [FromFrom.GetTitledName] proved to be too costly. Most of the army were executed right there and then, and [From.GetFirstName] brought back to [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] to show everyone what happens to peasants who try to attack their betters.\n\nAfter all, nobody ever believed the peasants would win against the battle hardened armies of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

With pitchforks and hammers in hand, the shepherds rush the final bastions of defense in [From.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]. The skeptics were many, but nobody could make the miraculous group of brave men and women stop their quest for the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] lands.\n\nThe rest of the world looks to the new [From.GetKingQueen] with awe and confusion, as [From.GetDynName] takes the throne for [From.GetHerselfHimself]. Peasant no more, nobody can deny [From.GetHerHis] right to the throne. For who else than [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] could have guided [From.GetTitledFirstName] to victory?
没有[From.GetFirstName]的指导，被形象地称作牧羊人十字军的男人女人们都开始瓦解。[From.GetHerHisCap]的死亡打消了农民军队的士气，他们逃到了世界的各个角落。\n\n不管怎么样，谁会真的相信这群农民能够靠自己征服什么东西？
农民们的庞大军队在我[current_location.GetName]的门阶前聚集着。他们的指挥官，[shepherds_leader.GetFirstName]，正在请求我对他们十字军的帮助。
他们可以免费过去，但是快一点。
你会和牧羊人十字军同盟
我会向你派遣一些我的人。
你会派遣一些你的士兵加入§Y[shepherds_leader.GetFirstName]§!在[shepherds_leader.GetHerHis]的十字军。
农民十字军的闹事者要求我驱逐我领土上所有的犹太人。据他们的领袖，[shepherds_leader.GetFirstName]所言，他们并不是[shepherds_leader.Religion.GetHighGodName]中的真正的信仰者。

As expected, the rebellious peasants of the Shepherds' Crusade have started causing chaos among the local populace of [current_location.GetName]. My people look to me, to stop these foreign elements intruding upon our lands.
It is probably safer to just let them pass through.
Threading upon my lands is punishable by death.
You will treat §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! and [From.GetHerHis] forces as a hostile entity in your lands.

As the Shepherds' Crusade passes by [current_location.GetName], I see an influx of peasants settle down in the area. It seems some of them reconsider their choices, as the Crusade still has a way to go.
We could always use a helping hand or two.
Deserters have no place in [current_location.GetName], get back to the Crusade!
After publicly declaring the Shepherds' Crusade a heretical group of pillagers, [local_bishop.GetTitledName] was executed at the hands of [From.GetFirstName].
It is time to put an end to them.
我从来没有真的喜欢过[local_bishop.GetFirstName]！
这些该死的[From.Religion.GetName]农民进入了[current_location.GetName]并开始在居民中制造问题。如果继续这样，混乱的到来只是时间问题。
也许最好就等他们离开。
我会自己和他们继续战斗！

我亲爱的[Root.GetTitledName]
骑士们正在寻找容易防御的地方，在那里我们可以帮助指引所有的[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]生灵前往圣地。我们认为你在[potential_title.GetBaseName]新近得到的土地是最佳的地点，我们会为劳驾你而向你付一笔钱。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]
I write you this letter to inform you that me and my men have officially left your service. We no longer see you fit to rule, and we have once more returned to the faithful service of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

The magnanimous [From.GetTitledName] has donated the island of [potential_title.GetBaseName] to the Knights of Saint John, better known as the Knights Hospitaller. As one of the long standing protectors of the faith, this will surely make the routes safer for all the pilgrims seeking the Holy Land. The order is now known as the Knights of [potential_title.GetBaseName], and [d_knights_hospitaler.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] vows to continue their mission as the righteous defenders of Christianity and its faithful followers.

[Root.GetTitledName]
We wish to finally root out our ancient enemies in the north, and your newfound lands of [holy_order_potential_title.GetBaseName] would help us greatly in this mission. We would re-compensate you for your troubles, as we would not dare insult one with your status.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I would be happy to help the [d_teutonic_order.GetName]!
My apologies, but these lands are my own.

Supported by the charitable [From.GetTitledName], the Teutonic Order has settled down in [holy_order_potential_title.GetBaseName]. Dedicated to removing the northern infidels once and for all, [d_teutonic_order.Holder.GetTitledName] has started a massive campaign in order to revitalize [holy_order_potential_title.GetName] and turn it into a staging ground for their future wars.\n\nWorking out of [FromFrom.Capital.GetName], it is only a matter of time before they will conquer the rest of [kingdom_title.GetBaseName]. The heathens look towards the new seat of the Teutonic Order with fear and skepticism, knowing they will have to fight to retain their ungodly ways and traditions.
It is only a matter of time before they will fall.

Is it not every [Root.GetTitle]'s dream to be recognized as the true successor to the Caesars? I can invoke the translatio imperii and have [Root.RelHead.GetBestName] crown me as ruler of a new Roman Empire!
拥有除[k_germany.Title.GetName]以外的王国头衔。

As the [Root.GetDukeDuchessCap] of [d_osterreich.GetName] and [d_styria.GetName], I am clearly of a higher rank than the rest of the uncouth scum of the Empire. It is time for [e_hre.Holder.GetTitledName] to recognize my superiority over the other Princes.
Become the §Y[From.GetArchdukeArchduchessCap] of Austria§!, and bring the core lands of §Y[d_styria.GetName]§! and §Y[d_osterreich.GetName]§! in under your new title
§Y[e_hre.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§! opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is greater or equal to §Y50§!
Gather the lands of the Eastern Marches
It is time to gather all the land of the eastern marches into one kingdom.
Decide upon which name your new Kingdom will take.
I will gather the crown lands of Byzantium, and raise the old banners of Rome once more.
Become the Emperor of the §YByzantine Empire§!
Form an Empire of the Outremer
I will not stop until the dream of reconquering everything that was once Christian has been fulfilled. I will make sure the Holy Land stays safe and Christian to the end of times.
Form an Order of pious men to defend Iberia against the infidels in the province of Calatrava.
It is time for the [d_knights_calatrava.GetName] to bow down before me, and become my vassals. They will be valuable assets in keeping Iberia safe.
Form an Order of pious men to defend Iberia against the infidels in the province of Santiago.
It is time for the [d_knights_santiago.GetName] to bow down before me, and become my vassals. They will be valuable assets in keeping Iberia safe.
Form an Order of pious men to defend the routes to [k_jerusalem.GetName].
Militarize the Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre
Militarize the Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre so they can fight back the encroaching invaders of all the other faiths.
Vassalize the Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre
Bring the Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre into your realm as a vassal, to once more protect the holy places in Jerusalem.
You can send unlanded courtiers to join §YHoly Orders§!, this will disqualify them from an inheritance.
You can ask the §YTeutonic Order§! to target a local pagan ruler in their northern campaigns.
You can ask the §YTeutonic Order§! to target §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! in their northern campaigns.
[This.GetSheHeCap] single handedly brought victory to the [This.Religion.GetGroupName]s in several Crusades, and there are numerous legends spun in [This.Founder.GetHerHis] honor.
能够分享到更多§G十字军战争基金§!
[This.GetSheHeCap] is known for personally leading the charge of many battles, and it is said no heathen nor infidel could ever bring [This.GetHerHim] down.
[This.GetSheHeCap]因其作为第一个十字军王国[This.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName]的[This.GetKingQueen]而闻名。[This.GetSheHeCap]是一位为了信仰浴血奋战的虔诚统治者。
有§G更高§!几率建立一个§Y十字军王国§!
[This.GetSheHeCap] is legendary among the Christians for conquering the Arabian peninsula and destroying the Muslim faiths.
不会在战斗中受到§Y致命伤§!
更快地将§G省份§!转变为你的§Y宗教§!
Known for shattering the old Empire of Byzantium, and raising a new Empire from its ashes.
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! requests a change to the destination for the upcoming Crusade, to focus on conquering the lands of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
我们可以改变即将开始的十字军目的地。但是在东征开始之前一个角色改变战争目标越多，这一功能就越难实现。

Pledging my support for the Crusade shows the whole world what a great [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] I am, though it will create the expectation of actually attending the Crusade. Rulers who do not follow through on their promises, or later on removes their pledge to the Crusade, might feel the Pope's wrath.
我将撤回我支持本次十字军的誓约。教皇也许会因为听说我这一背信之举大发雷霆，也许我也得为离开十字军付出一定代价。
A beneficiary is the character assigned to receive all the titles of a Crusade, in the case of a victory.

每一位战争贡献者可以选择一位十字军东征的受益人，来接受从战争中获取的头衔。以下是符合受益人资格的角色的要求:§Y
 *必须是一个[Root.Religion.GetName]

 *不能是一个领主

 *不能是一个雇佣兵

一位虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]可以花费些许虔诚来说服教皇和其他参战者，从而改变即将开始的十字军东征目的地。

The Crusaders will take all the land in the targeted title held by §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!
Cannot unpledge from the Crusade if the Pope forced you to be part of it.
You may give the order to castrate §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! and turn him into a eunuch. He will be unable to sire more spawn or be granted landed titles, a severe punishment.
No landed character in the realm
There is a well kept Saintly burial site in §Y[Root.GetName]§!
Can ask the Teutonics for help again after §Y[From.northern_crusade_targeted_decision_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!
It was once a part of the core [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands, and lords from all across the world gathers to return it to their rightful hands.
It was once a part of the core [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands, and lords from all across the world gathers to fight for it in a grand war once more.

It has been at the fringes of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands for ages, and it has been decided that it is time to properly bring it into the fold, and turn the people of [crusade_title.GetName] to the true Faith.

It has been at the fringes of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lands for ages, and once again the Pope has decided it is time to try and bring them into the fold, and turn the people of [crusade_title.GetName] to the true Faith.
It has never been a part of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] realms, but the Pope has decided it is time to bring them into the fold, and show them the true path to redemption.
It has never been a part of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] realms, but the Pope has decided to try to bring them into the fold, and hopefully show them the path to true redemption.
The [From.Religion.GetGroupName] lords gathers from all across the world to bring [crusade_title.GetName] into the fold of [From.Religion.GetGroupName] kingdoms, and out of infidel hands.

[crusade_title.GetName] is currently in the hands of the blasphemous [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. Following the sacrilegious [crusade_character.Religion.GetName] [crusade_character.GetSheHe] has poisoned the lands and its people for too long.

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the tyrannic rule of the Mahomedan infidel [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. But with the upcoming [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught, it is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall.

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the rule of the sly Hebrew infidel [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. It is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall under the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught.

The [crusade_title.GetAdjective] lands has long been under the rule of the barbaric heathen [crusade_character.GetTitledName]. It is only a matter of time before [crusade_character.GetSheHe] will fall under the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] onslaught.

I have decided to follow Papal will when it comes to the distribution of the Crusader state titles.
§Y * This is considered a pious option.

 * Will receive a larger part of the Crusade War Chest.§Y

I have decided to grant all titles to my Beneficiary, when it comes to the distribution of the Crusader State titles.
§Y * This is considered a fair option.

I have decided to take the Crusader state title for myself, if I am the most participating member of the Crusade.
§Y * This is considered an impious and selfish action.
 * The Pope will disapprove of this stance.
 * Will not receive a part of the Crusade War Chest.§!
