To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have taken note of your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by paying the proper price for your indulgence.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
我没有多余的钱可以浪费！
After paying the requested tribute to the Holy See, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has finally agreed to lift my Excommunication and welcome me back into the loving embrace of the Holy Mother Church.

After paying the requested tribute to [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has finally agreed to lift my Excommunication, restoring my legitimacy as [Root.GetTitle] in the eyes of the [Root.Religion.GetName] world.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by with a public act of contrition in Our presence.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

I am forced to spend three days in the mud, with my head covered in ash, dragging myself towards the [FromFrom.GetTitle]'s holy palace before [FromFrom.GetFirstName] finally decides to grant me [FromFrom.GetHerHis] forgiveness, lifting my Excommunication and welcoming me back into the loving embrace of the Holy Mother Church.

I am forced to spend three days in the mud, with my head covered in ash, dragging myself towards the [FromFrom.GetTitle]'s holy palace before [FromFrom.GetFirstName] finally decides to grant me [FromFrom.GetHerHis] forgiveness, lifting my Excommunication and restoring my legitimacy as [Root.GetTitle] in the eyes of the [Root.Religion.GetName] world.
I have never been so ashamed of myself...

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting yourself to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], taking a vow of celibacy.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has requested that I prove my contrition for past sins by taking a strict vow of celibacy, claiming that my libertine attitude is what caused me to stray away from virtue.
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] cannot possibly know what I do every night...

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting one of your children's life to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has determined that the price for my wickedness is the life of my [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName]. [son_monk_candidate.GetSheHeCap] will take [son_monk_candidate.GetHerHis] leave [Root.Capital.GetName] to become a [son_monk_candidate.GetManWoman] of the cloth.
How could I do this to [son_monk_candidate.GetHerHim]?
I am sure [son_monk_candidate.GetSheHe] will learn to like it.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We fear that your infractions are far too severe to be forgiven by a simple act of contrition. If you care for the salvation of your soul, you will relinquish your throne, which your wicked deeds have irredeemably soiled, and devote yourself to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
If this is the price I have to pay...

I never realized it would come to this until it was too late. To cleanse my sins I have to abdicate my own throne. Stripped of all my titles, I will have to live a life of deprivation, cloistered in a monastery, far from all my friends and relatives.
I can only hope my successor will do better...

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by repealing the ungodly edict that you have imposed to curtail the righteous authority of the Church in your realm.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
These are my lands, and *my* priests!

The price for my absolution is the restoration of Papal power over [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Once again, the [FromFrom.GetTitle] will be the only one with the authority to invest Bishops within my own realm.

The price for my absolution is the restoration of hierocratic power over [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Once again, the [FromFrom.GetTitle] will be the only one with the authority to invest priests within my own realm.
What else was I supposed to do?

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We are of the opinion that it was your hubris and selfish thirst for power that have led you on the path of wickedness. As such, we demand that, in exchange for your absolution, you show your humility by equally dividing your realm amongst your heirs.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

It is decree of the Holy See that my titles be split upon my death equally amongst my children. The very integrity of my realm is a steep price to pay to receive absolution for my past sins and be able to rejoin my fellow [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects.

It is decree of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] that my titles be split upon my death equally amongst my children. The very integrity of my realm is a steep price to pay to receive absolution for my past sins and be able to rejoin my fellow [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by restoring our ancient and rightful claim over some of the Italian lands under your possession.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
No, those are my lands now!

With the restoration of the Papal State's ancient borders, the Pope has finally seen fit to absolve me from my past sins and lift the Excommunication that [From.GetSheHe] had placed upon me. I can now rejoin the Holy Mother Church in peace.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by officially recognizing the supremacy of the Church over the Empire.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
No, I will not tolerate this insubordination!

In order to receive absolution from my sins, I am required to recognize the authority that the Holy See has over me in the first place. As such, I was forced to relinquish [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] from my control, granting [FromFrom.GetHerHim] full power over [FromFrom.GetHerHis] lands.

In order to receive absolution from my sins, I am required to recognize the authority that [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has over me in the first place. As such, I was forced to relinquish [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] from my control, granting [FromFrom.GetHerHim] full power over [FromFrom.GetHerHis] lands.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
We are of the opinion that only by returning under the rightful lead of the Holy See you will be able to find absolution for your sins. Your lands rightfully belong to the Church, and we therefore demand that you submit to Our benevolent authority forthwith.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

The Holy See claims direct dominion over all of Italy since the Donation of Emperor Pepin. Although [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] had gained independence in recent times, I am now forced to bow to the throne of Saint Peter in order to find absolution for my transgression.
多日以来，[convert_lord_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]坚称，为洗礼之故，我需要接受一个新的，合适的[Root.Religion.GetName]名字，来证明我对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的新信仰之虔诚。
多日以来，[convert_lord_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]坚称，为改信之故，我需要接受一个新的，合适的[Root.Religion.GetName]名字，来证明我对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的新信仰之虔诚。
什么鬼话！我才不会放弃自己的名字！

Under pressure from [From.GetHerHis] new priest, my [GetFromRelation] has decided to adopt a new name after [From.GetHerHis] recent conversion and now calls [From.GetHerselfHimself] [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] has invited all of [From.GetHerHis] family to follow [From.GetHerHim] in this chance to fully embrace the new religion.
Nonsense. I will not forsake my own name!
A conversion to the [Root.Religion.GetName] demands the adoption of a new name as a proof that I have thoroughly forsaken the old, heathen traditions of my ancestors.

A few of my fellow warriors have been spending the night at the Lodge, playing dice games while drinking. Noticing me watching them, they immediately invite me to join them. Initially, I refuse, but then they start teasing me, insinuating I am afraid of a simple betting game.
Alright, then! Pass me the die!
四面骰上镌刻着诸神的玄妙面貌。我拿起骰子，在开始前，他们问我想要下多少注。
四面骰上镌刻着诸神的玄妙面貌。我拿起骰子，琢磨着我该把信念放在哪位神灵身上。有些组合更难出现，但也会带给我更多的回报。
赌注已下定，战士们围在桌旁，催促我投骰子，迫不及待地想要知道会投出哪一面。
幸运的是，我用了配重的骰子。
你成功地骗过了其他战士。
肯定没人会注意到桌底震了一下……
其他战士发现你企图作弊。
你没能成功地推动骰子。
我用配重骰子换掉正常骰子的尝试被发现了。在一阵争抢过后，一个战士设法剔出了那颗骰子，在桌上丢了几次，以此揭发我的企图。
事情不是你看到的这样！
与§Y[random_society_winner.GetFirstName]§!进行一场§Y决斗§!来避免付账。
你的同胞§Y战士们§!会记住此事。
既然我用了幸运骰子，哪有投不出[Root.GetWLDieBetName]的道理？欢呼与低叹交错之中，一局终了，钱币落袋。
再来！要么翻番，要么输光！
我们得经常这么玩几把。
很倒霉，我的腿动得太过草率，一些战士发现了我试图在投出骰子之后再次移动骰子。在一阵争吵过后，我被迫认输，不得不付钱。
我真的什么都没做，我发誓！
你的同胞§Y战士们§!会记住此事。
虽然战士们没有注意到我桌下的膝盖，命运却愚弄了我，居然让骰子从[Root.GetWLDieBetName]震到了其他面，真是令人失望。
只需一点小小的帮助，骰子就像我希望的那样落在了[Root.GetWLDieBetName]上。欢呼与低叹交错之中，一局终了，钱币落袋。
再来！要么翻番，要么输光！
我们得经常这么玩几把。
骰子从我的手上落下，滚动起来，所有人都屏声静气。弹跳几次之后，骰子停止滚动，落在了[Root.GetWLDieName]上。
好啊！再来，要么翻番，要么输光！
与§Y[random_society_winner.GetFirstName]§!进行一场§Y决斗§!来避免付账。
第一局的赌注已经落袋，我又拿起骰子，试着用完全相同的手法投第二次。骰子在桌上滚动，最终停在了[Root.GetWLDieName]上。
我自信地再次投出我的幸运骰，其他战士们又懊恼起来。桌上的赌注再次落进了我的口袋。
我让骰子在桌子上弹了两次，并且在它即将停止的时候，我轻轻碰了一下桌子，这一举动确保了我的第二次胜利。
将奖励给予§Y[tribal_festival_winner.GetFirstName]§!以纪念这一时刻，这为[tribal_festival_winner.GetHerHis]先人赢得了荣耀。
[From.GetTitledFirstName]决定给我一大笔钱，以酬谢我在节日上非凡的表现，并在所有聚集在[From.Capital.GetName]的人面前表扬了我。
此选项是可用的，因为§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!是你的§Y[GetFromRelation]§!
此选项是可用的，因为你是§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!的长辈
此选项是可用的，因为你爱你的§Y家人§!

Many warriors have gathered in the great hall tonight. The dinner has just started, and I already feel eager to test my mettle against one of them. It has been some time since we had a good Flyting, and there are plenty of candidates known for their crude manners and their sharp-tongue for me to choose from.
I will settle for nobody less than our best speaker!
Challenge §Y[flyting_potential_opponent_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a contest of dialectics.
[flyting_potential_opponent_2.GetTitledFirstName] looks like a good match for me!
Challenge §Y[flyting_potential_opponent_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a contest of dialectics.
I just want an easy fight.
Challenge §Y[flyting_potential_opponent_3.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a contest of dialectics.

Right in the middle of a dinner, [From.GetTitledFirstName] calls from my name from the other side of the dining hall, standing on one of the long tables. [From.GetSheHeCap] challenges me to a Flyting, encouraging me to stand up and prepare myself to be thoroughly humiliated.
I am not in the mood right now.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to refuse my challenge. Muttering some poor excuse about not being in the mood for insulting anyone, the [From.GetManWoman] shrinks back in the crowd, amongst the derision of all the other warriors in the room.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] takes a last drink and throws away [From.GetHerHis] tankard. [From.GetSheHeCap] stands up in front of me, claiming that [From.GetSheHe] is ready to turn me in the laughing stock of [Root.Society.GetName].
Go ahead, then! I will let you start.

I stand up and shout [From.GetFirstName]'s name in the dining hall, catching many warriors' attention, and challenge [From.GetHerHim] to a Flyting. Now I only need to decide what subject will cut deeper under [From.GetFirstName]'s skin.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] calls from my name from the other side of the dining hall, standing on one of the long tables, challenging me to a Flyting. [Root.GetProwessInsultDesc]
I think my accomplishments speak for themselves...
Oh, I wouldn't know about that, [From.GetFirstName]...
I have no idea what you are talking about!
You hear the crowd snickering at you.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] calls from my name from the other side of the dining hall, standing on one of the long tables, challenging me to a Flyting. [Root.GetCharacterInsultDesc]
I have no problem admitting my flaws.
But I am not like that at all!
How dare you say it! That's not my fault!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] calls from my name from the other side of the dining hall, standing on one of the long tables, challenging me to a Flyting. [Root.GetAccomplishmentsInsultDesc]
Meh, not that I care either way...
Oh, we shall see about that!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] calls from my name from the other side of the dining hall, standing on one of the long tables, challenging me to a Flyting. [Root.GetFamilyInsultDesc]
This is so mean of you!
Isn't this supposed to be a game?
As if I cared about what you think.
This is so mean of you!
Isn't this supposed to be a game?

We spar with words for a while, but soon [From.GetFirstName]'s face grows red with rage and embarrassment, surrounded by the laughter of the other warriors. Unable to put together a coherent response, my opponent has clearly lost the Flyting.
It was all in good fun, [From.GetFirstName], do not be mad!

I lost my temper. Seeing that I was unable to rebuke [From.GetFirstName]'s insults, the crowd quickly sided with [From.GetHerHim] ensuring [From.GetHerHis] victory. As if it weren't enough, [From.GetFirstName] continued mocking me, even after I admitted defeat, reveling in shaming me for my loss!
I will make you eat those words!
This is it! From now on, we are enemies!
The other warriors laugh at you as you storm out.

I lost my temper. Seeing that I was unable to rebuke [From.GetFirstName]'s insults, the crowd quickly sided with [From.GetHerHim] ensuring [From.GetHerHis] victory. At the very least, after I admit defeat, [From.GetFirstName] calms me down and orders a drink for both of us, ensuring that it was all done in good fun and it was not [From.GetHerHis] intention to seriously offend me.
The other warriors mock you for your pettiness as you storm out.

Perhaps I shouldn't have treated [From.GetFirstName] so poorly. Right after the game, [From.GetSheHe] swore revenge for [From.GetHerHis] humiliation and stormed off the main hall, amongst the laughter of all the other warriors.
Can the [From.GetManWoman] not take a joke?

Despite my show of kindness, [From.GetFirstName] refused to drink with me after the game. Instead, [From.GetSheHe] swore revenge for [From.GetHerHis] humiliation and stormed off the main hall, amongst the laughter of all the other warriors.

Our cellar has had a growing excess of mead for a few weeks now, to the point that I am starting to think about challenging the other warriors of the Lodge to see whom amongst them has the toughest stomach, while at the same time freeing some space and improving the fighters' morale.
Why not? Let the celebrations begin!
Hold and oversee a §YDrinking Contest§! amongst your fellow warriors.
That seems like such a waste...

[From.GetBestName] has decided to share a few barrels of mead to the entire congregation tonight, challenging [From.GetHerHis] fellow warriors to see which one among us will be able to drink the most without faltering.
I'd rather avoid the headache instead.

Several recruits accepted my challenge at the mere mention of free mead and soon the main hall is filled with cheering and clashing of tankards. The servants bring in the first barrel while everybody finds a place in the long table, eager to start.
Do not worry, there is more than enough for everyone!
You keep track of the contenders and wait for the winner.

Several recruits accepted my challenge at the mere mention of free mead and soon the main hall is filled with cheering and clashing of tankards. The servants bring in the first barrel while we all find a place in the long table, eager to start.

The first warriors have just started tapping out when a scuffle between two of the contenders quickly devolves into a large brawl. When the dust settles, there's barely anyone left standing, and most of the mead has been spilled on the floor, making it very hard for me to determine if there is any winner at all.
It was a fun evening at least...

The first warriors have just started tapping out when a scuffle between two of the contenders quickly devolves into a large brawl. When the dust settles, there's barely anyone left standing, and most of the mead has been spilled on the floor, making it very hard for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to determine if there is any winner at all.
Ugh, well, at least it was fun.

One by one, the other contenders either tap out or fall unconscious. I cannot see straight anymore and everything is blurry, but I am still standing. Unfortunately, so is [warrior_lodge_drinking_finalist_2.GetFirstName], and [warrior_lodge_drinking_finalist_2.GetSheHe] looks far more resilient than me right now.

One by one, the other contenders either tap out or fall unconscious. I cannot see straight anymore and everything is blurry, but I am still standing. Unfortunately, so is [warrior_lodge_drinking_finalist_1.GetFirstName], and [warrior_lodge_drinking_finalist_1.GetSheHe] looks far more resilient than me right now.
There must be a way to get ahead...
Try spilling most of your drink at each new round.
I am made of tougher stuff than this!
Focus your energies entirely on winning the match.
I have to try at least!

With most of the other warriors having tapped out, it looks like it is down to [warrior_lodge_drinking_finalist_1.GetFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_drinking_finalist_2.GetFirstName]. The two contenders are drinking face to face for some time, when I start noticing that [From.GetFirstName] has started to spill a suspicious amount of mead at each new round.

When [From.GetFirstName] shouts my name, for a moment I think I have won the game. Unfortunately, this is not the case at all. [From.GetSheHeCap] has discovered my trick and called me out on it. Before I can try to explain myself, two warriors grab me by the arms and throw me out of the main hall.
Your fellow warriors will remember your slight.

One by one, the other contenders either tap out or fall unconscious. I cannot see straight anymore and everything is blurry, but I am still standing. All of a sudden [FromFrom.GetFirstName] calls for the name of my opponent, there is a bit of a scuffle, and I am proclaimed winner. I am not exactly sure what happened, but I can hardly complain about it.

One by one, the other contenders either tap out or fall unconscious. I cannot see straight anymore and everything is blurry, but I am still standing. I gulp down another tankard and watch mindlessly as my last opponent falls head first on the table. While I am still processing what happened, I am proclaimed the winner of the contest amongst the cheers of the other warriors.

One by one, the contenders tap out, throw up, or pass out, leaving lesser and lesser warriors still drinking. At the end of the evening, there is only one left: [From.GetFirstName]. The crowd cheers a few times for the winner and carries [From.GetHerHim] around the hall for a while, giving [From.GetHerHim] some much needed praise.
A determinate [From.GetManWoman] like [From.GetHerHim] is the kind of ally I need!
I will honor [From.GetHerHis] victory with a gift.

One by one, the other contenders either tap out or fall unconscious. I am just about to raise my hand and drink another mouthful of mead when everything goes black. When I finally come back to my senses, one of the other warriors informs me that [WL_drinking_contest_winner.GetBestName] was the one to win the contest in the end.
Wait, for how long was I out?

Despite my best efforts, [WL_drinking_contest_winner.GetFirstName] is relentless, drinking tankard after tankard, leaving me well behind in the match. In the end, I am unable to even raise my arm to drink anymore, and lean on the table, conceding [WL_drinking_contest_winner.GetHerHim] victory.
I just want rest my eyes for a while...

Once the other warriors have finally put me down and left me to cope with the more unpleasant consequences of my victory, [From.GetBestName] [From.GetHerselfHimself] approaches me to offer [From.GetHerHis] congratulations. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that [From.GetSheHe] was truly impressed by my resilience and would love to count a [From.GetManWoman] like me amongst [From.GetHerHis] allies.

Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] was not interested in my offer. I am not sure if [From.GetSheHe] even understood what I was asking of [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] current state. But then again, perhaps it was a silly idea in the first place...
I should think these things through more often.

Once the other warriors have finally put me down and left me to cope with the more unpleasant consequences of my victory, [From.GetBestName] [From.GetHerselfHimself] approaches me to offer [From.GetHerHis] congratulations. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that [From.GetSheHe] was truly impressed by my resilience and would love to count a [From.GetManWoman] like me amongst [From.GetHerHis] friends.

Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] was not interested in my offer of friendship. I am not sure if [From.GetSheHe] even understood what I was asking of [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] current state. But then again, perhaps it was a silly idea in the first place...

Once the other warriors have finally put me down and left me to cope with the more unpleasant consequences of my victory, [From.GetBestName] [From.GetHerselfHimself] approaches me to offer [From.GetHerHis] congratulations. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that [From.GetSheHe] was truly impressed by my resilience and as a show of respect wishes me to have some of [From.GetHerHis] spoils from a recent raid.

Surrounded by Cardinals [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] washes the child three times over, while reciting the prayer to protect [baptizing_child.GetHerHis] soul. Yet, as [scoped_pope.GetSheHe]  raises little [baptizing_child.GetFirstName] for the crowd to see, there is no cheering to drown the child’s crying. The holy water appears to have burned [baptizing_child.GetHerHis] skin.

[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] washes me three times over in an accursed basin, ignoring my protests as [scoped_pope.GetSheHe] recites an unbearable litany. Then, as [scoped_pope.GetSheHe] raises me up, exposing me to the cheers of all of my future subjects, the holy water burns painfully through my skin.
这个角色总是注意保持[Root.GetHerHis]最佳外貌。
Grooming and personal care are not exactly priorities for this character.
I always need to make sure everyone sees how important I am.

[From.GetFirstName] is obsessed with [From.GetHerHis] looks. [From.GetSheHeCap] often avoids playing with other children just for fear of getting [From.GetHerHis] clothes dirty or ruin [From.GetHerHis] hair.
[From.GetFirstName] has scolded me for being so skittish. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that I should stop worrying about my looks so much and spend more time playing instead.
There are so many interesting things to do in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Why worry about cleaning myself, if I'll get dirty again?

[From.GetFirstName] spends all day playing in the dirt and never seems to care about [From.GetHerHis] own looks, not even during formal occasions, when a proper decor would be expected from a [From.GetBoyGirl] of [From.GetHerHis] stature.
[From.GetFirstName] has warned me that I should take greater care of myself, and that is unbecoming of a [Root.GetTitle] to always be dirty and uncouth as I am.
But why care how I look? I am [Root.GetTitle]!
Why should I care how I look when I spend most of my time alone?

With [From.GetFirstName] spending most of [From.GetHerHis] days cloistered, is it surprising that [From.GetSheHe] has such a poor care of [From.GetHerHis] looks? The [From.GetBoyGirl] always looks like a vagabond.

[From.GetFirstName] scolded me about my lack of grooming. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that, regardless of my cloistered lifestyle, I should still strive to maintain the dignified look of a [Root.GetTitle].
But what is the point of that?
How can I be expected to do anything? I must maintain a clean and dignified look for the masses.

[From.GetFirstName] is enamored with [From.GetHerHis] looks, always trying to appear at [From.GetHerHis] best and always using [From.GetHerHis] necessity to keep clean and groomed as an excuse to avoid any task that might bother [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetFirstName] has insinuated that my obsession with grooming is just an excuse to avoid my responsibilities and that I should not fear getting dirty every once in a while.
But I am not a peasant!

I should always strive to look at my best if I wish to find a good husband to live the rest of my life with. It has not been an easy job, but, with the proper care, I think I am looking better and better every day.

I should always strive to look at my best if I wish to find a good wife to live the rest of my life with. It has not been an easy job, but, with the proper care, I think I am looking better and better every day.
I should always strive to look at my best for my beloved spouse. It has not been an easy job, but, with the proper care, I think I am looking better and better every day.

If I wish to be successful in my amorous adventures, I must look at my very best. Nobody will fall for my words if I look like a toad. It has not been an easy job, but, with the proper care, I think I am managing to look better and better every day.
Was there any doubt about it?

While all this time spent outside is undoubtedly good for my health, it has not worked as well for my looks. Every night, when I return home, my clothes are soiled in dirt and mud, and my hair bears the stink of wet dogs.

While my training has greatly improved my physical prowess and my skills in combat, it has not had a positive effect on my looks. My skin has grown rough and blemished by a countless amount of old bruises and small scars.
I cannot afford myself to look like this!
And so what? Looks do not matter.
The [From.Religion.GetName] is on the verge of destruction

I have noticed that, since joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], my [new_recruit.GetRootRelation] has been eschewing [new_recruit.GetHerHis] studies in favor of training with the other fighters. It has become impossible to sit [new_recruit.GetHerHim] down to read a book.
That is how it should be.

I have scarcely had time to focus on my literary studies since joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], yet I would be lying if I said that I miss spend long nights at candlelight, reading about dead people.

I have scarcely had time to focus on my literary studies since joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], and while I have no problem with that, my [GetFromRelation] is livid. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that I should find the time to both train and read.

I have noticed that, since joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], my [new_recruit.GetRootRelation] has been avoiding [new_recruit.GetHerHis] responsibilities as a [new_recruit.GetTitle] to focus entirely on martial arts. If it keeps going like this, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] will soon be unfit to even administer a pig farm.

Since my [GetFromRelation] made me join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] I have had very little time to think of my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle], what with all the training I have been going through. Still, learning to fight is certainly more exciting than hearing tedious complaints from peasants.

Since my [GetFromRelation] made me join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] I have had very little time to think of my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle], what with all the training I have been going through. Unfortunately, this does not sit well with [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] has ordered me to find the time both to train in the art war and statesmanship.

I have noticed that, since joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], my [new_recruit.GetRootRelation] has spent barely any time at court, learning to act as [From.GetHerHis] rank demands. Being in contact with all these coarse fighters is making [From.GetHerHim] adopt mannerisms that are unfitting of [From.GetHerHis] stature.
As long as [From.GetSheHe] learns how to fight...
I won't have [From.GetHerHim] grow into a thug!

Since my [GetFromRelation] made me join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] I have spent very little time at court. Not that I mind, of course. The place is filled with boorish snobs and entitled sissies.
What do they know of war?

Since my [GetFromRelation] made me join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] I have spent very little time at court. Not that I mind, of course. The place is filled with boorish snobs and entitled sissies. Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] is not of the same opinion. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that I should learn how to deal with my vassals and subjects as my title demands.

I have noticed that all of this focus on physical activity might be dimming [From.GetFirstName]'s mind. My [From.GetSonDaughter] has been ignoring many of [From.GetHerHis] other studies and responsibilities to better refine [From.GetHerHis] combat skills, openly belittling their importance compared to the art of war.
But a smart fighter is a good fighter, [GetFromRelation].
I wouldn't have it any other way.

Today, [From.GetFirstName] took some time from [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities to scold me about what it means to be a warrior. [From.GetSheHeCap] thinks that I am focusing too much on the physical aspect of my training, and that I should know it takes both a strong body and a strong mind to make a good fighter.

The past few months I have been focusing entirely on my training with [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], and the effects are showing. And all I had to do to become so strong was to neglect all my other studies!

I could not fail to notice how joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] seems to have roughened up my [GetFromRelation]. The training [From.GetSheHe] is going through is undoubtedly getting results, but it is also turning my clean, handsome [GetFromRelation] into a coarse, foul-mouthed fighter.

I could not fail to notice how joining [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] seems to have roughened up my [GetFromRelation]. The training [From.GetSheHe] is going through is undoubtedly getting results, but it is also turning my sweet, delicate [GetFromRelation] into a coarse, foul-mouthed fighter.
As long as it's making [From.GetHerHim] stronger...

Today, [From.GetFirstName] took some time to scold me about my training. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that spending so much time with uncouth riffraff is making me lose my manners and forgo any care about my looks, an behavior unfitting for a [Root.GetTitle].
All this fuss for a bit of dirt...

The past few months I have been focusing entirely on my training with [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], and the effects are showing. I cannot believe how strong I have become. I might be always reeking of sweat and blood, but I can scarcely argue with results.

[child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] told me that [child_hero_mentor.GetSheHe] is concerned about my [GetFromRelation], claiming that the child lacks the grit and bravery of a true member of [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [child_hero_mentor.GetFirstName] thinks that forcing my [GetFromRelation] to confront [From.GetHerHis] fears is the best way to help [From.GetHerHim] overcome them.
I will not let you put my [GetFromRelation]'s life at risk!

My [GetFromRelation] and [child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] have approached me today with a dangerous task to complete. They claim that the best way for me to overcome my fears is to leave [Root.Capital.GetName] and spend a few days in the wilds, learning how to survive on my own.
I-I am not sure about that...

[child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] approached me today to talk about my [GetFromRelation]. [child_hero_mentor.GetSheHeCap] fears that the child is growing too fat to be a proper warrior, and we need to take drastic measures if we want to put [From.GetHerHim] on the right path.

[child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] approached me today to talk about my [GetFromRelation]. [child_hero_mentor.GetSheHeCap] fears that the child is growing too weak and sickly to be a proper warrior, and we need to take drastic measures if we want to put [From.GetHerHim] on the right path.
I agree, we must do what necessary.
§Y[child_hero_mentor.GetFirstName]§! will put your [GetFromRelation] through an intensive training.

[child_hero_mentor.GetTitledFirstName] claims that I need to eat less and train more if I wish to become a worthy member of [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [child_hero_mentor.GetSheHeCap] says that my [GetFromRelation] has given [child_hero_mentor.GetHerHim] permission to put me through an intensive training regiment to get me in better shape.

[child_hero_mentor.GetTitledFirstName] claims that I need to eat and train more if I wish to become a worthy member of [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [child_hero_mentor.GetSheHeCap] says that my [GetFromRelation] has given [child_hero_mentor.GetHerHim] permission to put me through an intensive training regiment to get me in better shape.

Letting [child_hero_mentor.GetFirstName] handle the issue was a good decision. [child_hero_mentor.GetSheHeCap] was able to change my [GetFromRelation]'s habits and slowly turn [From.GetHerHim] into a fit young [From.GetManWoman].

Unfortunately, even with [child_hero_mentor.GetFirstName]'s help, my [GetFromRelation] still remains a stout, slow recruit amongst [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. I can only hope [From.GetHerHis] physical state does not hinder [From.GetHerHim] too much as [From.GetSheHe] continues with [From.GetHerHis] training.

Unfortunately, even with [child_hero_mentor.GetFirstName]'s help, my [GetFromRelation] still remains a scrawny, feeble recruit amongst [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. I can only hope [From.GetHerHis] physical state does not hinder [From.GetHerHim] too much as [From.GetSheHe] continues with [From.GetHerHis] training.
Perhaps we should try this again in the future...
[child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] has approached me today, offering to put my [GetFromRelation] through an intensive training session, hoping to improve [From.GetHerHis] dueling skills.
I think it's still a bit early for that.

I spent most of the afternoon training with dull weapons with [child_hero_mentor.GetBestName] under my [GetFromRelation]'s watch. It was not easy to keep up with such a good and harsh teacher. I might have collected quite a few bruises, but I also learned several interesting new moves.

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], I have had not a single day of peace. Being a fighter is simply too much of a bother to me. All of these training sessions have been an unbearable chore to go through.

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], I have had not a single day of peace. My new playmates are illiterate brutes, forcing me to perform the most humiliating tasks. I wanted to become a scholar, not a fighter!

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], life has been a constant torment for me. I am a [Root.GetManWoman], my place is not on the field of battle, needlessly risking my life!

Ever since my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] forced me to join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName], life has been a constant torment for me. All of this talk of duels and war is too much for me to bear. I do not really have the stomach to be a fighter.
[recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation], I do not want to be a warrior anymore!
Still, I must obey my [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation]'s wishes.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the training is too hard and [From.GetSheHe] does not feel like [From.GetSheHe] is fit to be a warrior.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the art of war does not appeal to [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetSheHe] wishes to be a scholar instead.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that fighting is simply not something a [From.GetManWoman]'s job, and demands that I allow [From.GetHerHim] to leave the Lodge.

My [GetFromRelation] has confronted me today about my decision to have [From.GetHerHim] join [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the prospective of fighting other people makes [From.GetHerHim] uneasy and jittery. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes I could reconsider my decision to make [From.GetHerHim] become a warrior like myself.
You are my [GetFromRelation], and you will obey me!
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! might react poorly to your decision.
If this is what you wish...

My [GetFromRelation] did not take well my request. [From.GetSheHeCap] yelled at me that it is my duty to become a warrior like [From.GetHerHim] and that [From.GetSheHe] will not tolerate any insubordination on my part.
I cannot live like this anymore!

Since our last fight, [From.GetFirstName] has been very gloomy, barely even speaking to me or any of [From.GetHerHis] friends. Forcing [From.GetHerHim] to keep training to be a warrior might have not been the best decision on my part...
But I did it for [From.GetHerHis] own good!

Far from obeying my decision to become a warrior, [From.GetFirstName] has decided to flee [Root.Capital.GetName]! And, as if that wasn't enough, my [GetFromRelation] stole as much [From.GetSheHe] could carry from my treasury before leaving.
How could [From.GetSheHe] do this to me?
自从我们上次的战斗以来，[From.GetFirstName]一直非常沮丧，几乎对我和[From.GetHerHis]朋友没有说过话。然而，我从来没想过，强迫[From.GetHerHim]继续训练会导致[From.GetHerHim]夺走[From.GetHerHis]自己的生命。

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], spending [From.GetHerHis] eating and drinking, with no accomplishments to [From.GetHerHis] name.

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], and has become a frail, soft-spoken bookworm, buried in a moldy library, with no accomplishments to [From.GetHerHis] name.

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], and has become a frivolous, vapid courtier, sniveling at the feet of better people.

I have recently heard news of my [GetFromRelation] from [From.GetHerHis] exile. [From.GetSheHeCap] now lives in [From.Capital.GetName], and has become a paranoid loner living at the edge of society, barely tolerated by [From.GetHerHis] peers.
The local garrison has been depleted to help the efforts of a righteous Crusade.
A good portion of the local population has left the field to join a Crusade.
This ruler has vowed to support the Children's Crusade economically, helping the young zealots in their efforts to restore the Holy Land to Christendom.
The crusaders have reached the Holy Land scattered, starving and desperate, with barely any hope left to conquer Jerusalem.
The many difficulties encountered during their long travel has all but extinguished the crusaders' hopes to reconquer the Holy Land.
The many difficulties encountered during their long travel has all but extinguished the crusaders' hopes to reconquer the Holy Land.
The many difficulties encountered during their long travel has all but extinguished the crusaders' hopes to reconquer the Holy Land.
Despite the many difficulties encountered during their long travel, the crusaders' fervor has not dimmed as they reached the gates of the Kingdom of Heaven.
A large group of peasants and children, led by a [Root.GetBoyGirl] claiming to hear the voice of Christ, has embarked into a desperate mission to reconquer the Holy Lands from the infidels.
You will now play as §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! instead of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
我从圣灵那里得到了一道神谕。\n我们的主命令我拿起武器，召集信徒，踏上圣地，从亵渎圣地的异教徒那里夺走圣地。

我曾经担心我的[GetFromRelation]会因[From.GetHerHim]解放圣地夙愿落得一个悲惨的下场。\n如今[From.GetFirstName]去世了。所有在[From.GetHerHis]旗帜下集结的儿童与农民都已经四散离去。他们哀叹着失去了敬爱的领袖，无法理解为何上帝漠视了[From.GetHerHim]在完成[From.GetHerHis]神圣任务之前就被杀害。\n然而，尽管[From.GetFirstName]的死是不幸的，但这无疑也挽救了无数人的生命，否则他们都会跟着这个孩子一起落入异教徒的魔掌中，这令我感到一丝欣慰。

随着[From.GetFirstName]的离世，[From.GetHeShe]企图把十字军带领到圣地的愚蠢尝试永远不可能成真了。所有在这个[From.GetBoyGirl]的旗帜下集结的儿童与农民都已经四散离去。他们哀叹着失去了敬爱的领袖，无法理解为何上帝漠视了[From.GetHerHim]在完成[From.GetHerHis]神圣任务之前就被杀害。\n尽管[From.GetFirstName]的死是不幸的，但这无疑也挽救了无数人的生命，否则他们都会跟着这个孩子一起落入异教徒的魔掌中。

通过让[From.GetFirstName]永远地消失，我确保了[From.GetHeShe]企图把十字军带领到圣地的愚蠢尝试永远不可能成真了。所有在这个[From.GetBoyGirl]的旗帜下集结的儿童与农民都已经四散离去。他们哀叹着失去了敬爱的领袖，无法理解为何上帝让[From.GetHerHim]在完成[From.GetHerHis]神圣任务之前就黯然退场。\n[From.GetFirstName]的命运当然是不幸的，但这无疑也挽救了无数人的生命，否则他们都会跟着这个孩子一起落入异教徒的魔掌中。
对于这样一个年轻的[From.GetBoyGirl]，这真是一个悲催的结局……
通过逮捕[From.GetFirstName]，我已经阻止了[From.GetHerHis]误导的十字军到圣地。\n\n那孩子在我的地牢里憔悴不堪，[From.GetHerHis]愚蠢的追随者已经开始四散奔逃，他们无法理解为什么上帝会如此轻易地抛弃他们心爱的领袖。
[From.GetSheHeCap]将被一直囚禁直到[From.GetSheHe]学到[From.GetHerHis]教训。
随着[From.GetFirstName]过早地被[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]俘虏，[From.GetBoyGirl]带领一群狂热者为基督教世界夺回圣地的企图被挫败了。失去心爱的领袖后，少年的追随者迅速四散奔逃，无法理解为什么上帝会让[From.GetFirstName]在成功完成[From.GetHerHis]神谕的远征之前如此轻易的被击败。

Something has happened to my beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName].

[From.GetSheHeCap] claims that the Holy Ghost visited [From.GetHerHim] last night, ordering [From.GetHerHim] to take up arms, gather all the true followers and lead a Crusade against the infidels who are desecrating the hallowed soil of Jerusalem.

[From.GetSheHeCap] has even had the gall to demand money, weapons and troops from me to show my support to this sacred quest of [From.GetHersHis]. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not listen to reason and is very determined to leave [Root.Capital.GetName] immediately.

[From.GetFirstName], a child from [Root.Capital.GetName] has caused quite the commotion today, when [From.GetSheHe] demanded an audience with me, claiming that the Holy Ghost appeared to [From.GetHerHim] in dream last night, ordering [From.GetHerHim] to take up arms, gather all the true followers of Christ and lead a Crusade to free the Holy Land.\n\n[From.GetSheHeCap] concluded [From.GetHerHis] sermon by commanding me to provide [From.GetHerHim] with money, weapons and men to help [From.GetHerHim] fight against the infidels in the name of Our Lord.
You will have my full support!

Sponsor [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName]'s §YCrusade§!, providing [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHim] with as much help as you can afford to increase [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] chances of success.
I will dispatch some men to protect you.
Pledge some troops to join [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName]'s Crusade and protect the child during [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] perilous journey.
I will give you some food for the travel.
Oh, absolutely! I will ship you to the holy land myself!
Trick [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] and [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] supporters and have them sold into slavery to the heathens.
You are dead to me. Leave and never return!
Guards! Throw this blithering fools out!
If this is what you desire, I will not hold you.
Do whatever you wish, it is of no concern to me.

News have reached us that a [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl] from [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] has received a vision from the Holy Ghost, compelling [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to pick up arms, gather the true followers of Christ and lead a Crusade against the infidels who desecrate the sacred soil of Jerusalem.\nThe [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl] has gathered many followers amongst the peasantry and has embarked on great journey to reach the Holy Land, claiming that the sea itself will open at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] passage.
Such a wild imagination, even for a child...
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] show [From.GetHerHim] the way to victory!
Could this child be a messenger of the Lord?
[childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName]带着手下的散兵幼勇来到了[Root.Capital.GetName]。好像四处游荡的贱民和呜呜泱泱的小孩还不够给我添麻烦似的，他们毫无风范的头领要求和我会面，声称我应该为[childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis]神圣的战争提供补给和食宿。
Your words have moved me! I will support you.
Oh, I will find you a place to stay...
Guards! Remove these urchins from the premises!
I am afraid we have no food to spare.
[childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName]带着手下的散兵幼勇来到了[Root.Capital.GetName]。好像四处游荡的贱民和呜呜泱泱的小孩还不够给我添麻烦似的，他们毫无风范的头领要求和我会面，声称我应该为[childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis]神圣的征伐提供部队和辎重。
I will do much more than that!
Very well, I will grant you some of my men.
You can see if any of my subjects are interested in your cause.
Do not worry, I know just who to call...
What sort of joke is this? Guards!
I am afraid we have no men to spare on hopeless quests.

Ever since the ragtag army of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] has reached [Root.Capital.GetName], I have received no shortage of complaints from [child_outraged_priest.GetTitledFirstName] regarding how heretical this Crusade is, and how I should make an example of its young leader to prevent my subjects from falling to [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHis] sinful words.
But [childrens_crusade_leader.GetSheHe] is the chosen of Our Lord!
Worry not, [child_outraged_priest.GetFirstName]. I will make these pesky children disappear.
I will have my guards beat them out of [Root.Capital.GetName].
Let us not concern ourselves with them, shall we?

Ever since the ragtag army of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName] has reached [Root.Capital.GetName], I felt drawn to the words of its leader. Jesus surely speaks for [childrens_crusade_leader.GetHerHim].

Tragedy has struck me! My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName], swayed by the words of [childrens_crusade_leader.GetFirstName], has decided to flee [From.GetHerHis] home to join the Children's Crusade.
I must follow them to protect my [GetFromRelation]!
How could [From.GetSheHe] do this to me!

[From.GetFirstName]宣称地中海的波涛会在[From.GetHerHis]抵达时自动分开，好让[From.GetHerHis]的战士们毫发无损地通过，并且一路行军到圣地。\n不幸的是，上帝并没有让这位年轻十字军的诺言应验，现在大批的农夫和孩童躲在热那亚奄奄一息，找不到前往亚洲的途径。一些摇摆不定的十字军成员已经丧失了信心，但是[From.GetFirstName]依然坚定着[From.GetHerHis]信念，每天都劝说鼓舞着那些不抱希望新兵。
They could use more troops for protection.
I will allocate some resources to help them buy a passage.
I can spare some money to send them some food.
I will pray that they soon find a passage.
They are still in time to return home.
为了抵达圣地，儿童十字军成功预订了一条穿越地中海的航路。然而因为一场可怕的暴风雨，他们的船队在亚该亚海岸倾覆，他们不得不绕道前往希腊。来自军中的消息很少，但有传言说许多人已经开始质疑[From.GetFirstName]的领导。\n\n到目前为止，这伙不靠谱的农夫和孩童还在向着耶路撒冷进军。
They are surely in need of more supplies!
I must reiterate my support to strengthen [From.GetFirstName]'s authority.
I will dispatch letters to the local authorities to send them on the correct path.
I can only hope they will persevere.
Perhaps the Lord does not wish them to reach the Holy Land...
尽管历经了无数逆境，遭遇了对[From.GetHerHis]神启般的领导才能的挑战，[From.GetFirstName]成功地将[From.GetHerHis]部队一路开进尼西亚。\n随着圣地终于触手可及，这批十字军的决心更加坚定了。他们的领袖坚信，一旦异教徒们见识到他们神圣的使命，他们便会丢盔卸甲放弃抵抗。相反，只要他们到达圣地，耶路撒冷的城门自己就会为他们打开。

尽管历经了无数逆境，遭遇了对[From.GetHerHis]神启般的领导才能的挑战，[From.GetFirstName]成功地将[From.GetHerHis]部队一路开进尼西亚。\n随着圣地终于触手可及，这批十字军的决心更加坚定了。\n[From.GetFirstName]向我寄了一封信件，感谢我在的运动中继续支持[From.GetHerHim]，并且进一步向我请求进一步的资助以对抗异教徒。在我的帮助与上帝的保佑下，[From.GetSheHe]一定能在与可恨的异教徒的战争中取得完全的胜利。
When the time comes, I will join in battle with you!
I will allocate more resources to support your fight.
I can only offer you my most sincere prayers.
There is not much else I can do, I fear.

在看到大天使加百利指引[From.GetHerHim]率领[From.GetHerHis]军队通过崎岖险路到达十字军领地的幻象后，[From.GetFirstName]的孩子们奇迹般地避开了异教徒的视线抵达了安条克。\n尽管那个[From.GetBoyGirl]声称只要他们抵达异教徒们就会着魔似的放弃战斗，但占据着耶路撒冷的异端们已经开始集结他们的军队，急切地准备着屠杀反抗他们的纯净灵魂，以守卫他们不义而夺的土地。\n[From.GetFirstName]是否当真为主所眷顾，一切即将揭晓。

在看到大天使加百利指引[From.GetHerHim]率领[From.GetHerHis]军队通过崎岖险路到达十字军领地的幻象后，[From.GetFirstName]的孩子们奇迹般地避开了异教徒的视线抵达了安条克。\n尽管那个[From.GetBoyGirl]声称只要他们抵达异教徒们就会着魔似的放弃战斗，但占据着耶路撒冷的异端们已经开始集结他们的军队，急切地准备着屠杀反抗他们的纯净灵魂。\n[From.GetFirstName]当真为主所眷顾，或是我失智地对这个孩子寄予信任，一切即将揭晓。
[From.GetFirstName] will not fight this Crusade alone!

It appears that whatever impetus had driven so many to follow [From.GetFirstName] has dissipated. The Children's Crusade is no more, its army scattered and broken, its main supporters dead or missing.\nThe leader [From.GetHerselfHimself], [From.GetFirstName], still convinced to be the messenger of the Lord, is now derided by most as a raving lunatic who spends most of [From.GetHerHis] days yelling at people from street corners, lamenting about the depravity of the Church and the nearing end of our world.
It was bound to happen sooner or later.

面对异教徒大军强力的还击，儿童十字军被撕碎得千疮百孔。\n在缺乏领导，装备和受训战士的情况下[From.GetFirstName]根本无法对抗[From.GetHerHis]敌人。尽管成功率领着[From.GetHerHis]追随者找到了前往圣地的道路，[From.GetHerHis]看到一个由基督教控制的耶路撒冷的梦想最终化为泡影。\n在被[From.GetHerHis]支持者悉数抛弃之后，[From.GetBoyGirl]和其他的孩子一样，在战斗失败之后被异教徒俘获，最终被卖给了奴隶贩子。

An insane child, clearly under the influence of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has managed to reach Jerusalem at the head of a large army of beggars and youths, claiming that it is [From.GetHerHis] sacred duty to retake the Holy Land in the name of [From.GetHerHis] god.\nWhile the number of gullible fools who have fallen for this [From.GetBoyGirl]'s words is alarming, the idea that a mob of starving peasants will be capable of defeating a mighty [Root.Religion.GetName] army in open battle is laughable.
We will slaughter them like lambs.

面对异教徒大军强力的还击，儿童十字军被撕碎得千疮百孔。\n在缺乏领导，装备和受训战士的情况下[From.GetFirstName]根本无法对抗[From.GetHerHis]敌人。尽管成功率领着[From.GetHerHis]追随者找到了前往圣地的道路，[From.GetHerHis]看到一个由基督教控制的耶路撒冷的梦想最终化为泡影。\n至于追随[From.GetHerHim]的那些愚者，其中成年者被异教徒悉数屠杀，而军中的儿童被俘虏，并全部贩卖为奴。
Such a tragic yet predictable end...

As was expected, the fools who entrusted their lives in the hands of a child were promptly slaughtered by the armies of the faithful.\nThis Crusade against Jerusalem was bound to be short-lived and one-sided. Our enemies had no skilled commanders, no weapons, no armors, no siege engines, no food... That they were able to reach their destination in the first place was something of a miracle by itself.\nThe few survivors amongst the children have been sold into slavery, never to return to their homeland.
There could be no other end to this war.
I can no longer deny it! God is with [From.GetHerHim]!
I wish for [From.GetHerHis] reign to be long and prosperous!
I guess I should have trusted [From.GetHerHim]...
在圣灵的感召下，[This.GetTitledFirstName]在[This.GetSheHe]仅仅是个少年的时候，成功地领导了一次十字军，将耶路撒冷从异教徒手中解放出来。

My attempt to change the regular die with a weighted one did not pass unnoticed. After a bit of squabbling, [random_society_winner.GetBestName] manages to pick the die away from me and throws it on the table a few times, revealing my intent and calling me a cheater.
How about we consider it even?
I will make it up to you in some way, I promise!

Unfortunately, I was too indiscreet with my leg, and several warriors noticed my attempt to move the die after it was cast. After a bit of squabbling, I am forced to accept defeat and recognize that [random_society_winner.GetBestName] has won the bet.

Despite the other warriors not noticing me kneeing the table, fate played me for a fool and I ended up accidentally pushing the die away from [Root.GetWLDieBetName], much to my disappointment. [random_society_winner.GetBestName] smiles triumphantly, crossing [random_society_winner.GetHerHis] arms and demanding me to pay up.

A moment of silence falls upon our group as the die rolls from my hand and bounces a few times on the table, rolling to a halt to show the face of [Root.GetWLDieName]. As the realization catches [random_society_winner.GetHerHim], [random_society_winner.GetBestName] cheers triumphantly, immediately asking me for [random_society_winner.GetHerHis] money.

After the money from the first bets exchanges hands, I pick up the die and cast it again, trying to throw it exactly in the same way. The die rolls around the table and finally stops, showing the face of [Root.GetWLDieName]. As the realization catches [random_society_winner.GetHerHim], [random_society_winner.GetBestName] cheers triumphantly, immediately asking me for [random_society_winner.GetHerHis] money.

After the money from the first bets exchanges hands, I pick up the die and cast it again, trying to throw it exactly in the same way. The die rolls around the table and finally stops, showing the face of [Root.GetWLDieName]. As the realization catches him, one of the other warriors cheers triumphantly, immediately asking me for his money.

[From.GetBestName] and I spent last evening playing dice games with some of the other warriors in the main hall. Fortune did not smile to [From.GetFirstName], and by the end of the night, I had managed to empty [From.GetHerHis] purse quite a bit.

[From.GetBestName] and I spent last evening playing dice games with some of the other warriors in the main hall. Fortune did not smile to [From.GetFirstName], and by the end of the night, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to call in the favor I owned [From.GetHerHim], just to avoid paying all of the debt [From.GetSheHe] had accumulated.
Perhaps you should not bet what you do not have?

[From.GetBestName] and I spent last evening playing dice games with some of the other warriors in the main hall. Fortune did not smile to [From.GetFirstName], and by the end of the night, [From.GetSheHe] begged me to ask [From.GetHerHim] anything else rather than paying all of the debt [From.GetSheHe] had accumulated.
I will think about this favor you owe me...
Last time [Root.GetFirstName] pleasured a woman was when he relieved his mother's womb of his presence.
It is said that your virility is legendary amongst dwarfs.
No warrior is as cowardly as the one between your legs.
Ancient legends tell of the last time a lady called you a man.
Never a man was born that could pleasure his lover as swiftly as you.
They claim you are no longer a man, but, I ask, were you ever?
You were already a girl in every way before even losing your manhood.
Your manhood was not cut: it shriveled off for lack of use.
Was there ever a fouler place than the cave between your legs?
Your wailing is such that your lovers need to bed you with earplugs.
Do you dress as a warrior because you could never pass for a lady?
No place is as desolate and maggot-riddled as your womb.
I have never found a less desirable person than you.
Is it any surprise you would pick a game where you are the center of attention?
Try not to choke between turns, [From.GetFirstName], we have a long game ahead.
I am surprised you haven't started to whine about losing yet.
Feeling alright, [From.GetFirstName]? Sure you're not tired already?
Somebody warn [From.GetFirstName] that [From.GetSheHe] won't be paid by word.
Are you sure Flyting is good for your temper, [From.GetFirstName]?
I have never met a [From.GetManWoman] more easily dumbfounded by a pretty face.
Did you drag yourself through a pigs-den before getting in here?
Were you always this ugly, or did you just lose one too many brawls?
I might have to yield, looking at your face is too great an offense to bear.
[From.GetFirstName] is so repulsive children flee at [From.GetHerHis] sight.
[From.GetFirstName] face is so grotesque it scares wolves and cracks stone.
What god did your mother offend to curse you with such a revolting look?
It is telling how often [From.GetFirstName] has to remind us that she a woman.
It is telling how much eager you are to play word games over proper fights.
I am still unsure what made you think a weakling like you can be one of us.
Was there ever a weaker fighter recruited to [From.Society.GetName]?
I am impressed you managed to get on this table without breaking a bone...
Does the little girl need her hand held before she faints?
I shall try to speak softly, lest my voice strikes you dead.
Delicate as a flower, [From.GetFirstName] yet clings to dreams of war.
Was there ever a problem [From.GetFirstName]'s mind couldn't avoid solving?
Are you truly as dumb as you look, I wonder?
I will be using big words now, [From.GetFirstName], try to keep up.
You realize this is a game that requires wit, right?
I am looking forward to your grunts of rebuttal, for sure.
Is it really such a surprise you jumped at the chance to yap some more?
Are you sure you wouldn't rather give up and go hide in a corner?
One can hardly find anything bad or good to say about [From.GetFirstName].
Saying you are the dullest [From.GetManWoman] I ever met would give you too much credit.
You are as interesting as a plank of wood.
Not every [From.Culture.GetName] can be satisfied with so little...
I suppose being born with so few skills makes mediocrity desirable?
Better be careful not to trip over your broken dreams on your way out.
How does it feel to be the black sheep of your dynasty?
I can scarcely believe how little a [From.GetTitle] like you could accomplish.
It is very impressive to wish for so much yet accomplish so little.
Hard to find somebody with greater designs and pettier goals.
The thought of you managing to accomplish something is as scary as laughable.
What have you ever done of note in your life?
I guess, after seeing how you came out, your parents simply gave up?
So, how is the wretched harpy that spawned you, [From.GetFirstName]?
I have heard great, hilarious tales about your father's cowardice.
If you are the best your folks can offer, I dread the sight of your siblings.
I cannot lie: your parents confided me that you are their greatest mistake.
Let us be quick about this game, your mother's legs still wait for me.
Eager to return to that toad you call wife?
Eager to return to that spineless worm you call husband?
Tell me, how many times did you stomp on your kids' heads?
One can only hope your children sprung from a stronger seed than yours.
How does it feel to be the disgrace of your dynasty?
You are truly the greatest example of your dynasty's mediocrity.
Claiming that you are the best that the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] can offer is but meager praise.
To see what you have become, your ancestors must be rolling in their graves.
What sort of imbeciles would not expose a revolting child like you at birth?
Of all the drooling imbeciles making up your family, you are the worst.
I guess a deficiency of honor and bravery runs deep within your family...
Your family is made up of fools and cowards.

[From.GetFirstName] claims that [From.GetSheHe] has scarcely seen a family spawn as many clueless and ugly children as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] line. [From.GetSheHeCap] longs for the days [From.GetSheHe] thought me to be an exception rather than the main example of this truth.

[From.GetFirstName] claims that [From.GetSheHe] has scarcely seen a family spawn as many clueless and ugly children as the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] line, and [From.GetSheHe] cannot fathom what humiliating depths of ignominious incompetence may descendants will face, given my present state.
[From.GetFirstName] claims that my dynasty has been a descending spiral of honor-less cowards and drooling idiots, of which I am the greatest example yet.

Setting this Unit to be a Looter will allow it to raid the Counties and Holdings of other rulers for §YGold§!. This will cause the ruler in question to become temporarily §RHostile§! towards you, allowing them to attack your armies at will. Note that, if a ruler is held prisoner, they will not be able to Loot the lands of their captor.

Before we leave for this perilous journey to slay the monster that is menacing my subjects, I should make an offering to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to make sure I am shielded from the preternatural powers of the creature.
I will burn the best cattle from my stock.
I will offer something of value for a safe journey.
A small offering is all I need.

The time has come for us to leave the safe confines of civilization and venture forth into the dark domain of the monster plaguing my lands. With [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s protection, I am sure to track down this creature and put an end to the threat it poses to my subjects once and for all.

The time has come for us to leave the safe confines of civilization and venture forth into the dark domain of the monster plaguing my lands. With [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s protection and my keen hunting skills, I am sure to track down this creature and put an end to the threat it poses to my subjects once and for all.

Our long search for the mysterious beast has led [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and I on some dangerous, unmapped paths. It takes only a second of distraction before I find myself grasping for something as I fall from a cliff-side.
Dampen your fall to prevent any damage.
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] will attempt to save you from your fall.
There must be something I can grab!

My sight wavers for a moment, I feel my heart stop and my teeth jitter as the clouded sky spirals above me and I catch a glimpse of the jagged rocks waiting beneath me. I feel a sudden pain crossing through my chest and fear for the worst, but then I realize it is caused by [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] pulling me from my arm and dragging me back to safety.
I will never forget your gesture, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName].
At least you are good for something, I suppose...

As I hang on the precipice, struggling to crawl back to the path, I watch helplessly as [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] looks back at me. It takes me to call [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] several times before [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] finally unfreezes and comes to my help. Whether it was for cowardice or malice, my own companion has nearly left me to die!
I can never trust [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] ever again.
How could you just stand there?!
Let us see if you have better balance...
I must kill [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] before [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] tries to kill me again!
I should not be too hard on [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim], it was a difficult situation.

Our long search for the mysterious beast has led [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and I on some dangerous, unmapped paths. It takes only a second of distraction before [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] loses [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] footing near the edge of a cliff, finding [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerselfHimself] grasping for something as [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] starts falling.
Do not worry, I will save you!
Grab §Y[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]§! and pull [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] up on your own.

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] struggles, desperately trying to take a firm hold of my hand. I tell [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to keep calm, pulling [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] arm up over the hill's edge. We both lay on the wild path for a while, breathing heavily. As soon as [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] has recovered enough to stand up, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] thanks me profusely for saving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim].
I know you would do the same for me, my friend.
I would never let something happen to you, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName].

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] struggles, desperately trying to take a firm hold of my hand. I tell [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to keep calm, pulling [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] arm up over the hill's edge. Yet, just as I am about to drag [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to safety, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] hand slips and [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] falls screaming in the abyss below.
I will have to proceed alone.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Given that wandering aimlessly in a unmapped area would just be a waste of time and put us at risk of losing our own path, we are determined to find some trace of the beast before venturing any further.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. Given that wandering aimlessly in a unmapped area would just be a waste of time and put us at risk of losing our own path, we are determined to find some trace of the beast before venturing any further.

The search for the great bear has brought my expedition through a dead wood. Given that wandering aimlessly in a unmapped area would just be a waste of time and put us at risk of losing our own path, we are determined to find some trace of the beast before venturing any further.

The search for the great lion has brought my expedition to slopes of a thick patch of grassland. Given that wandering aimlessly in a unmapped area would just be a waste of time and put us at risk of losing our own path, we are determined to find some trace of the beast before venturing any further.
I will make sure that there are no stones left unturned.
I think I know where our quarry is hiding...

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] is better suited for this task.
Use [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]'s §YIntrigue§! to try and find traces of the beast.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. It is not long before I stumble upon the half-eaten remains of the creature's last prey, a dismembered deer, floating in a crimson pond. I am certain that examining this carcass will grant me insight on this terrible beast I am trying to hunt down.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. It is not long before I stumble upon the half-eaten remains of the creature's last prey, a young goat crushed on the rocks near a steep path. I am certain that examining this carcass will grant me insight on this terrible beast I am trying to hunt down.

The search for the great bear has brought my expedition through a dead wood. It is not long before I stumble upon the half-eaten remains of the creature's last prey, a dismembered deer, floating in a crimson pond. I am certain that examining this carcass will grant me insight on this terrible beast I am trying to hunt down.

The search for the great lion has brought my expedition to slopes of a thick patch of grassland. I have read much about this sort of beast.
There are a few clear ways to fell such a monster.
I am sure I know something...

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]! Surely you must know something about this creature.
Use [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]'s §YLearning§! to learn about the nature of the beast.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Our search bears little fruit when the night catches up with us. Having to find refuge from the darkness, we make our way to the shack of an old hermit. The man is not very talkative, but he does seem to know about the beast...

We will map the path as we move.
We will not get lost, my memory will not fail me.
Perhaps if we try marking our path?

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] is better suited for this task.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.
