Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.

The search for the great lion has brought my expedition to slopes of a thick patch of grassland. Despite beginning this hunt with the most unwavering resolution, I am starting to feel uncertain of our chances of success. The journey to the creature's lair has been rife with weird signs and bad omens of the most grotesque and unsettling nature.
Nothing but superstitions! [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is surely with us!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] knows that my heart is pure.
These signs... There must be another way to interpret them.
Use your §YLearning§! to reinterpret the bad omens.
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName], tell me, is there another way to interpret these signs?
Use [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]'s §YLearning§! to reinterpret the bad omens.

The search for the great wolf has brought my expedition through a deep forest. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the forest are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

The search for the great eagle has brought my expedition to the slopes of a barren hill. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the mountain are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

The search for the great bear has brought my expedition through a dead wood. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the forest are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

The search for the great lion has brought my expedition to slopes of a thick patch of grassland. Our foe may be fearsome, but our journey to its lair was filled with the most auspicious omens. It is quite clear that the spirits of the plains are welcoming our arrival and helping me in my quest to slay the monster haunting this land.

I let [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] walk past me as I watch the sun set beyond the leafage of the dark forest we have reached in the search of the great wolf. [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] keeps [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerselfHimself] close to me, comforted by the presence of a fellow hunter by [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHis] side, and hopelessly unaware that the terrible beast that [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHe] was set to slay was me.

[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] and I have been out in the wild for several days now, with no trace of our quarry. As I take a moment to rest under the skeletal husk of a tree and look at my companion, scouring the terrain looking for clues, I am struck by a sudden realization. What if the monster has taken [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]'s form to deceive me?
[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetSheHeCap] will not live to tell the tale.
You will never take me alive!
Abandon §Y[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]§! and continue the hunt alone.
No, [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] is too nice to be the beast.

We have searched for this elusive creature for weeks now, but to no avail. I was unable to find any trace of the great beast, and had to eventually resign myself to abandon the quest and head back to [Root.Capital.GetName]. Some of my fellow warriors were eager to hear of my story upon my return, expecting me to bring the head of the monster as a trophy, and most were quite disappointed to learn of my failure.

There are only a few rays of sunlight lingering over the forest's leaves when I am startled by the coarse howling of a wolf. I have barely the time to look around when the beast emerges growling from the foliage, its gray, sparse mane sprinkled with dried up blood, its yellow eyes staring me with soulless hatred.

When the shrieking battle cry of the eagle pierces my eardrums, making me startle, I am halfway through climbing a large rock formation. An imposing shadow sweeps over the uneven surface of the wall, aimed straight in my direction.

It is hard to tell what time is it, with most of the light blocked by the skeletal branches of the dead trees, but it cannot be too far from sunset when a threatening growl breaks the silence around me, announcing the arrival of a large brown bear. The beast tears down the rotten remains of a trunk as it makes its way towards me with bloodshot eyes and drooling jaws.

I am following the last set of tracks through a patch of tall grass, when a sudden rustle makes me suddenly stop. I cautiously glance on my left side, and immediately spot the fiery golden eyes of the lion. The beast, crouched on the ground with its jaws half-open, looks ready to pounce.
I have slain far bigger game than you!
You will die by my hand, fiend!
being injured while slaying the §YGreat Beast§!.
being wounded while pushing §Y[scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]§! into the §YBeast§!'s clutches to save yourself.

The great wolf is resting by a riverside, its long snout red with dried up blood. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.

The great eagle is tucked in its nest, its cruel hooked beak barely peeking from under its wings. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.

The great bear is resting by its cave, a grotesque mountain of flesh and dark brown fur soaked in filth and blood. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.

The great lion is resting under a tree, placidly looking at a the horizon. Finding the beast at its weakest gives us a considerable advantage against it, yet we must also be careful not to underestimate this formidable opponent, especially now that we are so close to succeeding in our quest.
I know exactly how to deal with it.
This option is available because of your §YHunting§! skills.
Now we can corner and gut this monster for good.
Finally! Death to the vile monster!
I am not sure about this anymore...
You shamefully return home, leaving the beast to its rest.

The great wolf fights to the very end, but we are soon able to corner it and pierce through its hide a few times. Keeping the creature at bay with our spears, and patiently wait for the bleeding to weaken it enough to strike again. I land the final blow through the wolf's skull, pushing the creature on the ground, finally vanquished.

I manage to wound one of the eagle's wings as it takes off, leaving the beast unable to flee. The eagle screeches and leaps furiously towards me, its talons grasping for my eyes, but I am able to push it away while taking only a few scratches. As the bird clumsily tries to take flight, I throw my spear through its chest, bringing it down for good.

When I charge the first strike, the bear's response is sluggish, but, the more I poke at it, the angrier the beast gets. Its hide is thick, so much so that I can barely pierce through it. Yet, I do not discourage myself, maintaining enough distance from my foe to avoid its attacks, hitting it repeatedly until it finally falls dead.

I barely escape the lion's pounce. Just as I slide past the jumping beast, I push my spear through its chest, getting pulled alongside it. The monster roars and claws at me, trying to get rid of the weapon, yet I keep a strong hold on it, pushing it further into the lion's flesh while avoiding its attacks, until the creature finally lays dead beneath me.
I will make a trophy out of it.
The sacred ritual of flaying must be performed.
I will bring the carcass back to my fellow warriors.
I think I hear something from the beast's nest...
Look for the great eagle's young.

The fight to slay the great wolf will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly killed me, assaulting us in a flurry of slashing claws and gnawing teeth, yet we persevered and overcame the monster, leaving its carcass bloody and broken by the riverside.

The fight to slay the great eagle will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly dragged me to a terrible death during its last assault, but, in the end, we were able to slay it, leaving it to fall screeching from the hill, its wings bloody and broken.

The fight to slay the great bear will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly crushed me under its massive weight, tearing down several trees in its frenzied drive to kill us, but, in the end, the bear's fury only quickened its bleeding, sealing its death.

The fight to slay the great lion will be remembered by our fellow warriors for generations to come. The creature nearly skewered me on multiple occasions during its desperate struggle, yet I was able to ignore the pain and focus on my assault, and finally manage to plunge my spear through its eye and put an end to its wicked existence.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The wolf grabs my arm within its jaws and drags me on the ground, shaking its head violently. I scream and punch the creature with my free arm, until it finally releases me. When I finally retake my senses and push myself up, soaked in my own blood, there is no trace of the wolf left.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The eagle's talons grab hold of my clothes, pulling me away from the cliff. I struggle and try to hit the beast, loosening its hold, but not before dooming myself to a harsh fall. When I finally awake, the great eagle is long gone.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The bear tramples me in its charge, slamming me against one of the dead trees. I scramble for my spear, and manage to throw it at the beast's head, causing it to falter for a moment. The bear roars and runs away, disappearing in the forest. Unfortunately, the beast's attack was devastating, to the point of making me unable to continue my pursuit.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The lion pounces me, crushing me under its massive weight, its terrible jaws snapping at my throat. By plunging my spear underneath its leg, I am able to stop the beast's assault and slip away. My counterattack was enough to make the lion retreat back in the tall grass. Sadly, my wounds prevent me from pursuing my quarry any further.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The wolf grabs my arm within its jaws and drags me on the ground, shaking its head violently. I scream and punch the creature with my free arm, but the wolf is relentless and, after momentarily losing its hold, it snaps its jaws on my throat.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The eagle's talons grab hold of my clothes, pulling me away from the cliff. I struggle and try to hit the beast, loosening its hold, but not before dooming myself to a deadly fall.
Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The bear tramples me in its charge, crushing me under its massive weight and leaving me a broken smudge in the middle of the dead forest.

Everything happens so fast I can barely react. The lion pounces me with unfathomable speed, slamming me on the ground and quickly closing its jaws around my neck. The creature's teeth swiftly crush my windpipe, leaving me to drown in my own blood.

Just as the wolf is about to strike, I swiftly push [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] directly into the beast's jaws, quickly turning around and running for my life as my companion is horribly mangled by the monstrous creature. My fellow warriors might think me a coward for leaving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to die only to save myself, but I will at least be a living coward.

I duck as the eagle passes over me, and let myself fall on [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName]. My companion's body dampens my fall enough to make me stand up immediately after reaching the ground and run away as fast as my legs can take me, leaving behind myself both the terrible monster and [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName], cursing me for my cowardice as the beast already circles over [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim].

Just as the bear is about to strike, I swiftly push [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] directly into the beast's charge, quickly turning around and running for my life as my companion is horribly mangled by the monstrous creature. My fellow warriors might think me a coward for leaving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to die only to save myself, but I will at least be a living coward.

Just as the lion is about to strike, I swiftly push [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetFirstName] directly into the beast's jaws, quickly turning around and running for my life as my companion is horribly mangled by the monstrous creature. My fellow warriors might think me a coward for leaving [scoped_WL_co_hunter.GetHerHim] to die only to save myself, but I will at least be a living coward.
I could never kill that thing!
I barely survived as it is!

The evil that had corrupted the sacred spirit of the bear has been cleansed through the shedding of our blood and the death of the creature. It is now our duty to consume its flesh and bury its bones so that this majestic beast can be born again. After completing our ritual, I leave the bear's skull on top of a tree and finally begin my journey back home.

My fellow warriors welcome my return triumphantly. With all the meat gathered from my hunt, we will be able to organize a large feast and celebrate my victory over the monster with all the pomp it deserves.
Your fellow warriors are impressed by your generosity.

The squealing increases as I approach the eagle's nest. One of its chicks is hiding there, blind and featherless, squawking for food. The spawn of such a powerful beast could serve me well, if properly trained, serving me in future hunts and terrorizing my enemies.
Take the §YEagle§! as your pet and train it to hunt.
The line of this monster must be extinguished.

Several months have passed since I took the great eagle's nestling after killing its terrible mother. The chick has grown strong and tame under my watch. Unlike its parent, it will spend its life serving men rather than hunting us down.
After years of loyal service and countless hunts, my eagle has finally taken to its last flight to join its ancestors in the Eternal Blue Sky.
All my court will be present at the funeral.
Publicly burn the remains of your eagle.
Bury the remains of your eagle.
I will hunt the beast down by myself!
Is NOT being considered as a gift.
New warriors will soon start flocking to your banners.
Has NOT used §YCall of the Steppe§! in the past §Y10 years§!

A couple of fellow warriors help me constrain the majestic offerings that I have personally picked from my livestock for this occasion. While a a priest chants, I plunge the sacrificial dagger deep into the flesh of the first horse, letting its blood shower over my face. I turn around and the priests inscribe a few holy symbols on my face with blood and dirt.

With my champion dead, I have been left without a fighter to represent my dynasty's faith to the gods in the upcoming blood games. Still, there is a little time left, if I wish to find somebody else to rise up to the challenge.
On [From.GetHerHis] deathbed, my [GetFromRelation] told me that I was so similar to my grandfather in my habits it was almost eerie.
On [From.GetHerHis] deathbed, my [GetFromRelation] told me that I was so similar to my grandmother in my habits it was almost eerie.
Your vassal, [FromFrom.GetTitledName], is concerned about [FromFrom.GetHerHis] non-inheriting daughters. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] asks you to consider them when looking for new vassals.
My humble request to gain land for [chosen_son.GetFirstName] was successful. I no longer have to worry about [chosen_son.GetHerHim].
Unfortunately, my Liege could not find it in [From.GetHerHis] heart to give my [chosen_son.GetSonDaughter] any land at this time.

My [chosen_son.GetSonDaughter] [chosen_son.GetFirstName] will now have [chosen_son.GetHerHis] own land! My Liege made sure to mention that I should remember this in the future when [From.GetSheHe] requires a favor in return.
I can ask my Liege, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, to grant some land to my unlanded child. This can only be done once every two years.
Has an adult landless son not in line of succession
Has an adult landless daughter not in line of succession
I could use more good women.

[From.GetTitledName] was sacrified to the gods by [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s priests! After bringing [From.GetHerHim] to one of their new temple pyramids, they placed [From.GetFirstName] on an altar and sliced [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. They then tore out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of their assembled warriors.
It is how it should be.

My incompetent brethren in [Root.Society.GetName] failed to capture [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], though apparently they slew a guard and a servant in the attempt. Even worse, it appears that [From.GetFirstName] has started to suspect my involvement in the ambush.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is proceeding well. [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap] will soon be tracked down and skewered by arrows.
最近没有执行过这项决议
一些[Root.GetTitledFirstName]领地内的学者和官员被命令去修订[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]大多数原有的法律。
这个统治者正带领着一群学者和官员尽心尽力的去修订大多数[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]已经过时的法律。
由于领主对于税收很不上心，许多[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的封臣都开始变得任性而又懒惰。
随着在[Root.GetHerHis]领地内对司法体系的修缮，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]如今能够在[Root.GetHerHis]的领地内强迫[Root.GetHerHis]一些最任性的封臣遵守法度。
这个统治者花了大多数时间来追求[Root.GetHerHis]家族的利益，并且试图提升[Root.GetHerHis]家族的威望和地位。
这个统治者花了可观的时间来追求[Root.GetHerHis]家族的利益，并且试图提升[Root.GetHerHis]家族的威望和地位。
This ruler is dedicating some of [Root.GetHerHis] time pursuing the interests of [Root.GetHerHis] family and trying to increase the standing and prestige of [Root.GetHerHis] dynastic name.
Recent theological studies promoted by this ruler have resulted in a long series of religious debates questioning some of the fundamental principles of the realm's religion.
Recent theological studies promoted by this ruler have resulted in a long series of religious debates questioning some of the fundamental principles of the realm's religion.
This ruler is investing a great deal of resources in order to attract famous artists and philosophers to [Root.GetHerHis] court.
This ruler is investing a considerable amount of money and time trying to attract artists and great thinkers to [Root.GetHerHis] court.
This ruler has taken a personal interest in better equipping [Root.GetHerHis] court to encourage artists and philosophers to take residence within it.
This ruler is investing a considerable amount of [Root.GetHerHis] realm's resources to better support the needs of artists and philosophers.
This ruler is investing a considerable amount of [Root.GetHerHis] realm's resources to better support the needs of artists and philosophers.
This ruler is expanding [Root.GetHerHis] palace to host and support the needs of a stable host of poets, artists and philosophers.
This ruler is spending a considerable amount of resources to exert [Root.GetHerHis] influence over the realm's clergy and inspire religious fervor amongst [Root.GetHerHis] populace.
This ruler is spending a considerable amount of influence to inspire religious fervor amongst [Root.GetHerHis] populace.
This ruler is exerting a direct control over all crafts and activities of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects in order to prevent the spreading of any heretical thought within [Root.GetHerHis] realm.
This ruler has hired religious agents to oversee most of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects' everyday activities in order to prevent the spreading of any heretical thought within [Root.GetHerHis] realm.
This ruler has taken a personal interest in monitoring most of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects' everyday activities in order to prevent the spreading of any heretical thought within [Root.GetHerHis] realm.
In an effort to root out dissidents from [From.GetHerHis] realm, this ruler has dedicated many of [Root.GetHerHis] troops to oversee [Root.GetHerHis] own subjects.
In an effort to root out dissidents from [From.GetHerHis] realm, this ruler has hired foreign mercenaries to oversee the activities of [Root.GetHerHis] own subjects.
致力于使你的名字镌留青史，从而使你的子孙后代都能分享你的威名。

为了完成这一野心，你需要执行以下任务之一，或通过其他方式建立一条§Y血脉§!：
 §Y*§!谋杀或处决§Y30§!个人。[Root.GetFoundBloodlineKillCounter]
 §Y*§!赢得 §Y15§!场对外战争。[Root.GetFoundBloodlineWarCounter]
 §Y*§!保持领土和平 §Y30§!年。[Root.GetFoundBloodlinePeaceCounter]
 §Y*§!修建§Y10§!座城市。[Root.GetFoundBloodlineCityCounter]
 §Y*§!修建§Y10§!座城堡。[Root.GetFoundBloodlineCastleCounter]
 §Y*§!修建§Y10§!座教堂。[Root.GetFoundBloodlineTempleCounter]

注意，同时执行多个任务可能导致混合血脉的产生。

When [Root.GetTitledFirstName] ascended to the throne at such an early age, few in [Root.GetHerHis] court expected [Root.GetHerHim] to last to adulthood.
Yet, in the end, it was [Root.GetHerHis] detractors that did not survive through the [Root.GetTitle]'s childhood.
Under [Root.GetHerHis] cheerful and playful appearance, the child demonstrated an unparalleled ruthlessness in [Root.GetHerHis] rise to power, meticulously eliminating all those that opposed [Root.GetHerHim]. 
Despite having long since shed the illusory semblance of innocence that allowed [Root.GetHerHim] to lure many of [Root.GetHerHis] victims to an untimely end, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has become infamous throughout the realm for [Root.GetHerHis] sanguinary childhood.

When [Root.GetTitledFirstName] ascended to the throne at such an early age, few in [Root.GetHerHis] court expected [Root.GetHerHim] to last to adulthood.
Yet, in the end, it was [Root.GetHerHis] detractors that did not survive through the [Root.GetTitle]'s childhood.
Under [Root.GetHerHis] cheerful and playful appearance, the child has demonstrated an unparalleled ruthlessness in [Root.GetHerHis] rise to power, meticulously eliminating all those that opposed [Root.GetHerHim]. 
No playmate of [Root.GetHersHis] dares to deny [Root.GetHerHim] a toy, no tutor dares to punish [Root.GetHerHim], dreading the murderous abyss behind [Root.GetFirstName]'s eerie smile.
Why would anybody be scared of playing with me?

Yet another victim has fallen to my murderous whims. As I look down at the corpse on the floor, I realize that I have managed to stack quite a considerable body count by now. Soon enough, one of my guards brings me back to the matters at hand, asking me what should be done with the remains.
Put it somewhere I can see it.
Embalm the corpse and prop it up in a macabre display.
Be sure to hide all evidence of your misdeed.
Focus immediately on your next victim.

Far from being the least bit ashamed of [Root.GetHerHis] murderous inclinations, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has started to openly display [Root.GetHerHis] victims as a warning towards [Root.GetHerHis] enemies. \n[Root.GetSheHeCap] has dedicated an entire wing of [Root.GetHerHis] palace to host the embalmed corpses of [Root.GetHerHis] kills, propped by [Root.GetHerHis] servants around a large table, wearing fancy outfits, immortalized in an ever-expanding feast of death.\nMany travelers have left [Root.Capital.GetName] horrified after a visit through this horrifying room, spreading its infamous tale across the realm.
I am always glad to add more guests to the party.

As unassuming and welcoming as [Root.Capital.GetName]'s palace might look on the outside, few visitors enter it without a heavy feeling of dread clouding their minds.\nThe manor of the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has become quite infamous for swallowing its guests without much warning. Nobody has ever found proof of the [Root.GetTitle]'s misdeed, or ever heard [Root.GetHerHim] order an execution, yet all [Root.GetHerHis] enemies have the alarming tendency to disappear in mysterious circumstances and never be heard from ever again...

It is hard to reconcile [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s charming reputation as a guest with [Root.GetHerHis] equally notorious thirst for blood.\nTold to be a nightmarish creature of darkness, the [Root.GetLordLady] of [Root.Capital.GetName] stalks [Root.GetHerHis] preys with skill and finesse, gaining their trust and toying with them until [Root.GetHerHis] boredom forces [Root.GetHerHim] to end the suffering of one victim and move to the next.\nProtected by [Root.GetHerHis] rank and power, this repulsive murderer has been able to terrorize [From.GetHerHis] lands for years, becoming infamous throughout the realm.
Could we not discuss this in private?

Few can boast to have accomplished as much as [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has at such a young age as [Root.GetSheHe] did.\nHaving ascended to power while still a child, this prodigious ruler has been able to lead [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] through a series of astounding victories against its neighboring realms. \nClearly, this child was born for war and conquest, and there is no telling what [Root.GetSheHe] will be able to accomplish during the rest of [Root.GetHerHis] life.

After my most recent victory, I have reunited my most trusted commanders to discuss our future military campaigns. Through my skill and dedication, I have earned the loyalty of my armies and immortalized my name as one of the great conquerors of our time, one who emerged triumphant from countless battles.
It is only through virtue that victory is achieved.
Make a speech about knightly values.
Make a speech about your future conquests.
Philosophy and good strategy have led us here.
Make a speech about studying your enemies to achieve victory.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has risen as a shining example of knightly virtue that will not soon be forgotten.\nA paragon of gallantry and valor on the battlefield as well as at court, [Root.GetSheHe] is living proof that ruthlessness and deceit are no requirement to excel on the field of battle. With a pure heart filled with the glory of Our Lord and an unwavering discipline, tempered by countless battles and tournaments, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has triumphed over [Root.GetHerHis] enemies time and again, inspiring many young [Root.GetMenWomen] to follow in [Root.GetHerHis] footsteps and sing of [From.GetHerHis] legendary feats.
To protect the innocent and defend the defenseless!

Scarcely any ruler bordering [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] sleeps well at night, tormented by the dreams of conquest of their terrible neighbor. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has carved a blood-soaked path through the lands of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], earning the fame of a ruthless and fearsome warrior.\n None is safe from [Root.GetHerHis] reach, and it is hard to say if [Root.GetHerHis] thirst for conquest will ever be satisfied. A cunning and relentless commander, [Root.GetSheHe] has overseen countless victories on the battlefield and acquired immortal glory for [Root.GetHerselfHimself] as well as all [Root.GetHerHis] descendants.

By emulating some of the greatest and wisest Kings of old, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has achieved a perfect balance between wisdom and grit, becoming both a scholar and a warrior, and applying the vast depths of [Root.GetHerHis] knowledge to lead [Root.GetHerHis] armies to countless victories and earn eternal glory for [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty.\nFew people can claim to have accomplished as much as [Root.GetSheHe] has within their lifetime, excelling both in spiritual and political disciplines to such an extent. \n[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s name will surely be remembered in many legends by future generations as that of a respected and fearsome warrior-philosopher.
Clarity of mind and firmness of intent.

With the child having ascended to the throne at such an early age, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s inheritance was initially perceived by many as the beginning of a period of instability and fear for the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Instead, the child [Root.GetTitle] ushered a new era of peace and prosperity throughout [Root.GetHerHis] realm, ruling firmly and kindly, and showing a wisdom far beyond [Root.GetHerHis] years.\nMost of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects now praise [Root.GetHerHim] for [Root.GetHerHis] enlightened rule, claiming that [Root.GetSheHe] must have been blessed by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
A mere child led [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to greatness.

Through my considered and cautious leadership, I have been able to maintain my realm at peace, both from external and internal threats, ensuring security and prosperity for all my subjects. Few rulers can claim the same dedication as I have shown, forsaking the lure of conquest to protect their people.
It is my solemn responsibility to keep them safe.
Rejoice! We will share our wealth with everyone!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has risen as a symbol of peace and prosperity for all the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThrough diplomacy and intimidation, [Root.GetSheHe] has managed to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] realm at peace for as long as most people can remember.\n[Root.GetHerHisCap] tireless devotion to the protection of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects has earned [Root.GetHerHim] the respect of many and ensured that [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty will forever be associated with safety and tranquility, and [Root.GetHerHim] as the benevolent [Root.GetFatherMother] of the realm.
A prosperous and peaceful future is ahead of us!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has risen as a symbol of peace and prosperity for all the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThrough diplomacy and intimidation, [Root.GetSheHe] has managed to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] realm at peace for as long as most people can remember, enriching both [Root.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.\nRather than waste lives and wealth after elusive victories on the field of battle, [Root.GetSheHe] has decided to share [Root.GetHerHis] riches with [Root.GetHerHis] subjects, in an endless cavalcade of feasts and fairs that have earned [Root.GetHerHim] the love and reverence of many people in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond.
Life is short, let us celebrate!
The wonders of carpentry and engineering for the benefit of our people.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s tireless efforts in the construction of new fortifications aimed at the defense of [Root.GetHerHis] realm have immortalized [Root.GetHerHis] name as an ingenious and considerate planner.\n[Root.GetSheHeCap] has populated many of the hills of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] with impregnable embodiments of [Root.GetHerHis] wondrous technological ingenuity, projecting a sense of safety to all [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.\nFor some time now, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has acquired a reputation as a realm of towers and stone walls, secure from even the wildest horde.
A strong defense is the best guarantee for safety.

In an unparalleled show of devotion, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated [Root.GetHerHis] life to the construction of sacred monuments honoring the glory of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].\nScarcely any town within [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is beyond walking distance from a sanctuary of some sort, and every major city in the realm has come to host the majestic sight of a great cathedral.\nSeveral members of the clergy have celebrated [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s virtuous projects on multiple occasions, and the [Root.GetTitle] has become a symbol of craftsmanship dedicated to heavenly pursuit.
Through our works on Earth we are rewarded in the afterlife.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s name has become synonymous with war and mayhem.\nDriven by an insatiable thirst for blood and conquest, this [Root.GetManWoman] is said to possess both the ferocity of a lion and the cunning of a fox, pursuing [Root.GetHerHis] mad ambitions with no concern for mercy and honor.\n[Root.GetHerHisCap] infamous exploits and the vile tactics with which [Root.GetSheHe] has achieved many victories on the field have stained [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty forever.

Through [Root.GetHerHis] just and considerate rule, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] realm in a state of peace and prosperity for several years.\nDespite being a distant and cold ruler, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has had a reign surprisingly devoid of malignant rumors or dissident factions.\nMost people assume that this is but the natural consequence of a wise [Root.GetManWoman] being in charge, yet an unspoken sense of uneasiness appears to loom over the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]...
A peaceful land, a quiet people.

A patron of the crafts, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has brought unparalleled fame to [Root.GetHerHis] family with [Root.GetHerHis] unfettered patronage of countless enterprises, overseeing the construction of new temples, castles and entire cities all across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\nThanks to [Root.GetHerHis] wise investments, the realm's wealth has been increased beyond measure, and for this [Root.GetSheHe] is sure to be remembered for generations to come.
A name as durable as the foundations of the realm.

Sacrifices must be made when creating something great.
No one more than [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has exemplified this concept during the course of [Root.GetHerHis] bloodied realm.
The [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is celebrated as the founder of many marvels of modern architecture, yet [Root.GetSheHe] is also associated with several violent deaths and sinister plots.
It has become a common saying for the people of [Root.Capital.GetName] that any new building ordered by the [Root.GetTitle] is yet another tomb where [Root.GetSheHe] will hide the remains of [Root.GetHerHis] next victim.
A realm in peace and prosperity.
We must ensure the protection of our subjects.
Earthly conquests are meaningless before the glory of the heavens.
I will become a paragon of virtue!
致力于提升你王朝的荣誉。
I will bring prosperity and knowledge to my realm.
致力于提升你领地的声誉。
致力于在你的臣民面前彰显你的权威。
I will find my own path.
It is clear that only by cultivating an impeccable reputation I will be able to make the memory of my name stand the test of time.
I will be a just and virtuous ruler.
Work on forging a §YBloodline§! based on your own accomplishments.
My dynasty's emblem will shine over all others.
Work on forging a §YBloodline§! based on your family's prestige.
[Root.Capital.GetName] will be a bastion of theological thought!
Work on forging a §YBloodline§! by sponsoring theological studies within your realm.
[Root.Capital.GetName] will be a capital of arts and philosophy!
Work on forging a §YBloodline§! by sponsoring artistic and scientific pursuits within your realm.
Only through decisive action and by achieving complete control over my realm I will be able to immortalize my name for centuries to come.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] will show me the way to eternal glory!
Work on forging a §YBloodline§! by spreading the true faith across your realm and beyond.
I must be remembered, no matter how!
Work on forging a §YBloodline§! by increasing your power as [Root.GetTitle].

It has come to my attention that many of the realm's laws handling petty disputes are old and obsolete. Revising our legal system to provide fair and satisfying judgment will certainly improve the conditions of my subjects and increase the prestige of my dynasty.
I will lead this legal reform myself.
By acting fast and investing the most amount of resources, you will found a §YBloodline§! much sooner.
The most learned scholars in the realm will look into this.
By acting fast and investing a great deal of resources, you will found a §YBloodline§! sooner rather than later.
I will try to revise the legal system myself.
By investing a moderate amount of time and resources, it will take time for you to found a §YBloodline§!.
开宫廷会议的时候我会更加小心。
这将会花费你很多的时间去建立§Y血脉§!如果你只投入少量的时间和资源。
停止通过这种方式寻求建立你自己的§Y血脉§!。
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的法律改革终于划上了句号，在我的参与下新的问题似乎都被遏止了。贵族们担心这些法律太过于宽松，以至于会鼓励农民们回避义务并且加剧他们叛乱的倾向。
我会处理他们的担忧的。
We must be patient in this transitory phase of the reform.
Perhaps my reform is too extensive...
I will try to address their concerns.
Better to scrap the entire reform then.

By revolutionizing the legal system of [Root.GetHerHis] realm, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has enshrined [Root.GetHerHis] name as that of a wise and benevolent ruler, ready to hear the plight of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects and administer justice with a firm but gentle hand.\n[Root.GetHerHisCap] dedication to equity and virtue have undoubtedly ensured [Root.GetHerHim] a place by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s side and earned [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty a spot in history.

My dynasty has a large and proud history, yet I am sure by looking through the realm's records I will be able to find even more prestigious ancestors to adorn my family tree and increase my prestige and legitimacy.

Might be small, but I am sure that if I look hard enough through the realm's records I will be able to find enough prestigious ancestors to adorn my family tree and increase my prestige and legitimacy.
I will lead the research myself.
I will hire an entire group of scholars!
I can ask to my immediate relatives about it...
This is simply too much work.

Researching prestigious ancestors has helped me considerably to polish the reputation of my family, yet it is not enough. For our name to be remembered, we must endeavor to maintain a higher standard of behavior and class even today, despite our large numbers.

Researching prestigious ancestors has helped me considerably to polish the reputation of my family, yet it is not enough. For our name to be remembered, we must endeavor to maintain a higher standard of behavior and class even today, especially given the small size of our dynasty.
Each member of this family must be a paragon of nobility!
I will dedicate my entire life to this venture.
We must all do our part to immortalize our name.
I will try to dedicate more time to grooming...
I have greater responsibilities to attend to.

Thanks to the restless efforts of [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty has risen to fame amongst their peers as paragons of nobility and class.\n[Root.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself] has become a symbol of parental responsibility and familial duty. A sophisticated [Root.GetManWoman] who has devoted [Root.GetHerHis] entire life to uphold the honor and virtue of [Root.GetHerHis] family's good name, [Root.GetSheHe] has become an example for all esteemed aristocrats to follow.

Thanks to the restless efforts of [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty has risen to fame amongst their peers as paragons of nobility and class despite its small size.\n[Root.GetTitledFirstName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself] has become a symbol of parental responsibility and familial duty. In order to make [Root.Capital.GetName] a center of theological discussion, I must invest some resources to find notable scholars, acquire treaties of past theologians and build the infrastructure needed to host both. It will not be an easy or cheap endeavor, to be sure...
I will lead the search myself!
No price is too big to accomplish this holy quest.
A few notable scholars will be enough...
I will try to lead the search personally.
I did not think this task would require such costs.

Since I have started recruiting scholars and expanding the religious significance of my court, there has been a growing concern from the more conservative elements of the realm's clergy about the possibility that my research might undermine pre-existing religious practices.
I will need to discredit these people.
The findings of my scholars will speak for themselves.
I will divert some resources to reassure the opposition.
These people are simply envious of my achievements!
I dare not upset the clergy.
For a realm of integrity and virtue.

In order to attract artists and philosophers to [Root.Capital.GetName] I need to offer patronage and protection, as well as make sure that my court is an open space for free thinkers, one where they are able to express themselves and research new concepts without risk of punishment.
I will personally reorganize the court.

I will try to make the court a more welcoming haven for artists.
This task is too taxing for me.

Now that artists are finally starting to populate [Root.Capital.GetName] in great numbers, it is time for me to fund their activities and provide the books and materials they need to operate their craft.
I will lead the construction efforts personally.
A grandiose new library is what we need.
A large workshop should provide them with what they need.
I will host the best amongst them in my court permanently.
This is all well beyond my limited resources.

Having spent years of [Root.GetHerHis] reign sponsoring artists and philosophers within [Root.GetHerHis] realm, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has become famous as an enlightened patron of the arts, celebrated in poems, paintings and ballads all throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond.\nKnown as a learned and charming personality, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has become the archetype of the philosopher [Root.GetKingQueen] of [Root.GetHerHis] age, a protector of all that is beautiful and metaphysical.

My subjects must understand the depths of their depravity.
All the priests [Root.Religion.GetName] must fall in line with my quest.

The people will know of my great plans!

Everywhere I turn I see a new abominable product of heresy. Licentious poems, grotesque paintings, works of fictions trivializing the tales of our holy texts and confusing the common folks of [Root.Capital.GetName]. I must put a stop to all this degeneracy.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has become notorious for [Root.GetHerHis] staunch approach towards religion all throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. With their help, [Root.GetSheHe] has taken upon [Root.GetHerselfHimself] the holy task of cleansing all heretical inclinations from [Root.GetHerHis] subjects.

It has come to my attention that several old laws issued by less forward-thinking rulers than I are still plaguing the judicial system of our realm, imposing undue limitations to my authority as [Root.GetTitle]. How am I supposed to accomplish anything worthy of note when I am bound by the leftovers of a time long since forgotten?
I will revise the legal system myself.
I will hire scholars to look at and revise these laws.
I will try to revise the legal system myself.
My council will deal with this in due time.

Ever since I started my legal reform, I have had an increasing series of people, petty noblemen and peasants alike, pestering me about the changes I am making to our laws. 一些恰当的措辞，加上一点贿赂和胁迫，无疑是混淆敌人散布在我四周的一些恶毒谣言的正确性所需要的……
I would never raise a hand against my kin!

I will think of some better excuses.
Keeping together this intricate web of lies holding my good reputation is proving to be an increasingly difficult task.
Sometimes I wonder whether my courtiers really believe in the lies I tell them, if I really am as blameless to their eyes as I hope to be, or if instead I am surrounded by smiling enemies.

All these days spent in the field, shouting orders and hitting things have done wonders to improve my reflexes and endurance, yet they have not been good for my looks. The coarse voice, messy hair and foul stench are making me look more and more like a man than I would like to admit.

All these days spent in the field, shouting orders and hitting things have done wonders to improve my reflexes and endurance, yet they have not been good for my looks. Being such a popular public figure is proving to be more vexing than I ever thought possible. The expectations my guests have about me are quite high, and they appear very often to be focused on my appearance more than anything else. Most of the times, they will not even care of what comes out of my mouth, enthralled as they are by my voice.
If only I could avoid all of this attention...
Who needs brains when you have looks?

All these meetings and feasts I organize to keep my subjects and neighbors happy have come with no shortages of toasts to new friendships and a prosperous future. It is always quite inspiring, yet I am not sure how much dignified it is to reach the end of every night as a giggling goose.

All these meetings and feasts I organize to keep my subjects and neighbors happy have come with no shortages of toasts to new friendships and a prosperous future. It is always quite inspiring, yet I am not sure how much dignified it is to reach the end of every night as a grunting half-wit.

All these visits, feasts and celebrations are giving me endless new opportunities to further refine my palate with all sorts of exotic foods, and I fear that if I do not watch myself, the graceful figure I was blessed with will soon be a long-lost memory, as the paunch tightly pressing my dress can already attest.

All these visits, feasts and celebrations are giving me endless new opportunities to further refine my palate with all sorts of exotic foods, and I fear that if I do not watch myself, the fit body I was blessed with will soon be a long-lost memory, as my puffy jowls can already attest.

Clearing out the major pathways and establishing official outposts around the city's main roads can greatly facilitate the local garrison's efforts to defend travelers from brigands and wild animals.
A marvel of ancient empires, now restored for modern use, capable of quickly transporting water through the entire province.

Compartmentalized wall sections within the fortress ensure that, even in case of a breach, the garrison is able to trap the attackers within the outermost sections of the castle, preventing the sacking of the entire fortress.
The killing fields allow the garrison's archers to safely keep throwing arrows and stones at the attackers even after they have breached through the main walls.
These overhanging holes embedded between the castle's corbels allow the defenders to throw rocks, bees, boiling oil and other unpleasant items at the attackers from a relatively safe position.

The latest innovation in military engineering, a reinforced barbican will force the castle's assailants through a crooked and narrow path after the breach of the main gate, exposing them to heavy retaliation from the defenders.

All my informers are ready to relay my orders throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], using bribery and intimidation to prevent my subjects from conspiring against me and putting the realm's peace under threat.

The vile spies sworn to the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty have been unleashed once more upon [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Recent rumors have convinced the [From.GetTitle] that somebody might be conspiring against [From.GetHerHim] and, as has become tradition for some time now, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent [From.GetHerHis] cronies to pressure all of [From.GetHerHis] subjects into submission.
You are forced to disassociate from any §YFaction§! in §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
It looks worse than usual, too...
Has it been a year already?

Peace is not easily ensured upon the unruly masses. Even now, my vassals keep conspiring within the inscrutable depths of their thoughts, where my spies cannot reach them. If I wish to find proof to frame them, I must be vigilant. Every cowardly twitch and bashful gaze around me betrays their treasonous hearts.
Yet, I should not let fear cloud my judgment.
A keen mind is necessary to achieve peace.

More naive rulers might claim that stability and prosperity in government is achieved through an open relation of mutual trust between a liege and [Root.GetHerHis] vassals, yet nothing could be further from the truth. To give my subjects any reprieve from scrutiny would only invite insubordination and chaos.
All that said, I should show them some compassion.
The more I squeeze, the tighter my grip over them.

It is my sworn duty to uphold the peace over [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. In order to do so, I must crush any form of organized resistance coming from my rebellious subjects. Hardening my heart against their entitled demands is something that I do for their own good.
I am nothing if not just.
Not that I mind doing it, of course.
The ruling dynasty has taken a grim interest in §YEngineering§!

An austere and imposing statue, representing one of the esteemed members of the realm's ruling dynasty. Its cold, stern gaze overlooks the battlements, inspiring a lingering sense of dread amongst the masses.
An intricate network of watchtowers ensures that the garrison of this fortress can maintain absolute control over anything happening within the castle.
An isolated tower, built not too far from the main castle, providing the garrison with an advanced outpost and a more secretive place to deal with inconvenient prisoners.
A massive building raised within the fortress' walls, surrounded by bloodied pikes and overlooking a large execution stand.

Each member of our prestigious family must serve as an example of class and nobility if we wish to maintain our renown.

I worry about [meddling_target.GetFirstName]. If [meddling_target.GetSheHe] is going to represent the prestigious [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] name, [meddling_target.GetHerHis] bearing and behavior should be impeccable.
I have a few words about [meddling_target.GetHerHis] habits...
A [meddling_target.GetManWoman] of [meddling_target.GetHerHis] stature should strive for a better image.
Try to improve §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s look and bearing.
On second thought, I think [meddling_target.GetSheHe] is fine.
I need to help [meddling_target.GetHerHim] take care of [From.GetHerselfHimself].
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] should take [meddling_target.GetHerHis] marital responsibilities more seriously!
[From.GetSheHeCap] should start acting like a proper [scoped_founder.Culture.GetName].
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] should focus more on [meddling_target.GetHerHis] responsibilities and less on [meddling_target.GetHerHis] looks.
Would it kill [meddling_target.GetHerHim] to brush [meddling_target.GetHerHis] hair every once in a while?
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] always looks so frail! Does [meddling_target.GetSheHe] eats anything at all?
Try to convince §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! to eat more.
A new diet might improve §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s health.
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] is always eating, I worry about [From.GetHerHis] health.
Try to convince §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! to eat less.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] decided to visit me last night. [From.GetSheHeCap] has been concerned with my health as of late, and wanted to remind me that [From.GetSheHe] is always going to be ready to support me, and so is the rest of our family.
Thank you, I really needed that.

I have just received a long, stern chiding from my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] about my current conduct. [From.GetSheHeCap] has berated me for surrendering to vice and apathy in such a way as to bring dishonor to our prestigious family name, and urged me to change my attitude immediately.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has decided to give me a long talk about the virtues and responsibilities of a good [Root.GetManWoman] towards [Root.GetHerHis] family, about the necessity to remain faithful to one's spouse, build a relationship based on trust and respect, and, most importantly, maintain the bloodline going with new heirs.
I will try to do better.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been pressuring me for quite some time now to fall in line with the [scoped_founder.Culture.GetName] customs upon which our great dynasty has been founded. According to [From.GetHerHim], only by embracing this culture I will be able to set good morals for my descendants to follow.
That is ridiculous! I was raised [Root.Culture.GetName]!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] believes that I spend too much time worrying about my looks and not enough studying and tending to my responsibilities as a [Root.GetTitle], that I am wasting my youth as a vacuous fop and I will come to regret it in time.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] believes that I spend too much time worrying about my looks and that I will come to regret wasting my youth in such a vapid when my beauty has shriveled away and I am left with a wrinkled body and an empty head.
I will heed your words, dear [GetFromRelation]!
You are just jealous because you are old!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] believes that I do not spend enough time taking care of my image, that it is extremely important for a young [Root.GetManWoman] of my stature to always appear at my best before my subjects. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that by neglecting myself I smear my family's good name.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] thinks that I am too loud and crass, that I spend too much time managing menial court affairs while forsaking my own grooming. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that a young [Root.GetLordLady] of my stature should always strive to look at [Root.GetHerHis] best, projecting an aura of grace and dignity by [Root.GetHerHis] very presence.
I have bigger responsibilities than looking pretty!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been encouraging me for some time now to try and eat more, fearing that my frugal diet might cause me to get seriously sick, and that my frail disposition might reflect badly on our family's prestige.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been encouraging me for some time now to try and eat more, insisting that I need to be sturdier if I wish to deliver strong children, and that my frail disposition might reflect badly on our family's prestige.
My diet is just fine as it is!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been encouraging me for some time now to try and eat less, fearing that immoderation in my diet might cause me to get seriously sick and, more importantly, that it might put a stain on our family's good name.

For some time now my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been making comments insinuating that I might be gaining too much weight, and that I should exert more moderation, especially during court dinners, as it is unfit for a [Root.GetLordLady] of my stature to be seen eating so much.

My [GetFromRelation] has heeded my call and finally embraced [From.Culture.GetName] customs. I am certain that [From.GetHerHis] new attitude will lead [From.GetHerHim] to treat [From.GetHerHis] subjects with decency and justice, and allow [From.GetHerHim] to teach good morals to [From.GetHerHis] children.
Now we truly look like [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetRootRelation]!

My [GetFromRelation] has stubbornly refused to listen to my advice. [From.GetFirstName] insists that [From.GetSheHe] was born and grown [From.Culture.GetName] and will not abandon the proud and moral traditions of [From.GetHerHis] culture.
How else can I make [From.GetHerHim] understand?

My [GetFromRelation] has taken to heart my advice and sacrificed some of the time [From.GetSheHe] wasted at the altar of vanity to focus on [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities instead. [From.GetFirstName] might not be quite as much the charmer with the ladies at court as [From.GetSheHe] used to be, but it is for [From.GetHerHis] own good.

My [GetFromRelation] has taken to heart my advice and sacrificed some of the time [From.GetSheHe] wasted at the altar of vanity to focus on [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities instead. [From.GetFirstName] might not be quite as much popular with the young lords and bards at the court as [From.GetSheHe] used to be, but it is for [From.GetHerHis] own good.

[From.GetFirstName] and I have never been as close as since I convinced my [GetFromRelation] to forsake empty vanity to focus on more concrete responsibilities. The rest of the court might see us as coarse and uncivilized, but we both know better now.
A sharp mind trumps a pretty face.
Perhaps I was too harsh with [From.GetHerHim]?

My [GetFromRelation] refused to follow my advice and is still spending an undue amount of time grooming [From.GetHerselfHimself] while neglecting some of [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities. I fear that [From.GetSheHe] is too enamored with [From.GetHerHis] own image to see how [From.GetHerHis] behavior is hampering is growth as a [From.GetManWoman].

Following my advice, my [GetFromRelation] has finally started to take better care of [From.GetHerselfHimself] and is slowly learning how to properly act at court. Even I was surprised to see how much more charming [From.GetSheHe] could become just by cleaning [From.GetHerHis] face and speaking more softly.

Following my advice, my [GetFromRelation] has finally started to take better care of [From.GetHerselfHimself] and is slowly learning how to properly act at court. [From.GetFirstName] looks more and more like a proper [From.GetLordLady] with each passing day. Bards might soon start writing songs about [From.GetHerHim].

By following my advice, [From.GetFirstName] has become quite the charmer. Maidens that would not have given [From.GetHerHim] a second look before are now filling the palace with their feverish gossiping about my [GetFromRelation]. I have never felt as proud of [From.GetHerHim] before.

By following my advice, [From.GetFirstName] has become quite the charmer. Young men that would not have given [From.GetHerHim] a second look before are now hopelessly competing for [From.GetHerHis] favor and attention, following my [GetFromRelation] whenever [From.GetSheHe] goes. I have never felt as proud of [From.GetHerHim] before.
You are finally starting to look like a proper [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
I hope [From.GetSheHe] does not go too far now...

[From.GetFirstName] refuses to listen to reason. My [GetFromRelation] seems to prefer acting like a wild animal, loud and uncivilized, too absorbed by [From.GetHerHis] own petty interests to understand how [From.GetHerHis] crass demeanor is costing [From.GetHerHim] the respect of [From.GetHerHis] peers and the dignity of [From.GetHerHis] family name.

I am glad to see my [GetFromRelation] has taken my advice to heart and started to eat more. A young, healthy [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] status should work on developing a robust and imposing figure, worthy of fear and respect.

I am glad to see my [GetFromRelation] has taken my advice to heart and started to eat more. A young, healthy [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] status should work on developing a robust frame and birthing hips.

Feeling [From.GetFirstName] encroaching on my place at the dinner table, I stick my elbow in [From.GetHerHis] gut, prompting my [GetFromRelation] to raise [From.GetHerHis] head from the plate. [From.GetSheHeCap] proclaims that there soon will not be enough space for both of us in the hall, at which point we both erupt in a bellowing laughter.

[From.GetFirstName] rests back [From.GetHerHis] head with a sleepy expression, pressing a napkin on [From.GetHerHis] mouth to suppress a belch. I point at the paunch pressing against [From.GetHerHis] dress and comment that, with such commitment to [From.GetHerHis] new diet, my [GetFromRelation] will soon outrank me as the largest member of our family.

Yet again, I meet my [GetFromRelation]'s gaze with scornful disdain across the dinner table, seeing [From.GetHerHim] refuse to finish [From.GetHerHis] first course. [From.GetFirstName] has completely ignored my advice.

My [GetFromRelation] has decided to follow my advice and finally change [From.GetHerHis] dieting practices. [From.GetFirstName] looks much more lean and spry already, as a [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] age should.

My [GetFromRelation] has decided to follow my advice and finally change [From.GetHerHis] dieting practices. [From.GetFirstName] looks much more graceful and delicate already, as a [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] age should.

Ever since [From.GetFirstName] decided to follow my advice, we have spent much more time together, eschewing the crass excesses of evening dinners for relaxing walks outside and quiet contemplation. My [GetFromRelation] has never looked better, having acquired a much more humble and collected figure, not unlike my own.

Ever since [From.GetFirstName] decided to follow my advice, we have spent much more time together, eschewing the crass excesses of evening dinners for relaxing walks outside and quiet contemplation. My [GetFromRelation] has never looked better, having acquired a much more diaphanous and elegant figure, not unlike my own.

Yet again, I meet my [GetFromRelation]'s gaze with scornful disdain across the dinner table, seeing [From.GetHerHim] demand another course for [From.GetHerselfHimself]. [From.GetFirstName] has completely ignored my advice.
This commander is focusing the training of [Root.GetHerHis] soldiers on stealth and espionage, making them more adept at seeping through the defenses of foreign armies.
By refining coordination between [Root.GetHerHis] troops, this commander has reduced the time required to mobilize [Root.GetHerHis] army.
By strengthening of communications and exploration efforts, this commander has increased the autonomy of [Root.GetHerHis] armies while in enemy territory.

I am thoroughly impressed by how seriously my [GetFromRelation] has taken on my advice to be an exemplar spouse. [From.GetFirstName] has acquired a reputation for courtly manners and undying loyalty of the kind that only bards sing about when referring to Princes in fairy tales.

I am thoroughly impressed by how seriously my [GetFromRelation] has taken on my advice to be an exemplar spouse. [From.GetFirstName] has acquired a reputation for unblemished fealty and staunch chastity of the kind that only bards sing about when referring to Princesses in fairy tales.

I am thoroughly impressed by well my talk with my [GetFromRelation] went. [From.GetFirstName] now fully understands the mutual bounds and responsibilities that bind us together, both in marriage and blood, and has taken on a completely new and inspiring attitude when it comes to upholding the sanctity of our union.
We truly are of one mind!
I could not ask for a more virtuous [GetFromRelation]!
[This.Founder.GetFullName]在[This.Founder.GetHerHis]执政期间化解和克服了每一次重大的威胁和挑战，以至于[This.Founder.GetHerHis]每一寸血液都因流淌于其血管中而成为传奇。
[This.Founder.GetFullName]精通于任何一件武器，总是身先士卒地投入战斗，后于他人而退出战场。
[This.Founder.GetFullName]被称为有史以来最美的[This.Founder.GetMenWomen]，无数人心中魅力非凡的梦中情人。
The lisp of this character sometimes causes them to mispronounce words.
I guess I'll just wait until nobody is around.

Ancestral legends tell of a time when the three brothers, Lech, Czech and Rus, went their own way to find fertile lands for their people. Today, countless generations later, all the children of this same ancestral blood are united under my rule, so it is only fit that we rid ourselves of our old and petty borders and formally establish one land in which all slavs will be as brothers and sisters.

Centuries ago, the three brothers Lech, Czech and Rus, our venerable ancestors, parted ways to settle their people. Divided by rivers, forests, mountains and wicked conquerors since time immemorial, we proved that blood is thicker than water, as today we celebrate the unification of all brothers and sisters of the great plain.
Together we will stand impervious to the tests of time!

These barracks provide [coptic.GetName] rulers with a strong force of spearmen to hold a defensive line against the enemy.
These barracks provide [assyrian.GetName] ruler with a strong force of infantry, capable of both offensive and defensive battles.
多亏了[This.GetTitledFirstName]的努力，[This.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族被普遍认为是亚历山大大帝的直系后裔。
[This.GetTitledFirstName]被许多智者称赞为印度的统一者，伟大的阿育王的转世。

亚历山大大帝与他史诗般的穿越亚洲的战役的传说在整个已知世界传唱。不计其数的年轻统治者们都曾把他们的生命徒劳地浪费在追赶这位传奇人物不朽的成就之上。\n尽管亚历山大达成了许多成就，但他英年早逝，膝下唯有一子，并没能建立起一个王朝。他的帝国注定在创建不久之后即悲剧性的崩塌。\n各民族与各宗教的统治者们都宣称他们的祖先可以追溯到亚历山大短暂的一脉，然而没有一个人能使他们的同侪与臣民们认同这一崇高的宣称。
我将成为第一个成功的！
试图伪造一个§Y亚历山大血脉§!的宣称。
一千年以来，这位伟大征服者最终安息的圣所一直是个争议性的话题。过去的许多罗马皇帝们都声称自己掌权后拜谒过亚历山大之墓，然而它的位置仍旧不为现下的学者所知。\n发现我祖先神圣的遗骸必将增强我对他血脉的宣称。作为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName][Root.GetTitle]，我比大多数竞争者离最有可能的地点更近。然而把时间和资源浪费在一项很多人都失败过的探索中可能并非上策。
一千年以来，这位伟大征服者最终安息的圣所一直是个争议性的话题。过去的许多罗马皇帝们都声称自己掌权后拜谒过亚历山大之墓，然而它的位置仍旧不为现下的学者所知。\n发现我祖先神圣的遗骸必将增强我对他血脉的宣称，然而把时间和资源浪费在一项很多人都失败过的探索中可能并非上策。尤其是考虑到，我的探险队想抵达最有可能的地点的话要走出多远。
必须找到亚历山大的遗骸！
Use your §YIntrigue§! and invest §YWealth§! to attempt to find §YAlexander's Tomb§!
Establishing a valid claim would be a better investment of resources.
Use your §YLearning§! and invest §YWealth§! to attempt to establish a claim on §YAlexander's Family§!
This search is taking too much of my time and resources.
Abandon your quest to claim §YAlexander's Bloodline§!.

No sooner Alexander had passed on that his generals had already started fighting for possession over his body. They knew that the one amongst them who became guardian of his remains would be acclaimed as his true successor.\nAnd in the same way, I am certain that by ensuring the recovery of Alexander's body my claim to his ancestry will be stronger than any upstart [Root.Culture.GetName] ruler. Having already spent several weeks consulting the most learned scholars in the realm to gather more information regarding the tomb's possible locations, it is now time for me to invest in a proper expedition to uncover the ancient sepulcher.
By investing a large amount of resources, you will greatly increase your chances of success.
I will buy the best equipment money can buy.
By investing a good amount of resources, you will increase your chances of success.
I cannot bankrupt my realm for this venture!
By investing a moderate amount of resources, you will decrease your chances of success.
The bare minimum is all I can afford.
By investing a small amount of resources, you will greatly decrease your chances of success.

历史学家们一致认同亚历山大与一位巴克特里亚公主生下了一位以他命名的儿子，然而这孩子的生平迷雾重重。等到他成年的时候，他应当从父亲那里继承的帝国早已被贪婪的军阀们瓜分，这让他根本不可能去继承。
毫不令人惊讶的，在对继业者们报复的恐惧中，亚历山大的妻子逃离他的军队，隐藏起他的孩子，让那孩子远离暗杀的企图。
认为他们的后裔们最终在[Root.Capital.GetName]避难并分成了[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]并不牵强。
我手下的学者们只需在我们家族的古老记录中找到正确的部分加以引用来揭开上述崇高的联系。
没有你们不能阅览的卷轴
我会扩展宫廷图书馆来容纳新书。
再有几篇论文肯定就够了吧？

我派出探险的英勇的队员们最终回到了[Root.Capital.GetName]。
他们带回了一件非凡的礼物：一具覆盖着古代珠宝的木乃伊，他们声称那就是我那独一无二的祖先。
在与我手下仔细检查了这具尸体每一个细节的学者们进行长时间的商讨后，我确定这次探险取得了成功。
丢失数个世纪之后，亚历山大大帝的身躯终于被找回，是我重新发现了它。要使我对亚历山大是我祖先的宣称变得无可非议只需再做一件事，那就是让这条消息传遍全世界。
Send out every messenger, inform every crier!
Everybody must know of this great discovery!
I should make sure all my subjects know of this.
An official statement should be enough.

The valiant members of my expedition have finally returned to [Root.Capital.GetName].\nUnfortunately, they do not bring much with them. A few rusted jewels and fragments of a skulls, which my scholars quickly dismiss as too recent to belong to the great conqueror.\nDespite the alleged care and efforts that they put into their search, my men were unable to succeed, wasting a considerable amount of my time and resources for nothing.
We must try again! That tomb must be somewhere!
Forget the tomb, we will pursue another path.
I have been ruined enough by this foolish venture.

It took us countless sleepless nights spent reading ancient tomes and pursuing forgotten scrolls, but we have finally achieved our goal. Under my lead, my group of scholars has been able to trace a lineage from the earliest known members of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty and the most plausible line of descendants of the glorious conqueror himself.\nThe only that is left now is to validate my claim in the eyes of my peers and subjects.\nMany envious upstarts are sure likely to dismiss my findings, jealous of my illustrious ascendancy. I will need to make sure that their voices are drowned out in the celebration for this momentous discovery.

Despite all the sleepless nights, hundreds of researched scrolls and learned scholars, my efforts to find a link between my dynasty and Alexander's unknown descendants has been fruitless.
Surely, a man that has traveled so far and wide, that has achieved so much during his brief life and earned eternal glory would not allow his glorious line to die out.
And a dynasty as powerful as mine, who has risen to hold the most esteemed throne of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] must surely trace its ancestry to the great conqueror himself.
Why is it then so hard for me to find the link between us?
Maybe I should focus my attention on Alexander's tomb.
We just need to look harder!

After years of study, research and investment, I have finally achieved my goal and eternally bound my dynasty's name to one of the greatest conquerors of known history.\nLong after I am gone, people will look at my descendants in awe and tremble at the very thought of meeting them on the field of battle.\nWithin our veins flows the same strength that subjugated Egypt, the same genius that cracked Babylon, the same ambition that led one man to travel from the heart of civilization to the edge of the world.

Despite my best efforts, my peers have yet to recognize the legitimacy of my claim to Alexander's ancestry.\nEven worse, my own subjects have reacted with apathy and skepticism to the news about my dynasty's prestigious founder. My councilors believe that the people are simply too ignorant to understand the importance of my discovery, while my peers are merely envious of its implications.\nFor one reason or the other, my quest is not over yet. My claim will have no value for as long as it is not universally recognized.
We need more celebrations and exposure!
The voice of the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will be heard!
There must be a way to educate those peasants...
没用，这除了浪费大把时间外毫无意义。

There have been many rumors about [From.GetTitledFirstName] recently.\nUsing the help of charlatans, sorcerers and grave-robbers, the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has fabricated a ludicrous claim to Alexander's the Great dynasty. Many rulers have made such ludicrous assertions in the past, trying to latch onto the glorious name of the ancient conqueror, yet none had been taken seriously, until now.\nBy associating [From.GetHerHis] family to Alexander, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded in increasing enormously the prestige of the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] for centuries to come.
How can people fall for such a blatant fabrication?
And I could not be happier for us!

Ashoka is remembered by many for his outstanding military victories and his wise and prosperous rule. Under his lead, all of India was unified and at peace.\nOf all the dynasties who hopelessly wasted their lives trying to emulate his accomplishments, mine was the closest to succeed. I have been pondering as of recently if the accomplishments of my family in reunifying India and holding it under a just and enlightened rule should be proof that the glorious spirit of Ashoka is being reincarnated through our bloodline, all the way to myself.

Ashoka is remembered by many for his outstanding military victories and his wise and prosperous rule. Under his lead, all of India was unified and at peace.\nMany rulers have wasted their lives hopelessly trying to emulate his accomplishments. As the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I have certainly come closer than most, and I wonder now if the feats of my family are proof enough that the glorious spirit of Ashoka is being reincarnated through our bloodline, all the way to myself.

Being already responsible for the reunification of India, my family has a greater claim to Ashoka's legacy than any other [Root.Culture.GetName] ruler, yet, in order for me to be formally recognized as a reincarnation of the enlightened Devanampiya Piyadassi, I must submit myself to the judgment of the wisest amongst us.\nI will call for the oldest and most prestigious Brahmins in India and allow them to examine my life and judge my character, so that they can confirm to my peers and subjects what I already know is the truth.

As a celebrated [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I have already a greater claim to Ashoka's legacy than many other [Root.Culture.GetName] rulers, yet, in order for me to be formally recognized as a reincarnation of the enlightened Devanampiya Piyadassi, I must submit myself to the judgment of the wisest amongst us.\nI will call for the oldest and most prestigious Brahmins in India and allow them to examine my life and judge my character, so that they can confirm to my peers and subjects what I already know is the truth.

They will be given our best accommodations.
We will treat them with the utmost care.
I am sure they will be honored to assist me.

The wise Brahmins that have gathered in [Root.Capital.GetName] to examine and determine whether I am worthy of calling myself heir to Ashoka or not claim that, before anything else, I must prove my courage to them.\nDespite being born the youngest of Maurya Bindusara's sons and from a mere lowborn, he proved unparalleled bravery during the course of his life, surpassing all of his siblings to arise as a paragon of virtue and discipline.\nIf I truly am the new lion of India, it should be easy for me to prove that I have the fortitude to meet my bold claim.
I will let my deeds speak for themselves...
Allow me to enlighten you with tales of my valor.
But where is the line between bravery and recklessness?
Speak! Whatever the challenge, I will take on it!
I submit myself to your judgment.
What- What kind of proof do you need?
The §YBrahmins§! will examine your conduct and deliver their judgment when they feel satisfied.

It has been months now, yet the Brahmins are unsatisfied with my conduct.
They claim that I have failed to meet the standards of Ashoka's divine valor, of his enlightened leadership in battle and strategic skills.
If I truly am is reincarnation, I should not dread the prospect of facing my enemies and my insecurities. 
Until I have proven to them the purity of my intent, they will not allow me to proceed to the next phase of their test.
I assure you, I will not disappoint you.
If only you could tell me more precisely what you expect of me...
I think you should  re-examine your definition of fear.
What more can I do to prove myself?
I will try my best to impress you.
I am not so sure about this...
This is impossible! Your standards are too high!
Abandon your quest to claim §YAshoka's Bloodline§!.

Ashoka's father may have been an Emperor, but his mother was a common woman, the daughter of a poor Brahmin, and he was but the last of a large litter of Princes.\nAlthough in time he arose far above his station, outshining both his siblings and his old father, it is only thanks to his humble beginnings that Ashoka was able to rule with justice and kindness over the many people of India, achieving harmony between our various creeds and customs.\nIf I am Ashoka's new form, then I must remember the low beginnings of my previous life and share his humility.
Let us talk of his story one more time, wise ones.
If I were proud, would I submit myself to your judgment?
Humility is relative to one's state.
I submit to your judgment, wise ones.
How can I possibly prove that?
Of course! I am the most humble [Root.GetTitle] ever!

Despite my many attempts to convince them otherwise, the Brahmins are not satisfied by my display of humility. They claim that my demeanor betrays the inner smugness of somebody born within the highest echelons of nobility, somebody that has no knowledge nor memory of hunger and anonymity.\nA few of them are convinced that my very desire to be recognized as the heir to Ashoka is proof enough of my unbridled pride.
I understand your concerns, but let us discuss the matter further.
Is your test not faulty to begin with then?
Could we better determine the requirements of your test?
I can only hope you to reconsider your judgment.
But I am humble! Are you blind?!
Enough. I cannot possibly prove this.

According to legend, Siddhartha Gautama was the first to predict the coming of Ashoka. The Gift of Dust, the story holding his prophecy, tells of a time when Ashoka, born as Jaya in one of his previous lives, saw Buddha wandering the streets of his village while playing in the mud. The child, taken by his desire to offer something to the wanderer, threw a fistful of dirt in the Tathagata's bowl.\nBuddha, moved by his gesture, predicted that Jaya would be reborn as Ashoka, Emperor of all India.\nThe Brahmins state that, in order to be acknowledged as Ashoka's new form, I will need to prove that I am just as charitable.
Behold, wise ones, the girth of my munificence!
Oh, yes, I understand what you mean, wise ones...
But how should be valued a gift requested?
I suppose I could make a show of charity...
I imagine a second fistful of dust will not be enough?

The Brahmins are not satisfied with my show of charity.\nThey claim that merely giving some gold to the less fortunate is not enough to prove the true purity of intent that Jaya showed when he met Buddha. When Ashoka's past form had almost nothing, he was still driven to share what little he had to a complete stranger.\nThey say that my display is vacuous at best in comparison as the gifts that I am giving to my subjects I will take back in time as their [Root.GetTitle].
I shall give more than they could ever repay me!
Perhaps it is you who require some of my charity?
How can I fill the hole in this bowl, wise ones?
I have to care for the realm's stability as well.
Still not enough to compare to a bowl of dirt?!
Enough. I have spent too much already.

It was not an easy task to convince the Brahmins, but their final response was inevitable.
It was only a matter of time before my true nature was revealed for all the world to admire. 
I am the last incarnation of Ashoka, the great unifier of India.
By returning in the form of [Root.GetFullName] I have led the people of this great land to peace and prosperity just as I did in my past life, and just like my successors will do after I leave this body.
