Overwhelmed by all [From.GetHerHis] new responsibilities, [From.GetSheHe] has become an unfocused, broken mess.
I should not have pushed [From.GetHerHim] this far...
The parents of this child are taking all possible precautions to shield [Root.GetHerHim] from harm and sickness.

Just as [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] is about to complain for the hundredth time about the poor locale my coronation is taking place in, one of the swines trotting around the main hall bumps into the Holy Father, slamming [coronation_priest.GetHerHim] headfirst into the mud. A dead silence falls upon the main hall.
I am mortified, Holy Father! Let me help you!
Pffh- I mean, do you require any assistance?
统治者能§Y改善§!邻国和臣民的关系

The oldest and wisest members of the tribe are given the authority to determine a proper successor amongst the members of the current ruling dynasty. As long as the Elders are satisfied with your leadership, they will tend to favor your candidate. If the Elders are displeased, they might pick a candidate that is not of your liking.
The divine blood of [This.GetFirstName] flows through the veins of all [This.GetHerHis] descendants, carrying a glimpse of its eternal power.
The bureaucratic and cultural revolution that the heavenly [This.GetTitledFirstName] has brought to [This.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have earned [This.GetHerHim] a place in the annals of history.
The members of this ruthless and infamous dynasty claim to be descendants of the Dragon-[This.GetTitle] [This.GetFirstName], notoriously famous for burning [This.GetHerHis] enemies to cinder.
Make a public display of the charred remains of your victims.

Tales of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s cruelty have spread far and wide across the lands of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], reaching greater and greater height at each new year.The monstrous tyrant of [Root.Capital.GetName] has burned scores of innocent people to satisfy [Root.GetHerHis] whims. \nBelieving [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to be more than a mere mortal, [Root.GetFirstName] proudly flaunts [Root.GetHerHis] disregard for human life, convinced to be far beyond the reach of [Root.GetHerHis] petty subjects.
The ancient fire of the Great Wyrms flows within my veins!

The [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] has always known how to properly deal with those that stand in the way of our glorious destiny. [From.GetFirstName]'s charred corpse is nothing but the last example of our power.
[From.GetSheHeCap] who toils with the dragon tastes the flames.
You have angered the dragon, proclaims the jailer, dragging me out of my cell with a mocking smirk. "And now you will taste [FromFrom.GetHerHis] flames."
No! Wait! You cannot do this!
The ancient flames that course through our veins will consume our enemies in a fiery whirlwind of vengeance, leaving nothing but cinders and charred bones.
I wonder how long it will last...
The fruit of [FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName]'s shameful infidelity has finally been born. I still cannot believe [FromFrom.Mother.GetSheHe] would betray me so brazenly.
My liege has agreed to give me the responsibility of handing out [From.GetHerHis] recently acquired titles.
My liege has denied to give me the responsibility of handing out [From.GetHerHis] recently acquired titles.

A bit of careful waiting, a few stings in the right places, and, just like that, the game is already over. Well, for [From.GetFirstName], that is. How unfortunate that [From.GetSheHe] will no longer be able to fulfill [From.GetHerHis] duties as my guardian anymore. Perhaps [From.GetHerHis] successor will be kinder to me.
Lure your §YGuardian§! to a secluded location to try and §Ykill§! [scoped_guardian.GetHerHim].
You can offer a member of your court of suitable age as a [Recipient.GetOppositeConsortSex].
Select a potential [Recipient.GetOppositeConsortSex]. Characters who are your close relatives will confer an opinion bonus (§G+$OPINION$§!).
因为[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetSheHe]使你的近亲，[Recipient.GetSheHe]非常感谢你（§G+$OPINION$§!）。
I think [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] would make you a most suitable [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetConsortSex]!
I accept your gracious offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will make a fine [Root.GetConsortSexCap]!
Character and §YLiege§! publicly follow the §YCathar§!, §YMessalian§!, §YBogomilist§!, or §YMazdaki§! religion
Character and §YLiege§! publicly follow an §YEqual§! or §YEnatic Clans§! religion
Character's and §YLiege§!'s religion must NOT have §YEnatic Clans§! feature
Try to influence §Y[sway_target.GetFirstName]§! into adopting one of your personality §YTraits§!.
I will never rest until [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is brought to justice!

Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W for a divorce from §Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§W. This will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and, if granted, will be viewed as an insult by [Actor.Spouse.GetPossPronoun] relatives. Fidelity and fertility of the spouse tend to be the main factors in determining the willingness of the [Actor.RelHead.GetTitle] to take such requests in consideration.

The story of the Roman Empire's glorious recovery will be told throughout the ages. Those unfortunate enough to have lived through the black days when barbarians sacked Rome at will or the Arab invaders swept in from the desert would not have dared dream of this day. All of the old provinces have been reclaimed and the Empire now stretches farther than it has in nearly a thousand years.\n\nBy shedding the weight of the dead god of the Galileans and re-embracing the Olympians the Empire of Caesar and Augustus has risen from its ashes. It will be a challenge to keep such a vast realm together, but for the sake of all humanity you must succeed, lest the world plunge into yet another dark age of ignorance and barbarity bereft of Rome's guiding light.

The story of the Roman Empire's glorious recovery will be told throughout the ages. Those unfortunate enough to have lived through the black days when barbarians sacked Rome at will or the Arab invaders swept in from the desert would not have dared dream of this day. All of the old provinces have been reclaimed and the Empire now stretches farther than it has in nearly a thousand years.\n\nCountless people from all races and creeds all across Europe are celebrating this momentous occasion and men and women in both Rome and Constantinople are weeping tears of joy. It will be a challenge to keep an empire of this scale together, but for the sake of all humanity you must succeed, lest the world plunge into yet another dark age of ignorance and barbarity bereft of Rome's guiding light.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is ready to contend with its weak and decadent opponents, be they missionaries or Crusaders.
A $TYPE$ named §Y$NAME$§! appears at the court of §Y$EMPLOYER$§!.\n
[Root.GetFirstName]'s duty to [Root.GetHerHis] tribe has given [Root.GetHerHis] life renewed strength and purpose.
This ruler has been forced to neglect some of [Root.GetHerHis] duties in order to focus on taking care of a distinguished Elder of [Root.GetHerHis] tribe.
One of the oldest, most distinguished members of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s tribe has showered this ruler with praise for [Root.GetHerHis] wisdom and foresight.

I may not be as strong and sprightly as I once was, but I have a duty to keep sharing my wisdom and advice to the brash, young members of [Root.Capital.GetName], thus ensuring the prosperity of my tribe. Somebody must tell these kids all the things that they are doing wrong.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to appear unannounced at my court this morning, claiming that [From.GetSheHe] is pleased by my leadership and that [From.GetSheHe] wishes to follow my progress as [Root.GetTitle] more closely, while providing me with [From.GetHerHis] priceless advice.
All the other §YElders§! in §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! will be pleased by your decision.
Who do you think you are, old [From.GetManWoman]?
All the other §YElders§! in §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! will be displeased by your decision.

After a long period of constant fights, [From.GetTitledFirstName] finally decided to leave me and my court in peace. Unfortunately, [From.GetSheHe] is now wandering through the realm, warning all the other esteemed Elders of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] about my allegedly poor treatment of [From.GetHerHim].
I assure you, [From.GetSheHe] has always been impossible to deal with.
Convince the other §YElders§! to ignore §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!'s rumors about you.
At least we will have some quiet...

[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] might be a good and wise ruler, but [scoped_ruler.GetSheHe] often has a hard time when it comes to spotting talent amongst [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] people. Luckily for [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim], I am here to help.
There is but one person fit for this job...
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to you.
You need only to look at [scoped_recipient_first.GetFirstName]!
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to §Y[scoped_recipient_first.GetFirstName]§!.
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to §Y[scoped_recipient_second.GetFirstName]§!.
[scoped_recipient_third.GetFirstName] is the most competent [scoped_recipient_third.GetManWoman] I can think of.
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to §Y[scoped_recipient_third.GetFirstName]§!.
Then again, maybe there is a lack of talent around here...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been pestering me from some time now about how [scoped_potential_count.GetFirstName] would be a model vassal if only I gave [scoped_potential_count.GetHerHim] a chance.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been pestering me from some time now about how I should share some of my responsibilities with [From.GetHerHim] if I wish to see our people prosper, yet I cannot shake the feeling that [From.GetSheHe] just wishes to own more land...

It took me some time to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] of [scoped_potential_count.GetFirstName]'s clear potential, but I was able to get my way in the end. I am certain my [GetFromRelation] will not have reason to regret [From.GetHerHis] decision.

It took me some time to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] that I am still perfectly capable of administering more land and that granting me a new title would be merely in the interest of a prosperous [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but I was able to get my way in the end.
The words of a wise [Root.GetManWoman] are hard to dismiss.

Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to ignore my words. I cannot believe that [From.GetSheHe] would so easily dismiss the council of one of the elders of [From.GetHerHis] realm. Such a shortsightedness should never be tolerated in leadership.
What a foolish and impertinent child!

It is quite clear that [scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] is too inexperienced and foolish to handle all [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] responsibilities as [scoped_ruler.GetTitle]. Luckily for [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim], I am here to help [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim] find someone skilled enough to share [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] responsibilities.
Clearly, I need to take charge personally.
One cannot deny [scoped_recipient_first.GetFirstName] has a... sparkle, of sorts.
[scoped_recipient_third.GetFirstName]'s potential is sure to blossom... eventually.
Then again, maybe [scoped_ruler.GetSheHe] is better off alone.

As if having to regularly deal with [From.GetHerHis] inane prattling was not enough, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been tormenting me from some time now about the necessity of sharing my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle] with one of [From.GetHerHis] spineless sycophants.

As if having to regularly deal with [From.GetHerHis] inane prattling was not enough, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been tormenting me from some time now about the necessity of sharing my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle] with [From.GetHerHim] by granting the old [From.GetManWoman] direct control over one of my provinces.
Whatever will make you shut up!
For once, it appears I have been able to instill some wisdom in [From.GetFirstName]'s thick skull. After a long and lively discussion, the [From.GetTitle] has finally decided to give into my demands.
Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] is not so bad a [From.GetTitle] after all...

It was too much of me to expect that [From.GetFirstName] would listen to reason now after ignoring my council for so long. The stubborn [From.GetTitle] has rebuked my suggestion again and again, too shortsighted and proud to admit the merit of my argument.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been complaining for some time now about how nobody listens to [From.GetHerHim] anymore and that we all should show more respect and bear more attention to an esteemed elder of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. In truth, I believe [From.GetSheHe] just feels lonely.
I will make sure you are not neglected.
I know exactly what you need...
There must be something I can do to help you feel better...

It has been a few weeks now since [From.GetTitledFirstName] started to claim I would make a wonderful [Root.GetTitle] for [scoped_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. It seems the old [From.GetManWoman] is fed up with [scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]'s lack of respect and would be ready to legitimize me as [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] successor, should I decide to depose [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim].
That is something to think about...

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has been going around [Root.Capital.GetName] praising [From.GetFirstName], claiming that [From.GetSheHe] would make a much better [Root.GetTitle] than I do. Perhaps I should have not treated the Elder so poorly...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been going around [Root.Capital.GetName] for a few days now, praising me as one of the wisest rulers [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has seen in decades. Knowing that one of the oldest, most esteemed people in the realm supports me so openly has undoubtedly increased my standing amongst all vassals.
I have always been fond of [From.GetHerHim].

Having long since recognized me as a ruler worthy of praise and respect, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to dedicate some of [From.GetHerHis] dwindling time to share a spec of [From.GetHerHis] ancient wisdom with me, so that I may pass it down to my own descendants.
Tell me of the customs of our ancestors.
You must have watched over many rulers in your time...
I would like to know more about our people's legends.

There are many deities whom I can choose to follow. Will it be motherly Tsumburbura, Goddess of Fertility? Perhaps the moon spirit Ayyur, who knows how to guide me and help my negotiations? On the other hand, for wealth and prosperity, I could turn to the great snake Bida...
I will dedicate my prayers to Ayyur to give me guidance and wisdom.
Bida will bless me with riches beyond imagining.
It shall be Tsumburbura. May the mother protect me.
Strong and mighty Dongo, I will do battle in your name!

Mighty and enlightening Ayyur is a spirit associated with the Moon. Like its light, Ayyur brings brightness in a dark. At night he reads the minds of all living creatures. He offers his inspiration and guidance to all who worship him and sacrifice to him.

Bida, the great snake of Wagadu lives with all its seven heads in deep pit, hidden from eyes of mortals. Bida must be appeased with annual sacrifices and gifts, but in return, the snake eagerly bestows protection and abundance of gold and rain to those who serve him.

The mystical goddess Tsumburbura is the mother and founder of her people of Kano. She lives in a tree shrine on a Dala hill. She accepts any sacrifice and whoever pays her tribute, she shares her wisdom and power with him.

All hail the mighty Dongo, the great warrior king who transcended the bonds of mortality to rule forever! His weapons are stones and lightning, with whom he vanquishes the unworthy and brings justice wherever he goes.
This character is a devout follower of Ayyur, the African moon deity, the provider of wisdom and guidance.
This character is a devout follower of Bida, the African snake deity of prosperity.
This character is a devout follower of Tsumburbura, the African deity of motherhood.
This character is a devout follower of Dongo, the African deity of thunder and war.
It is well known that this character possesses the compassion and dignity of the God Ayyur.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Ayyur. In his name you have promote peace and understanding between your subjects. As a result, your diplomatic skills have been improving.
A deeply revered [west_african_pagan_reformed.GetName] deity, the spider-god Anansi is a famous trickster, considered to be the spirit of all knowledge of stories.
The rainbow serpent is a mediator between spirits & the living in Vodun mythology, that maintains balance, order, peace and communication.
The people of the Book are fascinating to many [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers, who have often been ready to embrace some of the customs of their neighbors.
The people of the Book are fascinating to many [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers, who have often been ready to embrace some of the customs of their neighbors.
One of your neighbors or lieges must follow a §YChristian§!, §YIslamic§! or §YJudaic§! religion
Develop §YSympathy§! from a neighboring §YAbrahamic§! religion group.

You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Anansi. In his name you have plotted and spied, orchestrated wild schemes and manipulated friends and family. As a result, your skills of intrigue have been improving.
I shall erect a monument in the honor of Anansi.
I shall erect a monument in the honor of Dan.

Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Anansi' honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].

Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in honor of the Rainbow Serpent, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].

There are many deities whom I can chose to follow. Will I seek glory in battle by praying to Dongo, or curry the favor of the spider-god Anansi? Yet, if I wish to be blessed with a balanced life, to grow wise and old, perhaps I should look at Dan for guidance.
Anansi will grant me wit and finesse!
Dan will inspire in me wisdom far beyond my years.
Perhaps another spirit will be a better fit for me...
Great Anansi, share your secrets with me, and I shall keep them. The spider-god will guide me through the intricate web of lies out of which our world flourishes.
Glory to the Rainbow Serpent, the holy mediator between spirits and the living, he who maintains balance, order, peace and communication across our worlds!
Perhaps I will study the Book another time...
Rome is not to be ruled by a child

The Imperial Council and the Commanders of the Imperial Army can influence the selection of the new Emperor. Unlike Feudal Electors, each member of the Imperial Court has a different voting strength, based on his prestige, minor titles and attributes, making some electors more influential than others. The Emperor wields the most influence, unless disfigured, deformed or underage. Close relatives of the ruling Emperor, Commanders, Marshals and Claimants are all viable candidates for succession.

An Imperial government differs from its feudal counterpart by placing a larger focus on urban areas and a centralized court whose influence deeply affects internal politics. Councilors and Commanders hold a varying degree of influence, depending on their prestige and competence, which they can use to support or oppose the official heir of the Empire...
Ruler has a valid imprisonment reason

The Emperor and the seven Prince-Electors can nominate a successor from among themselves, any legitimate children and siblings of the ruler, as well as any other major dejure vassal of the Empire, as long as they share the same religion. If an historical elector title is held by infidels or does not exist, another dejure vassal will take its place. If the Empire is run under §YPapal Investiture§! or by a §YDogmatic§! religion, the Prince-Bishops hold a greater sway over the election.
The [Root.GetTitle]'s body should NOT be twisted or disfigured

A child's word is worth nothing

[Root.GetFirstName] is a manipulative demagogue with high §YDiplomacy§!

A famous bard named [invited_character.GetFirstName] has arrived to my court, lured by tales of my family's generosity towards all artists and craftsmen. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] hopes to join my court and offer [invited_character.GetHerHis] services to such an illustrious patron of the art as I am.
I am afraid you will have to look further.

A renowned scholar has arrived to my court to request an audience with me. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] says [invited_character.GetSheHe] has heard tales of how my dynasty has always offered safe haven and patronage to scholars and artists, and that [invited_character.GetSheHe] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerHis] vast metaphysical knowledge to my service.
I am afraid I must decline your offer.

A mysterious [invited_character.GetManWoman] has reached my court. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims to be a renown scholar from a place far away, who was cast out by [invited_character.GetHerHis] people for [invited_character.GetHerHis] unyielding devotion to knowledge. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] hopes that a prestigious patron of the arts such as myself would have greater foresight than [invited_character.GetHerHis] previous liege.

A mysterious [invited_character.GetManWoman] has reached my court. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims that [invited_character.GetSheHe] was forced to leave [invited_character.GetHerHis] homeland amidst spurious accusation of witchcraft laid against [invited_character.GetHerHim]. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerselfHimself] to me, hoping that I will show greater foresight than [invited_character.GetHerHis] previous liege.
All scholars are welcome at my court!
I cannot soil my good name by employing criminals.
There is a rare chance of characters growing to become great conquerors with higher attributes and special casus belli.
No Children of Destiny will ever be born.
What?! Friendship is not worth money!

Apparently the church has found a fitting Saint of the faith. [saint_person.GetTitledName] has proven to be an exemplar of the faith, as well as having done miracles.

[saint_person.GetTitledName] is a well known exemplar of our faith, who recently passed away. Discussions about permanently venerating [saint_person.GetHerHim] as an ancestor have come up, but everyone is waiting for my final decision on the matter.

[saint_person.GetFirstName]活过了虔诚而节制的一生，不愧为[saint_person.Religion.GetName]的真正楷模。[canonizer_person.GetBestName]隆重地宣布将[saint_person.GetFirstNameWithNick]的名字那些备受尊崇的先圣荣列同榜。

[saint_person.GetFirstName]在一生中的所作所为被编成故事为人传颂，而[saint_person.GetSheHe]必将在将来的岁月中激励我们一代又一代的子孙。

而对于他的家族而言，这无疑是备受祝福的荣耀。因而也许我们都会立志不懈地追随[saint_person.GetHerHis]脚步。

The Papacy long claimed to be the rightful heirs of the Romans, since they took control of the central regions of the Italian Peninsula. With the recent conquests of [From.GetTitledName], [From.GetSheHe] has claimed the regions for [From.GetHerselfHimself].\n\nThough the Pope has been raging about [ThePope.GetHerHis] losses, and this affront to the Church, most lords and ladies throughout [ThePope.GetHerHis] old lands have accepted the rule of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Bold moves, let us see how it will work out.

Though [ThePope.GetTitledName] fought long and hard for [ThePope.GetHerHis] lands in the Italian Peninsula, [ThePope.GetSheHe] has finally had to give up. With the losses, [ThePope.GetSheHe] has also had to relinquish all their old claims to the Roman lands stretching throughout the peninsula.\n\nWithout the Papal influence throughout the peninsula, new conquerors and nobles will certainly try to fill the void left by the Holy See. The rulers and city-states throughout the lands, embrace for the conflicts that is sure to come.
By the logic of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] I will convince them to leave my people alone.
Give §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! all the realm land in the §Y[northern_crusade_duchy_title.GetFullBaseName]§!

To the esteemed [Root.GetTitledName]

The Teutonic Order thanks you for your aid throughout the war for [northern_crusade_title.GetBaseName].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the esteemed [Root.GetTitledName]

The Teutonic Order thanks you for your aid throughout the war for [northern_crusade_title.GetBaseName]. We have sent you a small gift to show our appreciation for your assistance.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
It was the least I could do.

After repeated tries to pacify the north, the Teutonic Knights have finally given up. At every turn, the pagans of the north have come together to protect their way of life.

As the Teutonic Knights finally renounced their Crusade against the pagans, the other Christians in the north will surely have a harder task at hand. With their opponents leaving, the pagans look to the south for potential new expansion.

The rest of the world awaits the pagan fury. The unquelled rampage of the north will surely come soon.

A large honor guard of the Teutons appear outside of [Root.Capital.GetName], led by [From.GetTitledName] [From.GetHerselfHimself]. In response to my aid in their latest wars, they have decided to award me and all my descendants the honor of friendship with the Teutonic Knights.\n\nForevermore, the Order will stay by our side as valiant knights and friends, if we should ever need them.

Though it has been a long and grueling fight between the Teutons and the natives of the [northern_crusade_kingdom.GetAdjective] lands, the campaign has finally ended with victory for the Christians.

No longer will the faithful in the north fear for their lives, as the Teutonic Knights patrol the lands and make sure to punish any infidels who dare step into Christian lands. What was once known as the pagan fury of the north has been pacified, never to be seen again.

The rampage and danger has ended.
It seems I have waited too long, as my men and all my preparation starts to come apart. It seems people lost faith in my plans, when I did not start any wars for Iberia.

Magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

Your plans to reconquer Iberia for Christianity inspires me to take up arms as well, and I will support your efforts to the best of my ability.

Your ally,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

I have declared a reconquest war on [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName], and I am looking forward to see you on the battlefield.

Signed,
Your ally, [From.GetTitledName]
As promised, we will do our part and help out.

After leading troops on both sides of the wars raging throughout the Iberian Peninsula, I seem to have grown quite the reputation among the local peasants and soldiers on both sides.

Though some would consider me a mercenary or a traitor to the faith, my prowess in war has made me a hero among most, and revered among the populace. Some would even go as far as to call me a folk hero.

Surely, my actions must have been righteous, seeing all the responses. I have often wondered if it would all be worth it in the end, and it is a joyous occasion to see all my hard work has paid off.
I will be remembered throughout the ages.

I have fought for the faith several times these recent years, to recapture the Iberian Peninsula  as a true vanguard for Christendom and its followers.

Though we were occupied by the Moors of Al-Andalus invading from the south who forced their way into the heartlands of Christianity, we have pushed them out of our home. Step by step, we have regained what is rightfully ours.

Hispania will rise as a bastion of Christianity once more. We will make sure of it.

[Root.GetTitledName]

I have heard about your struggles against the other [FromFrom.Religion.GetGroupName]s, and I would like to assure you I do not share their animosity towards the [Root.Religion.GetName]s. For a small donation, I will be willing to help you out.

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

To the magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

I appreciate and accept your offer. I hope to be seeing you at the battlefield shortly.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the greedy [Root.GetTitledName]

Your despicable offer disgusts me. I hope to see you at the battlefield next, so I can cut you down together with the rest of the infidels.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

Your prowess in war is well known throughout the Iberian Peninsula, and I would like to offer your a sum of gold for your services in the current Reconquest War.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I think... Yes, that sounds like a good deal.
And betray my fellow [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s? I think not!

To the magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

I appreciate and accept your offer. I will be seeing you on the battlefield shortly.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Great! More allies are always needed!

To the despicable [Root.GetTitledName]

I find it insulting that you would even dare think I would betray my fellow [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
It seems I have to look elsewhere.

There will probably be men showing up to fight for the faith in the upcoming wars for Iberia, but I could invest some money into spreading the message far and wide to attract more well trained troops.
A small sum should be enough.
We need to make sure everyone hears about it.

The wars for Iberia are costly, and it has made a noticeable dent into my finances. [Root.RelHead.GetTitledName] has been a valiant supporter of our struggles for a long time, maybe it is time to ask [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] for help?
A small donation is all I ask for.
No no, it is all right, I do not need any help...

A massive creature of a [new_commander.GetManWoman] is brought in front of me, supposedly [new_commander.GetSheHe] has quite the renown as a commander. After seeing [new_commander.GetHerHis] interactions with some of my men, it is easy to see [new_commander.GetSheHe] knows what [new_commander.GetSheHe] is doing.
I am sure you will fit right in!
I got just the job for you!
Actually, I think we do not need another commander.
A captain of a small fleet of ships appears at my court, trying to sell his services in the upcoming wars. Some of my commanders question the need for ships, but surely I could find a use for them.
I will happily take you up on the offer.
You would not happen to know more captains, would you?
We do not need ships to fight at land!

A year has passed since I started my preparations for the reconquest of Iberia, and I am sure that whoever wanted to take part in the reconquest would have arrived by now. Now all that remains is to find a place to point my newfound allies towards.
Now to find a fitting target.

As the last in a long line of attempts to try to reconquer the Iberian Peninsula, [From.GetTitledName] has begun preparing [From.GetHerHis] troops and looking for allies for a new Iberian campaign. Trying to restore parts of the peninsula to Christendom, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has spent a noticeable amount of resources and sent out a call to gather troops from all around the region.\n\nWith the Christians planning for war, the other faiths have started assembling their troops to defend themselves. It is only a matter of months, or maybe a year, before the two sides will clash together once more, desperately trying to claw their way to more land in Iberia.
The Christian rabble does not belong here.

With the rise of the [e_spain.GetFullName], the Iberian Peninsula has come under total control of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s. There was a long struggle between the different faiths occupying the peninsula, but the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] believers has finally conquered their adversaries.\n\nWith the struggle of the two sides finally put to rest, Iberia can finally start looking forward to a peaceful future, free of the wars that has raged through the peninsula.
Hispania will be a cornerstone of our faith.

Not even the Balearic Islands have been safe from the Christian reconquest of Iberia. The final bastions of the other faiths in the region has fallen, now there is only Christendom left.\n\nWith Iberia finally restored to the faithful, the reconquest of the peninsula has ended, and peace has been restored. Once more a cornerstone of the faith, Iberia will surely play an important role in the region.

A minor noble has launched a campaign to start gathering troops to reconquer parts of Iberia. [From.GetTitledFirstName] asks for my help in supporting [From.GetHerHim], and taking part in the reconquest. This is a great opportunity to push back the infidels from Iberia.
Help a minor noble? I think not.
As the sponsor of the upcoming reconquest campaign, I have a prime opportunity to aid [FromFrom.GetDynName]. But in what manner will I help [FromFrom.GetHerHim]?
I will use my renown to find [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a lot of troops.
My connections with the clergy will prove invaluable.
Wealth can topple any enemy and bless any ally.
Why would I help out more than I already have?
As I walk through the streets of [current_location.GetName], I suddenly feel someone bump into me, as a boy runs down the street. With a pouch that looks surprisingly like mine in his hands!
No matter, there was not a lot of money left in it.
Let us find that kid and make him pay.
Maybe he could be of use to me?

After hearing about a wise man in the local area, I decide to go visit him and see what he has to offer. He starts talking about ephemeral concepts that sounds like blasphemy, but I tell my men to go outside so I can hear what he has to offer.
I will learn what he has to offer, blasphemy or not.
Blasphemers must die. I will see what the rest of his library has to offer.
Maybe [current_location.Religion.GetName] has more to offer than [Root.Religion.GetName]?
As we travel through [current_location.GetName], we come across a festival to ancient gods still celebrated by the local populace. It reminds me of some of the harvest festivals at home.
Let us take part in the festivities!
It is not befitting of a true [Root.Religion.GetGroupName].
Maybe these harvest festivals are to the real gods?

I wake up to the voice of what I am sure to be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] after a late night with my men. It only lasted for a second, but I am sure I was told to use all my resources to continue our righteous Crusade and help my allies.
Maybe I should not have had that much to drink.
I have been called to join the [decided_holy_order.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
夜晚当我们宿营的时候，带着十字架的骑手突然接近。他们由虔诚的[holy_order_meeting.GetTitledName]领导，和我们一起过夜。就在我要睡觉之前，[holy_order_meeting.GetFirstName]问我是否想和他交谈。
一个建立友谊的好机会。
My apologies, but it is too late for that.

My men and I find ourselves at a bar in [current_location.GetName], as evening turns to night. An attractive serving girl seems to pay me a lot of interest, and when I am about to go to bed for the night, she is clearly interested in joining.

My men and I find ourselves at a bar in [current_location.GetName], as evening turns to night. An attractive serving boy seems to pay me a lot of interest, and when I am about to go to bed for the night, he is clearly interested in joining.
I am not here to pick up foreigners.
Nobody will know about just one night.
You should join me at my court!
I have noticed that my men seem somewhat restless these last days. Our stay in [current_location.GetName] has taken its toll on them, and they seem a bit demotivated.
I will drill the men back into a fighting force!
Maybe the [current_location.Religion.GetName] faith has more to offer us?
I have to say the [current_location.Religion.GetGroupName]s have taken well care of [current_location.GetName] though.

After finally losing their final bastion, the Teutonic Knights are once more landless and have started traveling back to the core lands of Christendom.

As they no longer have a realm of their own, they are once more known as the Teutonic Order, and will offer their services to whatever Christian Lord or Lady fighting the infidels.

The fall of the Teutonic State is surely a blow to the Catholics
Those of the Order are not meant to rule.
Only the first of many to fall.
As a long-standing ally of the Teutonic Knights, they could be convinced to become vassals of the realm if they see us fit.
As a long-standing ally of the Teutonic Knights, we can hire a part of the Order as honor guards temporarily.
Start preparing a campaign against the infidels in Iberia, to reconquer parts of the Iberian Peninsula for Christianity. A large undertaking like this can usually only be done once a lifetime.

[combatant_1.GetBestName], my [combatant_1.GetRootRelation], has declared that [combatant_1.GetHerHis] claim on [target_title.GetName] cannot be ignored any longer. I am expected to meet [combatant_1.GetHerHim] in personal combat, "to once and for all settle this matter", the courier reads aloud. I can already hear the whispers through my court, if I were to decline the challenge...

I am [GetEducationActivity], in deep conversation with a fellow [GetEducationRole], when a red-faced courier bursts in. "Your [combatant_1.GetRootRelation] [combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] is challenging you, my [Root.GetLordLady]! To personal combat, for your titles!".
Only one of you is likely to walk away from this alive...!
No...! This is not how rules of succession should be treated!
This does not sound safe at all...!
This character is known for chickening out of a good challenge.

I am told that the [From.GetEducationRole] [From.GetTitle] furrowed [From.GetHerHis] brows and [From.GetEducationReaction], upon hearing my proposal. "I think [From.GetSheHe] understood the humiliation [From.GetSheHe] would suffer by declining, my [Root.GetLordLady]" the courier suggests. "Clever [From.GetManWoman]", I mutter. The duel is soon to take place.

The response from [From.GetBestName] feels [From.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], and I have my advisors read through it a couple of times. Finally, they nod in agreement: "It seems [From.GetSheHe] accepts your challenge, my [Root.GetLordLady]. The duel will take place in a few nights."
No..! It was supposed to be me...!

We have not even started, when my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] waves a hand in dismissal. "I have eyes and ears everywhere, [Root.GetFirstName]. Poison, truly?", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] sighs. I can feel the eyes of the crowd on me, burning with contempt at the idea.

The poison should have worked by now, I think to myself, frantically dodging another attack. Am I caught? Did I bungle the ratio? Soon, my opponent has [other_combatant.GetHerHis] blade pointed at my throat.
I... I will walk away while I can, [other_combatant.GetRootRelation]...

When [teacher.GetBestName] informed me that we were going to live in the woods for a few nights, I was tempted to refuse. We could be eaten by snakes! By [Root.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]s! Or attacked by raiders! However, falling asleep in the wilderness, to the wind and rustling of the trees, my fears began to wane. Now, I do not know what it was that I was so afraid of.

When [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] said we were going to spend several days in a library, my heart sank. "The scribes know details about all the famous warriors" [teacher.GetSheHe] beamed. Thankfully, it only takes a few hours before I find myself enthralled by the stories. "I knew you had it in you", [teacher.GetSheHe] says cheerfully.

I was not excited to watch others play games of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType], and I think [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] could tell. Yet, the patience with which my [teacher.GetRootRelation] narrated the matches to me, explaining each subtle move, was eye-opening. Even seeing fighters who lost one day, return for revenge the next, was inspiring!

When my [teacher.GetRootRelation] suggested we spend a few afternoons reorganizing [teacher.GetHerHis] armory, I expected to be bored within moments. Yet [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to keep my interest for several days, and I find myself asking questions I have never even thought of before. I am almost embarrassed by my former attitude.
Thank you, friend, for this opportunity.
I cannot express how grateful I am. Can I... Can I kiss you?
§Y[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]§! is as happy as you are.
§Y[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]§! smiles, and shrugs nonchalantly. "I guess on the cheek would be alright."

I would not have chosen "camping in the woods", but perhaps that is the point. When my [teacher.GetRootRelation] informed me that we were going to live in the wilderness for a few nights, I pushed all imagery of falling off cliffs and being eaten by snakes aside. You want us to spend time, voluntarily, in the library? [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] nods. "Yes! I think you'll enjoy hearing about old heroes," [teacher.GetSheHe] laughs, [teacher.GetHerHis] eyes aglitter. A few hours later, I understand. The tales are fascinating! "Some make for decent role models", I admit.

We are going to watch *others* play at [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType]? [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed my reluctance, and gestured me to a seat. Soon, [teacher.GetSheHe] was narrating the games to me, pointing out subtleties and things I would usually miss. "I.. am beginning to understand how a hot temper might get in the way of these things..." I admit.

Surely, your armory must already be in order? I offer, but [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] shakes [teacher.GetHerHis] head. "This is more about mastering the principles behind the organizing, than the organizing itself" the [teacher.GetManWoman] explains. A few days later, I admit, I have learned some valuable techniques and practices...!
There is nothing to fear here, is there?
Perhaps I simply never knew of all the things I *could* achieve?
I will exercise patience next time, [teacher.GetFirstName].
I will strive to be more diligent in the future, [teacher.GetFirstName].

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] had us go into the woods, where we were supposed to spend several nights. "Living off the land!" [teacher.GetSheHe] said. "I am the [Root.GetTitle]! I live comfortably in my [Root.GetCapitalHolding], thank you", I responded. The next couple of days were a frightening drudge of unsettling rustling in the trees, cold, and food poisoning.

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] and I spent several days couped up in a dusty old library. Apparently it was supposed to "inspire" me, whatever that means. I am sorry to say it had the opposite effect. "Perhaps we are not that alike, after all", the [teacher.GetManWoman] sighs in disappointment.

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] forced me to sit and watch all our friends playing games of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType]. And throughout the whole experience, the [teacher.GetManWoman] talked, and talked, trying to explain the game to me. Eventually I had enough and walked out.

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] put me to cleaning [teacher.GetHerHis] armory. And everything I did was wrong...! we are to spend a few nights camping in the woods. Judging by the nervous laughter my proposal is met with, I suspect [student.GetSheHe] is aware of the many dangers the wilderness holds... "It is nothing for cowards", I conclude.

I can't take it any longer. "Jailer!" I shout. I lash out at [crossfire_target.GetHerHis] smirk, punching the iron bar so hard my fingers crunch. My blood boils, but all I can do is crumple to the floor, the pain overwhelming my blood thirst.

I can't stand being confined here. In the corner of our cell, [crossfire_target.GetFirstName] stands, scratching something in the wall. "Doesn't it drive you mad?!" I growl at [crossfire_target.GetHerHim]. "YOU drive me mad!" [crossfire_target.GetSheHe] roars, flying for my throat. After a few days, and some ridicule from the jailer, I manage to break loose an iron bar... The feeling of an actual weapon in my hand makes my blood boil.
You want to go again?! I can do this all day!
Get out of my way! I am getting OUT of here!

Die! [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] bellows, with what must be the last of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] strength. [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving sluggishly. Now that I have found a distinguished member of the Catholic clergy to officiate the rites, it is time to organize the ceremony itself. Unfortunately, the necessities imposed by the war I am waging will force me to have only a small gathering of my closest allies to witness this momentous occasion.

The time of my coronation draws near: only a few more days before I am crowned [Root.GetTitle] before God and all my subjects. It will be a long wait and I can only hope that the day will not fall in the middle of a major battle...

What sort of [Root.GetTitle] am I to become? I could not even manage to organize a proper coronation ceremony, during a time of peace. Here I am, wading through the mud of a military encampment, preparing to receive my crown in the most undignified of settings...

However justified my reasons were to organize a secluded ceremony during a war, my vassals are far from pleased. Not only do they perceive it as a sign of weakness, but they all seem to have taken their lack of invitation as a personal slight against them!

For your admirable honesty, I dub thee Sir [From.GetFirstName] of the Turnip!
Grant §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a knighthood for [From.GetHerHis] honesty, preventing [From.GetHerHim] from §YAntagonizing§! you for some time.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has entirely misunderstood my intent! Rather than being upset by my slanderous allegations, [From.GetSheHe] praised me for my refined vocabulary.
别担心，[From.GetFirstName]，我还有很多话要说！
也许我该反思一下我的策略……
[From.GetFirstName] was ecstatic hearing my praise and assured me that [From.GetSheHe] has a lot more interesting names to call me.
Hopefully they will all be as endearing!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has entirely misunderstood my intent! Rather than being upset by my slanderous allegations, [From.GetSheHe] praised me for my honesty, and even decided to knight me!
你总是期待我说出真相，我[From.GetTitle]！

People of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], lend me your ears! After the miraculous recovery of territory lost centuries ago, our mighty nation has been reborn! Our land has endured dark times since the imperial frontiers were stormed by barbarians and province after province burned at their touch, but now a bright new age has dawned for all of civilization.\n\nOur great Nation will no longer be referred to as [e_byzantium.GetName] by jealous pretenders, but recognized as the true heir to the legacy of its illustrious ancestors. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rules a restored Imperium, but much work remains to be done. There is still territory to recover and ancient borders to reclaim. For the Senate and People of [Root.Capital.GetName]!
[From.Culture.GetName][From.GetTitle]已经设法收复了足够的失地，宣布重建[e_roman_empire.GetName]！不可置否，他们是旧帝国真正的继承者及其辉煌的遗产。他们声称一个新时代即将来临。

Soul Eaters are said to be damned people cursed by witches to forever roam the desert, sustaining themselves upon the souls of unwary travelers. Holding powers beyond the comprehension of ordinary men, these creatures can occasionally find their way into the dark corners of civilized societies, appearing in semblance of mortals to deceive their victims.
Has not been approached by the Soul Eaters before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you turn [Root.GetHerHim] into a Soul Eater.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of benevolent spirits, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in vibrant colors, hoping to attract prosperity and peace for [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and [Root.GetHerHis] family.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of warmongering spirits, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in strident colors, hoping to be blessed with power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] reach and instill fear in [Root.GetHerHis] enemies.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of trickster spirits, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in dark colors, hoping they will help [Root.GetHerHim] conceal [Root.GetHerHis] intentions and strike [Root.GetHerHis] enemies.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of the guardian spirits of the Underworld, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in pale colors, hoping to be spared from an untimely death.

I will soon no longer be a [Root.GetBoyGirl]. The time has come for me to perform the rite of passage that will mark the beginning of my adulthood. The shamans assure me that the larger and louder the ceremony is, the more likely the spirits will be to bless me.
All the people of [Root.Capital.GetName] will be invited!
By issuing a large celebration, the effects of your rite of passing will last for the next §Y20§! years.
I will invite everyone I know!
By issuing an average celebration, the effects of your rite of passing will last for the next §Y10§! years.
By issuing a small celebration, the effects of your rite of passing will last for the next §Y5§! years.
I do not believe in these silly superstitions!
Refuse to perform the rite of passage.

A large crowd has reunited around my palace, waiting for me to emerge as a grown [Root.GetManWoman]. The sound of chanting, cymbals and drums echoes all the way to my chambers while I prepare myself. The shamans warned me that this is a delicate and dangerous transition when the spirits roam closer to the world of the living, and that I should be careful not to anger the wrong ones.

A small crowd has reunited around my palace, waiting for me to emerge as a grown [Root.GetManWoman]. The sound of chanting, cymbals and drums echoes all the way to my chambers while I prepare myself. The shamans warned me that this is a delicate and dangerous transition when the spirits roam closer to the world of the living, and that I should be careful not to anger the wrong ones.

The little group of relatives and acquaintances awaits in the great hall, chanting and waiting for me to emerge as a grown [Root.GetManWoman]. The shamans warned me that this is a delicate and dangerous transition when the spirits roam closer to the world of the living, and that I should be careful not to anger the wrong ones.
Spirits of Life, watch over me!
I hope a powerful entity will lend me its strength.
May the Tricksters grant me their wits!
Will they spare me from death and sickness, I wonder?
Spirits and magic are all around us, hiding inside every tree, under every river, flying above our heads and beneath the very earth we walk on.
Upon reaching adulthood, characters perform a rite of passage.
§GUnits from Counties following the true faith receive a land morale bonus§!
§GCharacters perform a rite of passage upon reaching adulthood§!
The Byzantine Imperial insignia, a crown only fit for the true heirs of Rome.
Take some time to rest and relax.

In order to ensure the divine purity of their bloodline, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have gotten married under the blessed auspices of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], ensuring fullness and Order. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.
Characters can get blood on them from time to time.
Character portraits never use the blood splatter effect.
§RAll Requirements must be fulfilled and at least one potential Sponsor must be available and within range.§!
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will become the founder of a new §YBloodline§!

Thanks to the tireless efforts of the glorious [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the lands of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been wrestled from the barbarity and the misery of its dark past, and have been dragged into a new era of clarity and order. 
A new urbanized bureaucratic caste has taken hold of the provinces once held by quarreling warlords, reinvigorating the Imperial Throne with legitimacy and power beyond all expectations.

Ten thousand years of peace and prosperity upon the great [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty and its magnificent reformer!
Let darkness and violence be forever banned from our heavenly realm.
The European incursions in the Levant have brought a multitude of strident cultures together. From their clashes, a new Outremer identity is emerging.
All §Y[latin.GetGroupName]§! Provinces in your demesne become §YOutremer§!

Against all odds, the children of Christ have succeeded in their misbegotten quest to reconquer Jerusalem! \nHosts of archangels with shining armor and flaming swords have been reported to have descended upon the walls of the holy city during the final battle, smiting the infidels, turning the defenders' weapons into rust and melting their eyes out.\nA child now rules over the Kingdom of Heaven, and few doubt that it was through divine intervention that [From.GetSheHe] was put there.

Against all odds, the children of Christ have succeeded in their unlikely quest to reconquer Jerusalem! \nHosts of archangels with shining armor and flaming swords have been reported to have descended upon the walls of the holy city during the final battle, smiting the infidels, turning the defenders' weapons into rust and melting their eyes out.\n[From.GetFirstName] now rules over the Kingdom of Heaven, and few doubt that it was through divine intervention that [From.GetSheHe] was put there.

Rather than wasting lives and wealth after dreams of new conquest, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated [Root.GetHerHis] life to the improvement of [Root.GetHerHis] own realm, founding several new cities during the course of [Root.GetHerHis] reign, strengthening the infrastructure of [Root.GetHerHis] roads and holdings, and improving the living conditions of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects beyond measure.\nThanks to [Root.GetHerHis] efforts, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has grown to be a much more prosperous and populous realm than it would have otherwise been.\nThousands of new settlers will forever remember [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s vital contribution to the creation of their new homes.

While avoiding being forgotten entirely is my primary concern, it is also equally important for me to think about how I actually do wish posterity to think of me. How can I make sure that when I die, future generations will speak in awe and wonder about my accomplishments as [Root.GetTitle], and feel inspired to emulate me?
In order to immortalize my name I must leave an indelible mark on [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], improving my realm beyond what even my predecessors dared to accomplish...

A beacon of virtue and wisdom, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has acquired immortal fame by dedicating years of [Root.GetHerHis] rule to reach a deeper understanding of the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and of the truths hidden within our holy texts.\nRiding through an initial tide of controversy, the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] was able to establish a court of scholars and theologian, filled with endless disquisitions over the highest matters which will surely prove instrumental to lead us to gain a better understanding of this world and the ones beyond.

The Crusaders are leaving the [From.Religion.GetName] realm, their eyes towards Constantinople and [e_byzantium.GetName]. At the same time, the Pope has made an enraged speech about the vices of men and how the good faithful have been led astray. [ThePope.GetSheHeCap] threatens every single Crusader with excommunication from the church, but the Crusaders continues onwards towards the ancient capital at the Bosporus.\n\nWhat was once the bastion of the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] faith is now desperately protecting itself, and [e_byzantium.Holder.GetTitledName] is looking for any help [e_byzantium.Holder.GetSheHe] can get.

Constantinople falls to great cheers from the [From.Religion.GetName] Crusaders. The rest of the world weeps as the last lingering memories of the Roman Empire shatter. The former Emperor [FromFrom.GetDynName] has run off to [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] to try and restore what remains of the Empire.

[Root.GetByzantineRefugeeText]Now [e_latin_empire.Holder.GetTitledFirstName] sits on the throne in Constantinople. [e_latin_empire.Holder.GetSheHeCap] has declared [e_latin_empire.Holder.GetHerselfHimself] the new ruler of the Greek Empire, and will rule with both Greek and Latin traditions in mind.

Only time will tell, if the [From.Religion.GetName]s will be remembered as the ones who broke the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] Bulwark, or the ones who restored Constantinople to greatness.
In the middle of the fighting, [byzantine_refugee.GetDynName], the [From.Religion.GetName]-sponsored pretender to the Byzantine throne, died.

Cart after cart is brought before me. I try to keep track of how many there are but quickly loses count. They are numerous, and every single one is filled with nothing but gold. To see such wealth is extraordinary and to know that all of it belong to me...

Just as I am about to retire for the day a messenger comes running up to me, quite out of breath. He bows quickly before speaking, "Forgive me, my [Root.GetLordLady], for disturbing but... Our gold mine has collapsed! There is simply no more gold to be found in [depleted_gold_mine_target.GetName]"
I just received word that the gold mine in [depleted_gold_mine_target.GetName] is fully operational once more! The workers found another vein a few days ago and have already begun mining it.

It would seem that a recent influx of gold in [gold_inflation_province.GetName] has caused local prices to increase. Not only does it make things more expensive, but it also leaves the peasants with less money with which to pay me taxes!
Such is the price of gold...
Clever investments should keep the inflation in check.
Have soldiers take back the gold by force!
A smaller trade post at which travelling merchants can buy and sell various trade goods.
A trade post that has grown into a large market, attracting a wider range of merchants and trade goods.
这是跨撒哈拉商路上主要的贸易中心。非洲各地的商人都被吸引而来，他们在这里交易的商品和提供的服务都是在别的地方找不到的。
A small field for finding and extracting gold. This gleaming metal is highly valued and is often used as a currency.
A well established mine capable of producing larger quantities of gold.
The production of this larger mining complex is unrivaled. It produces an immense amount of gold.
A place where cloth of high quality is produced and sold.
A mine for extracting vast quantities of salt. A highly valued trade good said to be worth its weight in gold.
The gold mine has been depleted and will not provide any gold until another vein is found.
A large influx of gold has caused prices to be severly increased.
An influx of gold has caused prices to increase.
Local peasant are rioting after having had their possessions confiscated.
Sacrificing a lot of people as
Ruling with an iron fist as

The word around the court is that a remarkable [GetWeaponArmorSmith] is residing in [neighbor_province.GetName]. Perhaps I should invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made item.
What a fine idea, how clever I am!
As long as [physician.GetSheHe] keeps me healthy I shan't complain.

Once the [GetWeaponArmorSmith]'s craftsmanship had been checked by my most knowledgeable attendants to ensure the quality was sufficient, I received [From.GetHerHim] in the throne room. [From.GetSheHeCap] introduced [From.GetHerselfHimself] as '[From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]' and gestured towards [From.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [From.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'

I find myself lying in bed all day, the act of getting up almost as difficult as that of ruling. Food tastes bland, and my time spent with friends doesn't bring the joy it once did. I don't really understand why, but I hate my life.
The smith will never reach their destination and your treasures will be recovered.
The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was a sword you wanted right?" he adds.
The blacksmith who made this sword was probably drunk when they did so.

I am slashing my way through the enemies at the river bank, my blade covered in gore. The few enemies left are starting to back away from me, obviously terrified. Suddenly I am pulled off my feet as a sharp pain engulfs my leg. I turn to look into two large black eyes before I am pulled into the water.
was fed to a crocodile by $KILLER$
$NAME$ will become the new chief diety
$NAME$ will become a new evil diety
A Guardian of Kailash is steadfast in their defense of the holy mountain of Kailash They fight for the Bön faith.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] managed to unite the formerly disparate East and West Slavic people under [This.Founder.GetHerHis] rule.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] managed to unite the formerly disparate East and West Slavic people under [This.Founder.GetHerHis] rule.
只有东大草原、印度或西藏范围内的角色可以使用皇恩行为。朝贡国不能超出中国的外交距离。

The use of dark magic has corrupted me! The dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, eroding mind and muscle alike. It is obvious that [Root.GetDWDevil] is keeping me alive, but at what cost?

All power comes at a price. The use of dark magic has corrupted this character's body and mind, making them frail and demented. Despite their apparent weakness, a dark force is keeping them alive for nefarious reasons...
Fighting in a Warrior Lodge as
Restoring the Glory of Rome as
The Daura claim descent from Bayajidda and Magajiva – the first of whom slew a great serpent, and the second of whom instituted the matriarchal system of the Hausa people.
When the time comes, I will join in [Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]'s reconquest war!
Vanquisher of both Moors and Leonese in his campaigns for Portuguese independence, Alfonso cunningly battled many enemies to establish the roots of his own realm.
Lord over half of Iberia, Alfonso claimed the title “Emperor of all Spain” and sought to unify the peninsula under his rule. He was also known as a patron of arts.
Known as James the Conqueror, he established dominance over the Mediterranean Sea. He is also remembered as a sponsor of artists and a notorious lawmaker.
Warrior-king of the Basques and a major sponsor of the Reconquista, Garcia restored Basque control over Navarra after a long period of Aragonese domination.
Known as a champion of the faithful, diplomat and friend to Christians, Muhammad managed to keep alive the light of Al-Andalus despite the Castillian invasion.
A scholar and conqueror, Musa became a legend in the Islamic world for the vast wealth and majesty of his African kingdom. He also sponsored many construction projects.
A major leader of the First Crusade, Bohemond used his legendary martial skill and political cunning to capture Antioch and establish a kingdom for himself in the Levant.
Last of the great Norman conquerors, Roger unified Sicily under his rule, transforming it into a local power responsible for raids across the Muslim lands.
A leader of the Fourth Crusade, Baldouin fought alongside the Venetians to topple the last remnant of the Roman Empire, becoming the first Latin Emperor of Constantinople.
Founder of the Tughluq dynasty, he expanded Muslim reach across the Indian subcontinent and successfully repealed the Mongol menace.
Founder of the Ottoman dynasty, Osman rose to prominence as a daring commander, achieving victories against both Greeks and fellow Turks in his campaigns.
The mastermind behind the Fourth Crusade and the sack of Constantinople, Enrico is remembered as one of the most successful and prosperous doges Venice ever had.
Yusuf was invited by the emirs of Andalusia to come to Iberia and stop the Christian onslaught. He won, and established a vast realm extending from Ghana to Toledo.
Leader of the Almohad dynasty, the reign of Abu made both trade and science prosper, with his administrative and military skills being successful in halting the Reconquista.
Once sold in a slave market, Baibars would eventually become the man responsible for both defeating the Mongol advance and removing the Crusader States from the Levant.
A powerful woman, Arwa was known for her intelligence and knowledge of both heavenly and earthly affairs. She also engaged in several building projects across Yemen.
腓力是第三次十字军东征中一位虔诚而受人尊敬的领袖，他在与异端分子和异教徒的斗争中立下赫赫战功。
An able ruler, Frederick 'Barbarossa' was known both as a warrior who sought to control the rebel Italian princes and as a skilled lawmaker.
Despite his involvement in the murder of his elder brother, Boleslav was a tenacious leader who significantly strengthened the Bohemian realm.

They say you are famous for your [Root.GetMilitarySquadPride], my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] mocks me. "Not saving you this time, is it?!" [other_combatant.GetSheHe] bellows, swinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] furiously. My heart pounding, I suddenly find myself covered in something wet and sticky. My entrails are spilling out through a gash in my stomach...

Occasionally spotted leaving offerings in the rain, the Children of the Storm fight and train in the name of Dongo, the father of storms and god of thunder. When charging into battle, they wear blue and are known to carry small fetish symbols close to their heart.
Gather your people around the fire, and carry on the tradition of storytelling.
Has NOT recently told a story

A [Root.Capital.GetLocalTemperature] wind sweeps through the village. As the fire flares up, it lights up the crowd gathered around for the evening. I pass my drink to a servant and call for silence. "Friends! I am glad you have joined me tonight, for I shall tell you a story about...-"
... How I once beat up a crocodile with my bare hands!
... A brave warrior, who wandered the desert, in search of his true love.
... Mankind, and how we came to be.
... A benevolent spirit, who dwells in [Root.Capital.GetName].
This character is known to tell a tall tale every now and then...
You don't understand, the dog was *huge*!
This character carries wondrous stories of [Root.GetHerHis] ancestors.
This character inspires many emotions, through clever storytelling.
This character is great at recounting tales from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
This character can captivate an audience with tales of old.
Duelers are NOT involved in a war
罕见的大雨席卷整个地区，使得丰收超出预期，但河床有爆发洪水的危险。
适量的降雨给该地区的收成带来了积极的影响。
这个地区正饱受干旱之苦。
This area is suffering a severe drought, its people starving and fighting over resources.
The inhabitants in this area are praying for rain.
一个本地邪教忠于丰收之神。
This area has been blessed with good weather – as long as it remains, the inhabitants will believe that it is thanks to their acts of devoutness.

The light rains over [rain_dance_province.GetName] are having positive effects on the lives of the inhabitants. Harvests are plentiful, spirits are up, and it is said that people are flocking to join our troops. Everyone who has been praying for rain has had their faith affirmed.

The local cult devoted to the gods of harvests are reveling in the continuous light rains over [rain_dance_province.GetName]. The good spirits can be noticed on everyone, from contented farmers and workers, to smug merchants and eager soldiers in the area.

The area surrounding [rain_dance_province.GetName] are experiencing booming harvests after a continuous increase in downpour. "It is proof! Our prayers to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] have been answered!", a courier says, gesturing towards the sky.

Heavy rains continue to pour down over the area surrounding [rain_dance_province.GetName]. Harvests are over-performing, morale is high, and some people are jubilant, convinced that their own acts of devotion played a significant role in bringing this weather about. "Praise [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]", a servant mumbles.
Clearly the locals followed my instructions for rationing.
Rains have been plentiful and great for harvests in the area surrounding [rainy_province.GetName]. Some of the locals cannot even remember a time when the weather was causing them trouble.
Let them hold a festival to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to ensure these good times keep coming!

[drought_province.GetName] have gone weeks without rain. Watering holes for grazing animals are shrinking, and as inhabitants become more reliant on outside trade, traders charge more for resources. People are beginning to lose faith, even in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].

The dry season in [drought_province.GetName] is becoming dangerous. While the land suffers, ravaged by bush fires and disappearing watering holes, so does our people, growing desperate for water and food, as trade continues to dwindle in the area. Some are asking if there is even a point in turning to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
I'm sure the weather will change in time.
Make sure our traders are well-stocked.
Have people keep an eye on our rivers and lakes.
派人去检查我们的道路是否受到水的侵蚀。
我们应该为了以后的日子收集余粮。
让我们投资改善作物的灌溉系统。
We must get food out to the people outside our [Root.GetCapitalHolding].
Let's share the wealth from our capital with [province_to_save.GetName]!
We must put our faith in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Winds from the south are bringing unusually heavy rains over most of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
The seasons have lately brought regular light rainfall over large parts of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
Unrest is growing as large areas of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] grow drier each season.
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的状况惨不忍睹，因为干旱导致饿殍遍野。
Reports vary from region to region: [GetWeatherSplit]
你的一些省份享受着[GetHeavyLightRain]雨，而其他省份遭受着干旱。
有些地方面临着洪水风险，其他地方则享受着细雨润物。
while the winds could still change, there are provinces where the drought has gone on too long.
「我们也许应该注意地区的水位」，一个内阁成员如此建议。「我[Root.GetLordLady]，我们有很多方法处理它」，另一个内阁成员插话说。
为了接下来的日子，我们应该充实仓廪！
如果让它继续下去，那么领地里没有人能在接下来的非常时期里安然无恙。
有人说这事都怨我，因为我对[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的统治是失败的。
\n「我[Root.GetLordLady]？」，我的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName][my_steward.GetTitledFirstName]打断了我的思考，显然是期待我对天气预报作出反应。

I am told that the country is becoming a harsh environment for civilized people, and that people are fighting over every single drop of water. "We have some private stores in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], of course", my council reminds me.
你确保§Y[This.GetName]§!为应对状况而做好了进一步的准备。
这个地区从首都处接受了食物货运。
This ruler is turning to religion, praying to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] to end the drought slowly taking its toll on [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
本地商人们被鼓励引进外地货物，维持了领地重要资源的稳定流通。
为改进本地灌溉而付出了很多努力。
A message system has been put into place to warn for flooding in this area. An effort has also been put into shoring up riverbanks.
卫兵会在这个区域巡逻，确保旅行者没有因暴雨而陷入山体滑坡。

你所有的处于§Y「暴雨」§!的直辖领地获得为期五年的「§Y河流巡逻队§!」，得到以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-1.0%§!
军队士气：§G+5.0%§!
文化科技点数：§G+0.05%§!

你所有的处于§Y「暴雨」§!的直辖领地获得为期五年的「§Y道路巡逻队§!」，得到以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-1.0%§!
军队士气：§G+5.0%§!
文化科技点数：§G+0.05%§!
你所有的处于§Y「小雨」§!或§Y「暴雨」§!的直辖领地在以后更有可能抵御与干旱有关的困难。
[flooded_province.GetName]正遭受暴雨的侵袭。现在一场严重的山体滑坡席卷了该省的心脏地带，带走了人口甚至建筑物。当我的议会向我提出我们面临的选择时，气氛十分严峻。
我们必须设法拯救人民。
我们能不能...只救其中一部分？
你的代理人将确保你的仇敌陷入山体滑坡...
此选项是可用的，因为你的仇敌处于危险之中。
我们无法承受这些建筑损失。
旱灾对[starved_province.GetName]造成的损失被证明是致命的。水的缺乏导致人们互相争夺资源，不卫生的生活条件甚至影响到了社会的最高层。我的议会告诉我，一场疾病的爆发迫在眉睫。
当然，我们可以简单地...除掉病人？
让所有健全的男人为病人准备庇护所。
你的代理人会安排一系列「事故」。
这个角色已经在[Root.GetHerHis]王国内宣布，建筑工人将在这艰难时刻得到特别的感激。

「一开始是一阵奇怪的气味，如果不是我最近去了那儿，可能好几周都没人发现」，我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][my_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]解释道，[my_spiritual.GetHerHis]声音中流露出自豪的感觉。\n「这边走，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，[my_spiritual.GetSheHe]一边说着，将我领到了这个被水淹的房间。这味道使我鼻子发痒。
这些东西是「无价之宝」！我们必须想办法拯救它们！
发霉的旧书？把它们处理掉吧。
「是军需官先注意到的」，[my_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]说到，显然因这灾难有些沮丧。「我们已经尽了最大努力，但是恐怕还是有许多物件下落不明，[Root.GetMasterMistress]」我的[Root.GetMyMarshalName]避开我的目光说。
你是个专家！找到那些物品，让它们变得「闪耀」。
你说的当然不会是「我的」东西吧？不，我的[target_artifact.GetName]！
我们在[starving_province.GetName]的人民正在挨饿。食物的短缺必将影响当地宫廷人员的健康。
尽管已经努力救援了，在[starving_province.GetName]一些人民仍在挨饿。食物的短缺必将影响当地宫廷人员的健康。
尽管有额外的食物储备，[starving_province.GetName]的人民仍在挨饿。食物的短缺必将影响当地宫廷人员的健康。

I have been following a rumor, trying to track down what is supposed to be the most feared fighter in [target_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. A deadly fencer, I'm told. "You go to your death!" an innkeeper warns. Yet, when [combatant_2.GetSheHe]'s pointed out to me, I find myself face to face with a hunched elderly [combatant_2.GetManWoman], eyeing me suspiciously.
我不会因为你年长就手下留情！
The [combatant_2.GetManWoman] throws off [combatant_2.GetHerHis] cowl, accepting your challenge.

I've partaken in a local tournament, and I have been knocking out [target_ruler.Culture.GetName] fighters with ease. Grinning, I search the crowd for the face of [fellow_member.GetFirstName], who has been cheering me on. I find [fellow_member.GetHerHim] looking a bit pale. Turning to face my final foe I hear someone shouting an introduction: "[combatant_2.GetBestName]!"
你将与你曾见过的最高的[combatant_2.GetManWoman]决斗。

Rumors of my adventures have been spreading here in [target_title.GetName] and I have received a personal invite from [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName], to appear at [target_ruler.GetHerHis] court. "To the brute [Root.GetFirstName]. If you insist on causing trouble like this, you will fight someone I choose", the pompous messenger reads.
I am not afraid. I will duel any of [target_ruler.GetHerHis] champions!
As you accept, the messenger snickers.
你的传奇之旅已经结束了，你将脸上无光地回家。

As the [combatant_2.GetManWoman] unclasps [combatant_2.GetHerHis] cloak, I gasp. Beneath the disguise of a poor and withered elder, is an athletic and statuesque person, donned in fanciful armor. [combatant_2.GetSheHeCap] lashes out at me with a silvery sword, and I almost scream in surprise. When it is over, I am bloody and out of breath.

The crowd is cheering loudly as the giant looms over me. All the men I have fought so far pale in comparison. "YOU DIE NOW!" the beast of a [combatant_2.GetManWoman] roars, swinging a massive club. When it fails to hit me and bites the ground, the earth shakes. As [combatant_2.GetSheHe] moves to lift it again, I strike! The crowd falls silent.

A brute gets to fight a brute!, [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] proclaims, gesturing to the stage, where a... "That's a bear", I say, clearly less alarmed than expected. "I have fought bears before", I continue, picking up my [Root.GetDuelWeapon]. The creature roars. While the ensuing fight takes time, the monster soon lies at my feet.

I keep telling you plucky fools: I am retired, the [combatant_2.GetManWoman] hisses, unsheathing a silvery sword and straightening [combatant_2.GetHerHis] back. It dawns on me that my original assessment was wrong. "You're... Some kind of dueli-", I try, but I do not have time to finish my words. I am spluttering blood, staring in disbelief as my killer walks away.

The giant only grunts in response to my taunts, sluggishly swinging [combatant_2.GetHerHis] massive club. I slash at [combatant_2.GetHerHis] legs and unprotected arms, and the crowd roars with excitement. Suddenly, my opponent discards [combatant_2.GetHerHis] weapon, declaring: "I'll stop toying with you now, barbarian". [combatant_2.GetHerHisCap] swings pick up speed. I have nowhere to run.

A BEAR? I protest. "Aye, my [Root.GetLordLady]", the spindly man nods, gesturing onto the stage. "Fight!", [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] proclaims, and I do. The bear is brutally strong, and a wild beast at that. My sword does little when it grazes [combatant_2.GetHerHis] fur, and I am being tossed around like a toy. I... Ouch! Arrgh...

[This.GetTitledFirstName]想拥有一个孩子并将其养育成人。

如果[This.GetFirstName]的继承法是§Y男性§!，则只能通过养育儿子来达成这个野心。同理，如果[This.GetFirstName]的继承法是§Y女性§!，则只能是女儿。

在激活这一野心期间§Y生育能力§!会增加§G20%§!，而且当你的孩子到了§Y12§!岁时，你能通过§G右键点击§!他们的头像以§Y向封臣引见继承人§!
有§Y私生子§!，§Y宦官§!，§Y独身主义者§!或§Y无能§!特质
是男性，且继承法是§Y男性§!
是女性，且继承法是§Y女性§!
继承法既不是§Y男性§!也不是§Y女性§!
我有孩子了……我很好奇我的亡夫会怎么想。
这个角色惯用左手。尽管被神职人员另眼相看，但惯用左手的人往往在战斗中具有相当大的优势。

我们注意到您的[recruit_to_be.GetSonDaughter][recruit_to_be.GetFirstName]至今仍未加入我们的群体。我们诚挚地希望您与[recruit_to_be.GetHerHim]讨论关于成为[Root.Society.GetName]的一员的事宜，正如[recruit_to_be.GetHerHis][Root.GetFatherMother]曾经那样。

此致，[From.GetTitledFirstName]
我们的后代也许会追随我们的脚步，但激励我们的年轻人才是确保我们的战士公会能够传承下去的关键。

The premature death of my [From.GetRootRelation] §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! means that I fail my mission to recruit [From.GetHerHim]. [Root.Society.GetName] will find something else for me to do.
我们推荐了这个扩展，因为你选择了一个§Y东非§!角色。
除了战士公会和十字军强化，§Y神圣之怒§!还丰富了非洲地区的内容。
我们推荐了这个扩展，因为你选择了一个撒哈拉以南的§Y非洲§!角色。
因为§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!是一个[This.GetDuelNormbreakingReason]，这样的挑战是广受鄙视的。
这个角色通过[Root.GetHerHis]不分青红皂白地选择决斗目标。表现出缺乏心计和对社会传统极大的蔑视。
几乎可向每个人挑起决斗。关于性别和宗教的惩罚将不再有效。
用我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]向[This.GetHerHis][This.GetBodyPartInjured]开火，巨大的响声甚至使我自己震惊
向对手的头颅开火，[This.GetHerHis]脸浸在血中
一枪在地上打个大坑，把我的对手[This.GetHerselfHimself]吓得自己绊倒了自己。
[other_combatant.GetHerHis]用[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]一枪打在地上，把我吓得自己绊倒了自己。
推开老虎，射出我的最后一发子弹，我找到了[other_combatant.GetHerHis]神庙。
推开老虎，射出了[other_combatant.GetHerHis]最后一发子弹，我耳晕目眩摔倒在地上。

With the ceremony finally concluded, [From.GetTitledFirstName] bid me farewell and dismissed me from [From.GetHerHis] encampment, alongside all [From.GetHerHis] other guests. I still cannot believe that the coronation was not abruptly interrupted by an enemy raid... [From.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] must really be protecting [From.GetTitledFirstName].
其他所有§Y客人§!都受到了羞辱。
你是[e_roman_empire.GetName]的现任统治者。愿你的治世繁荣昌盛！
此人是重生的罗马帝国的现任统治者，理应得到符合其身份的尊重。
此人乃是[e_roman_empire.GetName]的现任统治者，理应得到符合其身份的尊重。
所有的头衔会被指定为长子继承法。\n-最年长的孩子继承所有头衔。\n-你的继承人会喜欢这个法律，但你的其他家族成员对其会有些反感。

所有的头衔会被指定为均分继承法。
-头衔会被分配给所有孩子，而长子继承主要头衔。
-你不会因为无领地的儿子而受到威望惩罚。
-你的直辖领地数量上限会增加§Y30%§!。
-禁止摧毁头衔。
-该继承法十分受到除长子以外所有孩子的欢迎。

所有的头衔会被指定为选举均分继承法。
-头衔会被候选人中第一继承人和其他人选所继承。
-你不会因为无领地的儿子而受到威望惩罚。
-你的直辖领地数量上限会增加§Y30%§!。
-禁止摧毁头衔。
-如果继承了帝国之下的王国，则在条件允许下，新王国会被创立以授予较年幼的孩子。
-低级的候选继承人总能不经开战就宣告独立。

所有的头衔会被指定为选举继承法。
-你和每个更低级的封臣（如果统治者是国王，那么就是公爵）能从他们自己以及统治者合法的孩子或兄弟姐妹当中提名一位作为继承人。
-公爵在王国和帝国中都可以参选。
-封臣们喜欢选举继承法，但如果领主自己持有太多选侯头衔，他们将不会赞成选举继承法。
所有的头衔会被指定为年长者继承法。\n-你家族中最年长的成员会继承所有头衔。\n-你最年长的孩子会非常讨厌这个法律，但其他的家族成员会喜欢。
所有的头衔会被指定为幼子继承法。\n-最小的孩子继承所有头衔。\n-与更为常见的长子继承法相对。
所有的头衔会被指定为凯尔特酋长选举继承法。\n-你，以及比你低一至二等级的封臣皆可提名继承人————即储副————储副是从你的家族成员中选出来的。\n-封臣们更愿意从家族的其他支系中选择年长者，尤其是宣称者。
吾之一生乃战之一生，此已为众人所知，但总有聪明人愿意更多地了解我的经历从而受益。“就像那个时候你砍下了某人的脑袋？”[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]回应着我的想法。“真是一场盛宴！您的故事让我们赞叹不已！”[fellow_member.GetSheHe]在旁迎合。而这种精神将被发扬，正如我将加冕为[target_title.GetName]
